GV00maitrs_pu:3804: somasya drapsam avṛṇīta pūṣā bṛhann adrir abhavad yat tad āsīt //
GV00maitrs_pu:3805: drapsaś caskanda pṛthivīm anu dyām imaṃ ca yonim anu yaś ca pūrvaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:3806: samānaṃ yonim anu saṃcarantaṃ drapsaṃ juhomy anu sapta hotrāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:3807: pitā vatsānāṃ patir aghnyānām utāyaṃ pitā mahatāṃ gargarāṇām /
GV00maitrs_pu:3808: vatso jarāyu pratidhuk pīyūṣa āmikṣā mastu ghṛtam asya yoniḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:3809: tvāṃ gāvo 'vṛṇata rājyāya tvāṃ vardhanti marutaḥ svarkāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:3810: varṣman kṣatrasya kakubbhiḥ śiśriyāṇas tato na ugro vibhajā vasūni //MS_2,5.10//
GV00maitrs_pu:3811: vāyavyam ajam ālabhetaindraṃ vṛṣṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ vā vāruṇaṃ petvaṃ bhūtikāmaṃ yājayed
GV00maitrs_pu:3812: yad vāyave vāyur evainaṃ bhūtyai ninayatīndriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yo 'laṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:3813: bhūtyai san na bhavati yad aindra indriyeṇaivainaṃ vīryeṇa samardhayati varuṇagṛhīto
GV00maitrs_pu:3814: vā eṣa yo 'laṃ bhūtyai san na bhavati yad vāruṇo varuṇād evainaṃ tena muñcaty etān
GV00maitrs_pu:3815: evābhicarann ālabheta yad vāyave vāyur evāsmai vajraṃ saṃśyaty aindro vai vajra indriyeṇa
GV00maitrs_pu:3816: khalu vai vajraḥ prahriyate yad aindro vajram evāsmai praharati yad vāruṇo varuṇenaivainaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:3817: grāhayitvā stṛṇute sauryaṃ balakṣaṃ petvam ālabheta brahmavarcasakāmo 'sau vā ādityo
GV00maitrs_pu:3818: brahmavarcasasya pradātā tam eva bhāgadheyenopāsarat so 'smai brahmavarcasaṃ prayachati
GV00maitrs_pu:3819: yad balakṣaḥ samṛddhas tena yad alūnaḥ samṛddhas tena yat pīvā samṛddhas tena trivṛd
GV00maitrs_pu:3820: vāvāsmā etat samṛddhaṃ brahmavarcasaṃ dadhāty ādityaṃ bahurūpam ālabheta yasyāśvine
GV00maitrs_pu:3821: śasyamāne sūryo nodiyāt parācīr vā etasmai vyuchanti yasyāśvine śasyamāne sūryo nodeti
GV00maitrs_pu:3822: yad ādityo 'mum evāsmā unnayati bahurūpo bhavati bahūni vai raśmīnāṃ rūpāṇi raśmīnām
GV00maitrs_pu:3823: evāsmai rūpāṇy āptvonnayaty agnir vai sṛṣṭo na vyarocata so 'gnaye tejasvine 'jaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:3824: kṛṣṇagrīvam ālabhata tena tejasvy abhavat so 'kāmayata sarvatra vibhaveyam iti so
GV00maitrs_pu:3825: 'gnaye vibhūtimate 'jaṃ kṛṣṇagrīvam ālabhata tena sarvatra vyabhavat so 'kāmayata
GV00maitrs_pu:3826: sarvatrāpibhāgaḥ syām iti so 'gnaye bhāgine 'jaṃ kṛṣṇagrīvam ālabhata tena sarvatrāpibhāgo
GV00maitrs_pu:3827: 'bhavat so 'kāmayata dānakāmā me prajāḥ syur iti so 'gnaye dātre 'jaṃ kṛṣṇagrīvam
GV00maitrs_pu:3828: ālabhata tenāsmai dānakāmāḥ prajā abhavan yaḥ kamayeta tejasvī syāṃ sarvatra vibhaveyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:3829: sarvatrāpibhāgaḥ syāṃ dānakāmā me prajāḥ syur iti sa etān ajān kṛṣṇagrīvān ālabheta
GV00maitrs_pu:3830: tejasvī bhavati sarvatra vibhavati sarvatrāpibhāgo bhavati dānakāmā asmai prajā bhavanti
GV00maitrs_pu:3831: prājāpatyaṃ bahurūpam ālabheta paśukāmaḥ prājāpatyā vai paśavaḥ prajāpatiḥ paśūnāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:3832: prajanayitā tam eva bhāgadheyenopāsarat so 'smai paśūn prajanayati bahurūpo bhavati
GV00maitrs_pu:3833: bahūni vai paśūnāṃ rūpāṇi paśūnām evāsami rūpāṇy āptvāvarunddhe yāmaṃ śukaharim ālabheta
GV00maitrs_pu:3834: śuṇṭhaṃ vā yaḥ kāmayeta yamaloka ṛdhnuyām ity etena vai yamo 'muṣmiṃl loka ārdhnod
GV00maitrs_pu:3835: yamo 'muṣya lokasyādhipatyam ānaśe tam eva bhāgadheyenopāsarat sa enam amuṣya lokasyādhipatyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:3836: gamayaty ekadhā vā etena yamaloka ṛdhnoti pare vayasi yaṣṭavyaṃ tājag ghi pramīyate
GV00maitrs_pu:3837: śuṇṭho vā bhavati śukaharir vaiṣa hy etasya devatayā paśūnāṃ samṛddhaḥ //MS_2,5.11 //
GV00maitrs_pu:3839: anumatyā aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapanti ye pratyañcaḥ śamyām atiśīyante tan nairṛtam ekakapālam
GV00maitrs_pu:3840: ubhau saha śṛtau kurvanti nairṛtena pūrveṇa pracaranti dakṣiṇā paretya svakṛtā iriṇa
GV00maitrs_pu:3843: vāsaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ bhinnāntaṃ dakṣiṇā punar etyānumatyā aṣṭākapālena pracaranti dhenur dakṣiṇātha ya udañcaḥ śamyām atiśīyante tān udaṅ paretya valmīkavapām udrujya juhuyāt //
GV00maitrs_pu:3847: śvo bhūta ādityebhyo bhuvadvadbhyo ghṛte carur varo dakṣiṇā śvo bhūta āgnāvaiṣṇava
GV00maitrs_pu:3848: ekādaśakapālo 'naḍvān vāmano dakṣiṇā śvo bhūte 'gnīṣomīyā ekādaśakapālo hiraṇyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:3849: dakṣiṇā śvo bhūta aindrāgna ekādaśakapālo 'naḍvān ṛṣabho dakṣiṇā śvo bhūta āgneyo
GV00maitrs_pu:3851: aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped āgnendraṃ vā vaiśvadevaś caruḥ saumyaḥ śyāmākaś
GV00maitrs_pu:3852: carur dyāvāpṛthivīyā ekakapālo vatsaḥ prathamajo dakṣiṇā sīraṃ dvādaśāyogaṃ dakṣiṇoṣṭāro
GV00maitrs_pu:3854: āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo vāruṇo yavamayaś carur raudro gāvīdhukaś carur aindraṃ dadhi dhenur
GV00maitrs_pu:3855: anaḍvāhī dakṣiṇāpāṃ nyayanād apāmārgān āharanti tānt saktūn kṛtvā dakṣiṇā paretya
GV00maitrs_pu:3856: svakṛtā iriṇa ekolmukaṃ nidhāya parṇamayena sruveṇa juhoti //
GV00maitrs_pu:3858: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām indrasyaujasā rakṣohāsi svāhā hataṃ rakṣo 'vadhiṣma rakṣaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:3860: ye devāḥ puraḥsado agninetrā rakṣohaṇas te no 'vantu te naḥ pāntu tebhyaḥ svāhā ye
GV00maitrs_pu:3861: devā dakṣiṇātsado yamanetrā rakṣohaṇas te no 'vantu te naḥ pāntu tebhyaḥ svāhā ye
GV00maitrs_pu:3862: devāḥ paścātsado marunnetrā rakṣohaṇas te no 'vantu te naḥ pāntu tebhyaḥ svāhā ye
GV00maitrs_pu:3863: devā uttarātsado mitrāvaruṇanetrā rakṣohaṇas te no 'vantu te naḥ pāntu tebhyaḥ svāhā
GV00maitrs_pu:3864: ye devā upariṣado 'vasvadvantaḥ somanetrā rakṣohaṇas te no 'vantu te naḥ pāntu tebhyaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:3865: svāhedam ahaṃ rakṣo 'bhisamūhāmy agne saṃdaha rakṣaḥ saṃdagdhaṃ rakṣo 'gnaye puraḥsade
GV00maitrs_pu:3866: svāhā yamāya dakṣiṇātsade svāhā marudbhyaḥ paścātsadbhyaḥ svāhā mitrāvaruṇābhyām
GV00maitrs_pu:3867: uttarātsadbhyāṃ svāhā somāyopariṣade 'vasvadvate rakṣoghne svāhā rathaḥ pañcavāhī
GV00maitrs_pu:3869: anumatyai carur rākāyai caruḥ sinīvālyai caruḥ kuhvai carur dhātre dvādaśakapālaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:3870: paṣṭhauhī dakṣiṇāgnāvaiṣṇava ekādaśakapāla aindrāvaiṣṇāvaś carur vaiṣṇavas trikapālo
GV00maitrs_pu:3871: vāmano dakṣiṇā saumāpauṣṇa ekādaśakapāla aindrāpauṣṇaś caruḥ pauṣṇaś caruḥ śyāmo
GV00maitrs_pu:3872: dakṣiṇāgnaye vaiśvānarāya dvādaśakapālo vāruṇo yavamayaś carur hiraṇyaṃ cāśvaś ca
GV00maitrs_pu:3874: bārhaspatyaś carur brahmaṇo gṛhe śitipṛṣṭho dakṣiṇaindra ekādaśakapālo rājño gṛha
GV00maitrs_pu:3875: ṛṣabho dakṣiṇādityaś carur mahiṣyā gṛhe dhenur dakṣiṇā nairṛtaś carur nakhāvapūtānāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:3876: parivṛktyā gṛhe śyenī vaṇḍāpasphurā dakṣiṇāgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ senānyo gṛhe hiraṇyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:3877: dakṣiṇāśvino dvikapālaḥ saṃgrahītur gṛhe savatyau dakṣiṇā sāvitro 'ṣṭākapālaḥ kṣattur
GV00maitrs_pu:3878: gṛhe śyeto dakṣiṇā vāruṇo yavamayo daśakapālaḥ sūtasya gṛhe babhrur mahāniraṣṭo dakṣiṇā
GV00maitrs_pu:3879: mārutaḥ saptakapālo vaiśyasya grāmaṇyo gṛhe pṛśniḥ paṣṭhauhī dakṣiṇā pauṣṇaś carur
GV00maitrs_pu:3880: bhāgadughasya gṛhe śyāmo dakṣiṇā vaiṣṇavas trikapālas takṣarathakārayor gṛhe sarvāyasāni
GV00maitrs_pu:3881: dakṣiṇā raudro gāvīdhukaś carur akṣāvāpasya gṛhe govikartasya cāsir vālāpitastho
GV00maitrs_pu:3882: dakṣiṇā śabalo vā trivatso 'bhidhānī vā kesarapāśā //MS_2,6.5 //
GV00maitrs_pu:3883: indrāyāṃhomucā ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped indrāya sutrāmṇā ekādaśakapālam ṛṣabho dakṣiṇā
GV00maitrs_pu:3884: svayaṃrugṇāyā aśvatthaśākhāyāḥ pātraṃ bhavaty atha śvetāṃ śvetavatsāṃ duhanti tat
GV00maitrs_pu:3885: svayaṃ mūrchati svayaṃ mathyate svayaṃvilīnam ājyaṃ bhavaty atha maitrābārhaspatyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:3886: havir nirvapanti ye kṣodiṣṭhās taṇḍulās taṃ bārhaspatyaṃ caruṃ śṛtaṃ kurvanti tatra
GV00maitrs_pu:3887: tat pātram apidhāyājyam āsicya ye sthaviṣṭhās taṇḍulās tān āvapanty ubhau saha śṛtau
GV00maitrs_pu:3888: kurvanti maitreṇa pūrveṇa pracaranty aśvo maitrasya dakṣiṇā śitipṛṣṭho bārhaspatyasyāgnaye
GV00maitrs_pu:3889: gṛhapataya āpatantānām aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet somāya vanaspataye śyāmākaṃ caruṃ savitre
GV00maitrs_pu:3890: prasavitre satīnānām aṣṭākapālaṃ bṛhaspataye vācaspataye naivāraṃ carum indrāya jyeṣṭhāya
GV00maitrs_pu:3891: hāyanānām ekādaśakapālaṃ mitrāya satyasya pataye nāmbānāṃ caruṃ varuṇāya dharmasya
GV00maitrs_pu:3892: pataye yavamayaṃ caruṃ rudrāya paśupataye gāvīdhukaṃ carum //
GV00maitrs_pu:3893: savitā tvā prasavānāṃ suvatām agnir gārhapatyānāṃ somo vanaspatīnāṃ bṛhaspatir vācām
GV00maitrs_pu:3894: indro jyaiṣṭhyānāṃ mitraḥ satyānāṃ varuṇo dharmaṇāṃ rudraḥ paśūnāṃ te devā asapatnam
GV00maitrs_pu:3895: imaṃ suvadhvam amum āmuṣyāyaṇam amuṣyāḥ putram amuṣyāṃ viśi mahate kṣatrāya mahate
GV00maitrs_pu:3896: jānarājyāya śukrajyotiś ca citrajyotiś ca satyajyotiś ca jyotiṣmāṃś ca satyaś ca
GV00maitrs_pu:3897: ṛtapāś cātyaṃhā ṛtajic ca styajic ca senajic ca suṣeṇaś cāntimitraś ca dūre'mitraś
GV00maitrs_pu:3898: ca gaṇa ṛtaś ca satyaś ca dhruvaś ca dharuṇaś ca dhartā ca vidhartā ca vidhārayaḥ //MS_2,6.6 //
GV00maitrs_pu:3899: devīr āpo apāṃ napād rāṣṭradāḥ stha rāṣṭraṃ datta svāhā devīr āpo apāṃ napād rāṣṭradāḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:3900: stha rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta vṛṣormir asi vṛṣaseno 'sy apāṃ patir asy aprahāvarīḥ stha
GV00maitrs_pu:3901: parivāhiṇīḥ sthaujasvinīḥ stha māndāḥ stha vrajakṣitaḥ stha sūryavarcasaḥ stha sūryatvacasaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:3902: stha marutām ojaḥ stha vaśāḥ stha śakvarīḥ stha viśvabhṛtaḥ stha janabhṛto 'pām oṣadhīnāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:3903: rasaḥ śraviṣṭhāḥ stha rāṣṭradāḥ stha rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta //MS_2,6.7 //
GV00maitrs_pu:3904: devīr āpo madhumatīḥ saṃsṛjyadhvaṃ mahi kṣatraṃ kṣatriyāya vanvānāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:3905: anādhṛṣṭāḥ sīdatorjasvatīr mahi varcaḥ kṣatriyāya dadhatīḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:3906: apo devīr madhumatīr agṛbhṇām ūrjasvatī rājasūyāś citānāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:3907: yābhir mitrāvaruṇā abhyaṣiñcaṃs tābhir indram anayann aty arātīḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:3908: anibhṛṣṭam asi vāco bandhus tapojāḥ somasya dātram //
GV00maitrs_pu:3909: śukrā vaḥ śukreṇa punāmi candrā vaś candreṇa punāmi //
GV00maitrs_pu:3910: devo vaḥ savitā punātv achidreṇa pavitreṇa /
GV00maitrs_pu:3913: sadhamādo dyumnyā ūrjā ekā anādhṛṣṭā apasyo vasānāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:3914: pastyāsu cakre varuṇaḥ sadhastham apāṃ śiśur mātṛtamāsv antaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:3916: rudra yat te giriparaṃ nāma tasmin hutam asi yameṣṭam asi svāhā somā indro varuṇo mitro agnis te devā dharmadhṛto dharmaṃ dhārayantu //MS_2,6.8//
GV00maitrs_pu:3917: kṣatrasya yonir asi kṣatrasyolbam asi kṣatrasya nābhir asy āvitto agnir gṛhapatir
GV00maitrs_pu:3918: āvittā indro vṛddhaśravā āvittau mitrāvaruṇau dhṛtavratav āvitte dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāvṛdhav
GV00maitrs_pu:3919: āvittaḥ pūṣā viśvavedā āvittā devy aditir āvitto 'yam asā āmuṣyāyaṇo 'muṣyāḥ putro
GV00maitrs_pu:3920: 'muṣyāṃ viśi mahate kṣatrāya mahate jānarājyāyaiṣa te janate rājā somo 'smākaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:3921: rājendrasya vajro 'si vārtraghnas tvayāyaṃ vṛtraṃ vadhyāc chatrubādhanāḥ stha pāta
GV00maitrs_pu:3922: prāñcaṃ pāta pratyañcaṃ pāta tiryañcaṃ pātānvañcaṃ pātordhvaṃ digbhya enaṃ pāta mitro 'si varuṇo 'si //
GV00maitrs_pu:3923: hiraṇyavarṇam uṣaso vyuṣṭā ayaḥsthūṇam uditau sūryasya /
GV00maitrs_pu:3924: ārohatho varuṇa mitra gartaṃ tataś cakrāthe aditiṃ ditiṃ ca //MS_2,6.9//
GV00maitrs_pu:3925: samidham ātiṣṭha gāyatrī tvā chandasām avatu trivṛt stomo rathantaraṃ sāmāgnir devatā
GV00maitrs_pu:3926: brahma draviṇam ugrām ātiṣṭha triṣṭup tvā chandasām avatu pañcadaśaḥ stomo bṛhat
GV00maitrs_pu:3927: sāmendro devatā kṣatraṃ draviṇaṃ prācīm ātiṣṭha jagatī tvā chandasām avatu saptadaśaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:3928: stomo vairūpaṃ sāma viśve devā devatā viḍ draviṇam udīcīm ātiṣṭhānuṣṭup tvā chandasām
GV00maitrs_pu:3929: avatv ekaviṃśaḥ stomo vairājaṃ sāma mitrāvaruṇau devatā puṣṭaṃ draviṇam ūrdhvām ātiṣṭha
GV00maitrs_pu:3930: paṅktis tvā chandasām avatu triṇavatrayastriṃśau stomau śākvararaivate sāmanī bṛhaspatir
GV00maitrs_pu:3931: devatā phalaṃ draviṇaṃ somasya tviṣir asi tviṣimat taveva me tviṣir bhūyāt //
GV00maitrs_pu:3934: agnaye svāhā somāya svāhā savitre svāhā sarasvatyai svāhā pūṣṇe svāhā bṛhaspataye
GV00maitrs_pu:3935: svāhendrāya svāhā ghoṣāya svāhā ślokāya svāhāṃśāya svāhā bhagāya svāhā kṣetrasya
GV00maitrs_pu:3936: pataye svāhā somasya tvā dyumnenāgnes tejasendrasyendriyeṇa viśveṣāṃ tvā devānāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:3937: kratunābhiṣiñcāmīndrasya yonir asi janayāti dyūn pāhi //
GV00maitrs_pu:3938: samāvavṛtrann adharāg udak tā ahiṃ budhnyam anvīyamānāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:3939: tāḥ parvatasya vṛṣabhasya pṛṣṭhān nāvo viyanti susico na vāṇīḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:3940: indrasya vajro 'si vājasanis tvayāyaṃ vājaṃ sen mitrāvaruṇayos tvā praśāstroḥ praśiṣā
GV00maitrs_pu:3941: yunajmi viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si sapatnahā marutāṃ prasave jayāptaṃ manaḥ sam indriyeṇaiṣa
GV00maitrs_pu:3942: vajro vājasātamas tena nau putro vājaṃ set //MS_2,6.11 //
GV00maitrs_pu:3943: iyad asy āyur asy āyur me dhehi yuṅṅ asi varco 'si varco me dhehy ūrg asy ūrjaṃ mayi
GV00maitrs_pu:3944: dhehi mitro 'si varuṇo 'si sad asi sam ahaṃ viśvair devair namo mātre pṛthivyai mā
GV00maitrs_pu:3946: prati tyan nāma rājyam adhāyi svāṃ tanvaṃ varuṇo 'suṣot /
GV00maitrs_pu:3947: śucer mitrasya vratyā abhūmāmanmahi mahad ṛtasya nāma //
GV00maitrs_pu:3948: sarve vrātā varuṇasyābhūma ni mitrayur aratīn atārīt /
GV00maitrs_pu:3949: aśūśubhanta yajñiyā ṛtena ni trito jarimāṇaṃ na ānaṭ //
GV00maitrs_pu:3950: syonāsi suṣadā syonām āsīda suṣadām āsīda //
GV00maitrs_pu:3953: agnaye svāhā somāya svāhendrasyaujase svāhā marutāṃ balāya svāhā //

GV00maitrs_pu:4170: saṃśitaṃ kṣatraṃ me jiṣṇu yasyāham asmi purohitaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4171: brahma kṣatraṃ sayujā na vyathete brahmāha kṣatraṃ jinvati kṣatriyasya /
GV00maitrs_pu:4172: kṣatraṃ brahma jinvati brāhmaṇasya yat samīcī kṛṇuto vīryāṇi //MS_2,7.7//
GV00maitrs_pu:4173: dṛśāno rukma uruyā vibhāti durmarṣam āyuḥ śriye rucānaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4174: agnir ajaro 'bhavat sahobhir yad enaṃ dyaur ajanayat suretāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4175: naktoṣāsā samanasā virūpe dhāpayete śiśum ekaṃ samīcī /
GV00maitrs_pu:4176: dyāvākṣāmā rukmo antar vibhāti devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4177: viśvā rūpāṇi pratimuñcate kaviḥ prāsāvīd bhadraṃ dvipade catuṣpade /
GV00maitrs_pu:4178: vi nākam akśat savitā vareṇyo 'nu prayāṇam uṣaso virājati //
GV00maitrs_pu:4179: suparṇo 'si garutmāṃs trivṛt te śiro gāyatraṃ cakṣur bṛhadrathantare pakṣau stoma
GV00maitrs_pu:4180: ātmā chandāṃsy aṅgāni yajūṃṣi nāma sāma te tanūr vāmadevyaṃ yajñāyajñiyaṃ pucchaṃ dhiṣṇyāḥ śaphāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4181: suparṇo 'si garutmān divaṃ gacha svaḥ pata //
GV00maitrs_pu:4182: viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si sapatnahā gāyatraṃ chandā āroha pṛthivīm anuvikramasva viṣṇoḥ kramo
GV00maitrs_pu:4183: 'sy abhimātihā traiṣṭubhaṃ chandā ārohāntarikṣam anuvikramasva viṣṇoḥ kramo 'sy arātīyato
GV00maitrs_pu:4184: hantā jāgataṃ chandā āroha divam anuvikramasva viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si śatrūyat' hantānuṣṭubhaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:4186: akrandad agniḥ stanayann iva dyauḥ kṣamā rerihad vīrudhaḥ samañjan /
GV00maitrs_pu:4187: sadyo jajñāno vi hīm iddho akśad ā rodasī bhānunā bhāty antaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4188: agne 'bhyāvartinn agne aṅgiraḥ punar ūrjā saha rayyā //
GV00maitrs_pu:4189: ā tvāhārṣam antar abhūr dhruvas tiṣṭhāvicācalat /
GV00maitrs_pu:4190: viśas tvā sarvā vānchantv asme rāṣṭrāṇi dhāraya //
GV00maitrs_pu:4192: agre bṛhann uṣasām ūrdhvo asthān nirjaganvān tamaso jyotiṣāgāt /
GV00maitrs_pu:4193: agnir bhānunā ruśatā svaṅgā ā jāto viśvā sadmāny aprāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4195: sīda tvaṃ mātur asyā upasthe viśvāny agne vayunāni vidvān /
GV00maitrs_pu:4196: mainām arciṣā mā tapasābhiśocīr antar asyāṃ śukrajyotir vibhāhi //
GV00maitrs_pu:4198: antar agne rucā tvam ukhāyāṃ sadane sve /
GV00maitrs_pu:4199: tasyai tvaṃ harasā tapan jātavedaḥ śivo bhava //
GV00maitrs_pu:4200: śivo bhūtvā mahyam agne athā sīda śivas tvam /
GV00maitrs_pu:4201: śivāḥ kṛtvā diśaḥ sarvāḥ svaṃ yonim ihāsadaḥ //MS_2,7.8//
GV00maitrs_pu:4202: divas pari prathamaṃ jajñe agnir asmad dvitīyaṃ pari jātavedāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4203: tṛtīyam apsu nṛmaṇā ajasram indhāna enaṃ janate svādhīḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4204: vidmā te agne tredhā trayāṇi vidmā te sadma vibhṛtaṃ purutrā /
GV00maitrs_pu:4205: vidmā te nāma paramaṃ guhā yad vidmā tam utsaṃ yata ābabhūtha //
GV00maitrs_pu:4206: samudre tvā nṛmaṇā apsv antar nṛcakṣā īdhe divo agnā ūdhan /
GV00maitrs_pu:4207: tṛtīye tvā rajasi tasthitāṃsam ṛtasya yonau mahiṣā agṛbhṇan //
GV00maitrs_pu:4208: śrīṇām udāro dharuṇo rayīṇāṃ manīṣāṇāṃ prārpaṇaḥ somagopāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4209: vasuḥ sūnuḥ sahaso apsu rājā vibhāty agra uṣasām idhānaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4210: uśik pāvako aratiḥ sumedhā martyeṣv agnir amṛto nidhāyi /
GV00maitrs_pu:4211: iyarti dhūmam aruṣo bharibhrad uñ śukreṇa śociṣā dyām inakṣan //
GV00maitrs_pu:4213: viśvasya jajñe bhuvanasya rājā rodasī apṛṇāj jāyamānaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4214: vīḍuṃ cid adrim abhinat parāyan janā yad agnim ayajanta pañca //
GV00maitrs_pu:4217: yas te adya kṛṇavad bhadraśoce 'pūpaṃ deva ghṛtavantam agne /
GV00maitrs_pu:4218: pra taṃ naya prataraṃ vasyo achābhi dyumnaṃ devahitaṃ yaviṣṭhya //
GV00maitrs_pu:4219: ā taṃ bhaja sauśravaseṣv agna ukthaukthā ābhaja śasyamāne /
GV00maitrs_pu:4220: priyaḥ sūrye priyo agnā bhavāty uj jātena bhinadad uj janitvaiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4221: tvām agne yajamānā anu dyūn dūtaṃ kṛṇvānā ayajanta havyaiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4222: tvayā saha draviṇam ichamānā vrajaṃ gomantam uśijo vivavruḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4223: astāvy agnir nṛṇāṃ suśevo vaiśvānara ṛṣibhiḥ somagopāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4224: adveṣye dyāvāpṛthivī huve devā dhatta rayim asme suvīram //MS_2,7.9//
GV00maitrs_pu:4225: ud u tvā viśve devā agne bharantu cittibhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4226: sa no bhava śivas tvaṃ supratīko vibhāvasuḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4227: pred agne jyotiṣmān yāhi śivebhir arcibhiṣ ṭvam /
GV00maitrs_pu:4228: bṛhadbhir bhānubhir bhāsan mā hiṃsīs tanvā prajāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4232: praprāyam agnir bharatasya śṛṇve vi yat sūryo na rocate bṛhad bhāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4233: abhi yaḥ pūruṃ pṛtanāsu tasthau dīdāya daivyo atithiḥ śivo naḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4234: āpo devīḥ pratigṛbhṇīta bhasmaitat syone kṛṇudhvaṃ surabhā uloke /
GV00maitrs_pu:4235: tasmai namantāṃ janayaḥ sanīḍā māteva putraṃ bibhṛtā sv enat //
GV00maitrs_pu:4236: apsv agne sadhiṣ ṭava sauṣadhīr anurudhyase /
GV00maitrs_pu:4239: garbho viśvasya bhūtasyāgne garbho apām asi //
GV00maitrs_pu:4240: prasadya bhasmanā yonim apaś ca pṛthivīm agne /
GV00maitrs_pu:4241: saṃgatya mātṛbhiṣ ṭvaṃ jyotiṣmān punar āsadaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4242: punar āsadya sadanam apaś ca pṛthivīm agne /
GV00maitrs_pu:4243: śeṣe mātur yathopasthe antar asyāṃ śivatamaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4245: bodhā me asya vacaso yaviṣṭha maṃhiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya svadhāvaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4246: nindati tvo anu tvo vavanda vandāruṃ te tanvaṃ vande agne //
GV00maitrs_pu:4247: sa bodhi sūrir maghavā vasudāvā vasupatiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4248: yuyodhy asmad dveṣāṃsi yāni kāni ca cakṛma //MS_2,7.10//
GV00maitrs_pu:4249: apeta vīta vi ca sarpatāto ye 'tra sthaṃ purāṇā ye ca nūtanāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4250: adād idaṃ yamo 'vasānaṃ pṛthivyā akrann imaṃ pitaro lokam asmai //
GV00maitrs_pu:4251: agner bhasmāsy agneḥ purīṣam asi saṃjñānam asi kāmadharaṇaṃ mayi te kāmadharaṇaṃ bhūyāt //
GV00maitrs_pu:4252: ayaṃ so agnir yasmint somam indraḥ sutaṃ dadhe jaṭhare vāvaśānaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4253: sahasriyaṃ vājam atyaṃ na saptiṃ sasavānt saṃstūyase jātavedaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4254: agne divo arṇam achā jigāsy achā devaṃ ūciṣe dhiṣṇyā ye /
GV00maitrs_pu:4255: yāḥ parastād rocanāḥ sūryasya yāś cāvastād upatiṣṭhantā āpaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4256: agne yat te divi varcaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yat parvateṣv oṣadhīṣv apsu /
GV00maitrs_pu:4257: yenāntarikṣam urv ātatantha tveṣaḥ sa bhānur arṇavo nṛcakṣaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4259: juṣantāṃ havyam āhutam anamīvā iṣo mahīḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4261: iḍām agne puruḍaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
GV00maitrs_pu:4262: syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
GV00maitrs_pu:4264: cid asi tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda paricid asi tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda citaḥ stha paricitaḥ sthordhvaśritaḥ śrayadhvam //
GV00maitrs_pu:4267: saṃ vāṃ manāṃsi saṃ vratā sam u cittāny ākaram /
GV00maitrs_pu:4268: agne purīṣyādhipā bhava tvaṃ nā iṣam ūrjaṃ yajamānāya dhehi //
GV00maitrs_pu:4269: tvam agne purīṣyo rayimān puṣṭimaṃ asi /
GV00maitrs_pu:4270: śivāḥ kṛtvā diśaḥ sarvāḥ svaṃ yonim ihāsadaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4272: māteva putraṃ pṛthivī purīṣyam agniṃ sve yonā abhār ukhā /
GV00maitrs_pu:4273: tāṃ viśvair devair ṛtubhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ prajāpatir viśvakarmā vimuñcatu //MS_2,7.11//
GV00maitrs_pu:4274: asunvantam ayajamānam icha stenasyetyām anvihi taskarasya /
GV00maitrs_pu:4275: anyam asmad icha sā ta ityā namo devi nirṛte tubhyam astu //
GV00maitrs_pu:4276: namaḥ su te nirṛte tigmatejo 'yasmayaṃ vicṛtā bandham etam /
GV00maitrs_pu:4277: yamena tvaṃ yamyā saṃvidānottame nāke adhi rohayainam //
GV00maitrs_pu:4280: yaṃ te devī nirṛtir ābabandha pāśaṃ grīvāsv avicartyam /
GV00maitrs_pu:4281: taṃ te viṣyāmy āyuṣo nu madhye 'thā jīvaḥ pitum addhi pramuktaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4282: yad asya pāre rajaso mahaś citraṃ jyotir ajāyata /
GV00maitrs_pu:4283: tan naḥ parṣad ati dviṣo 'gne vaiśvānara //
GV00maitrs_pu:4285: niveśanaḥ saṃgamano vasūnāṃ viśvā rūpāṇy abhicaṣṭe śacībhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4286: deva iva savitā satyadharmendro na tasthau samare pathīnām //
GV00maitrs_pu:4287: yena devā jyotiṣordhvā udāyan yenādityā vasavo yena rudrāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4288: yenāṅgiraso mahimānam ānaśus tena yantu yajamānāḥ svasti //
GV00maitrs_pu:4289: pūṣā yunaktu savitā yunaktu bṛhaspatir vo yunaktu /
GV00maitrs_pu:4291: sīrā yuñjanti kavayo yugā vi tanvate pṛthak /
GV00maitrs_pu:4293: yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanota kṛte yonau vapateha bījam /
GV00maitrs_pu:4294: girā ca śruṣṭiḥ sabharā asan no nedīyā it sṛṇyaḥ pakvam āyat //
GV00maitrs_pu:4296: ud id vapatu gām aviṃ prasthāvad rathavāhanaṃ prapharvyaṃ ca pīvarīm //
GV00maitrs_pu:4298: śunaṃ suphālā vitudantu bhūmiṃ śunaṃ kīnāśo abhyetu vāhaiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4299: śunāsīrā haviṣā tośamānā supippalā oṣadhīḥ kartanāsme //
GV00maitrs_pu:4301: śunaṃ naro lāṅgalenānaḍudbhir bhagaḥ phālaiḥ sīrapatir marudbhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4302: parjanyo bijam īrayāno dhinotu śunāsīrā kṛṇutaṃ dhānyaṃ naḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4304: bhūmir iyam ṛtviyavatī tāṃ phālā upajighnatu //
GV00maitrs_pu:4305: ghṛtena sītā madhunā samajyatāṃ viśvair devair anumatā marudbhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4306: ūrjo bhāgaṃ madhumat pinvamānāsmānt sīte payasābhyāvavṛtsva //
GV00maitrs_pu:4307: ud yojanam antaryāmam īṣāṃ khṛgalyaṃ śavam /
GV00maitrs_pu:4308: aṣṭrāṃ tāḍaṃ pratīnāhā ubhe maṇḍūkyau yuje //
GV00maitrs_pu:4309: udasthād gojid aśvajid dhiraṇyajit sūnṛtayā parīvṛtaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4310: ekacakreṇa savitā rathenorjo bhāgaṃ pṛthivyā yāty āpṛṇan //
GV00maitrs_pu:4312: sasūtim indra sagdhitim ūrjaṃ sapītim utkṛṣe //
GV00maitrs_pu:4314: sarveṣāṃ vidma vo nāma vāhāḥ kīlālapeśasaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4315: vimucyadhvam aghnyā devayānā atāriṣṭa tamasas pāram asya /
GV00maitrs_pu:4318: yā oṣadhayaḥ prathamajā devebhyas triyugaṃ purā /
GV00maitrs_pu:4319: manve nu babhrūṇām ahaṃ śataṃ dhāmāni sapta ca //
GV00maitrs_pu:4320: śataṃ vo amba dhāmāni sahasram uta vo ruhaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4321: athā śatakrato yūyam imaṃ me agadaṃ kṛta //
GV00maitrs_pu:4324: oṣadhīr iti mātaras tad vo devīr upabruve /
GV00maitrs_pu:4326: aśvatthe vo niveśanaṃ parṇe vo vasatiḥ kṛtā /
GV00maitrs_pu:4327: gobhājā it kilāsatha yat sanavātha pūruṣam //
GV00maitrs_pu:4328: yad oṣadhayaḥ saṃgachante rājānaḥ samitā iva /
GV00maitrs_pu:4330: niṣkṛtir nāma vo mātāthā tvam asi saṃkṛtiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4331: sarāḥ patatriṇīḥ sthana yad āmayati niṣkṛta //
GV00maitrs_pu:4334: yad imā vājayann aham oṣadhīr hasta ādadhe /
GV00maitrs_pu:4335: ātmā yakṣmasya naśyati purā jīvagṛbho yathā //
GV00maitrs_pu:4337: uñ śuṣmā oṣadhīnāṃ gāvo goṣṭhād iverate /
GV00maitrs_pu:4339: ati viśvāḥ pariṣṭhāḥ stena iva vrajam akramuḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4340: oṣadhayaḥ prācucyavur yat kiṃca tanvo rapaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4341: yās ta āviviśur ātmānaṃ yā ātasthuḥ paruḥparuḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4342: tās te yakṣmaṃ vibādhantām ugro madhyamaśīr iva //
GV00maitrs_pu:4344: sākaṃ vātasya dhrājyā sākaṃ naśya nihākayā //
GV00maitrs_pu:4345: anyā vo anyām avatv anyānyasyā upāvata /
GV00maitrs_pu:4346: tāḥ sarvāḥ saṃvidānā oṣadhayaḥ prāvata vācaṃ me //
GV00maitrs_pu:4347: yāḥ phalinīr yā aphalā akośā yāś ca kośinīḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4350: yaṃ jīvam aśnavāmahe na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4351: divaṃ brūmo nakṣatrāṇi bhūmiṃ yakṣāṇi parvatān /
GV00maitrs_pu:4352: samudrān nadyo veśantāṃs te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4353: brūmo rājānaṃ varuṇaṃ dhātāram uta pūṣaṇam /
GV00maitrs_pu:4354: tvaṣṭāram agrīyaṃ brūmas te no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //MS_2,7.13//
GV00maitrs_pu:4356: mā no hiṃsīj janitā yaḥ pṛthivyā yo divaṃ satyadharmā vyānaṭ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4357: yaś cāpaś candrāḥ prathamo jajāna kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
GV00maitrs_pu:4360: agne yañ śukraṃ yac candraṃ yat pūtaṃ yac ca yajñiyam /
GV00maitrs_pu:4362: iṣam ūrjam aham ita ādi ghṛtasya dhārāṃ mahiṣasya yonim /
GV00maitrs_pu:4363: ā no goṣu viśatv oṣadhīṣu jahāmi sedim anirām amīvām //
GV00maitrs_pu:4366: agne tava śravo vayo mahi bhrājanty arcayo vibhāvaso /
GV00maitrs_pu:4367: bṛhadbhāno śavasā vājam ukthyaṃ dadhāsi dāśuṣe kave //
GV00maitrs_pu:4369: putro mātarā vicarann upāvasy obhe pṛṇāsi rodasī //
GV00maitrs_pu:4370: irajyann agne prathayasva jantubhir asme rāyo amartya /
GV00maitrs_pu:4371: sa darśatasya vapuṣo virājasi pṛṇakṣi sānasiṃ rayim //
GV00maitrs_pu:4372: ūrjo napāj jātavedaḥ suśastibhir mandasva dhītibhir hitaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4373: tva eṣaḥ saṃdadhur bhūrivarpasaś citrotayo vāmajātāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4375: ṛtāvānaṃ mahiṣaṃ viśvadarśatam agniṃ sumnāya dadhire puro janāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4376: śrutkarṇaṃ saprathastamaṃ tvā girā daivaṃ mānuṣā yujā //
GV00maitrs_pu:4377: iṣkartāram adhvarasya pracetasaṃ kṣayantaṃ rādhaso mahaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4378: rātiṃ vāmasya subhagāṃ mahīm iṣaṃ dadhāsi sānasiṃ kratum //
GV00maitrs_pu:4379: āpyāyasva sametu te viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam /
GV00maitrs_pu:4381: saṃ te payāṃsi sam u yantu vājāḥ saṃ vṛṣṇyāny abhimātiṣāhaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4382: āpyāyamāno āmṛtāya soma divi śravāṃsy uttamāni dhiṣva //MS_2,7.14//
GV00maitrs_pu:4383: brahma jajñānaṃ prathamaṃ purastād vi sīmataḥ suruco vena āvaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4384: sa budhnyā upamā asya viṣṭhāḥ sataś ca yonim asataś ca vivaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4385: hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patir eka āsīt /
GV00maitrs_pu:4386: sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utemāṃ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
GV00maitrs_pu:4387: adbhyaḥ saṃbhṛtaḥ pṛthivyā rasāc ca viśvakarmaṇaḥ samavartatādhi /
GV00maitrs_pu:4388: tasya tvaṣṭā vidadhad rūpam eti tat puruṣasya devam ājānam agre //
GV00maitrs_pu:4391: namo astu sarpebhyo ye keca pṛthivīm anu /
GV00maitrs_pu:4392: ye antarikṣe ye divi tebhyaḥ sarpebhyo namaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4395: ye amī rocane divo ye vā sūryasya raśmiṣu /
GV00maitrs_pu:4396: ye apsu ṣadāṃsi cakrire tebhyaḥ sarpebhyo namaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4397: kṛṇuṣva pājaḥ prasitiṃ na pṛthvīṃ yāhi rājevāmavaṃ ibhena /

GV00maitrs_pu:4572: chando 'naḍvān vayaḥ paṅktiś chando dhenur vayo jagatī chando basto vayo yuvalaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:4573: chando vṛṣṇir vayo viśālaṃ chandaḥ puruṣo vayas tandraṃ chandaḥ siṃho vayaś chadiś
GV00maitrs_pu:4577: rājñy asi prācī dig virāḍ asi dakṣiṇā dik samrāḍ asi pratīcī dik svarāḍ asy udīcī
GV00maitrs_pu:4578: dig adhipatny asy ūrdhvā dig āyur me pāhi prāṇaṃ me pāhy apānaṃ me pāhi vyānaṃ me
GV00maitrs_pu:4579: pāhi cakṣur me pāhi śrotraṃ me pāhi mano me pinva vācaṃ me jinvātmānaṃ me pāhi jyotir
GV00maitrs_pu:4580: me yacha mā chandaḥ pramā chandaḥ pratimā chando 'srīvīś chandaḥ paṅktiś chanda uṣṇihā
GV00maitrs_pu:4581: chando gāyatrī chandas triṣṭup chando jagatī chando 'nuṣṭup chando virāṭ chando bṛhatī
GV00maitrs_pu:4582: chandaḥ pṛthivī chando 'ntarikṣaṃ chando dyauś chando nakṣatrāṇi chandaḥ samā chandaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:4583: kṛṣiś chando vāk chando manaś chando gauś chando 'śvaś chando 'jā chando hiraṇyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:4584: chando 'gnir devatā vāto devatā sūryo devatā candramā devatā vasavo devatā rudrā
GV00maitrs_pu:4585: devatādityā devatā maruto devatendro devatā varuṇo devatā bṛhaspatir devatā viśve
GV00maitrs_pu:4586: devā devatā mūrdhāsi rāḍ dhruvāsi dharuṇā dhartry asi dharaṇy āyuṣe tvā varcase tvā
GV00maitrs_pu:4587: kṛṣyai tvā kṣemāya tvā yantrī rāḍ yantry asi yamanī dhartry asi dharitrīṣe tvorje
GV00maitrs_pu:4591: āśus trivṛd bhāntaḥ pañcadaśo vyomā saptadaśaḥ pratūrtir aṣṭādaśas tapo navadaśo
GV00maitrs_pu:4592: 'bhīvartaḥ saviṃśo dharuṇa ekaviṃśo varco dvāviṃśaḥ saṃbharaṇas trayoviṃśo yoniś
GV00maitrs_pu:4593: caturviṃśo garbhāḥ pañcaviṃśa ojas triṇavo virāṭ triṃśaḥ kratur ekatriṃśo vidhṛtir
GV00maitrs_pu:4594: dvātriṃśaḥ pratiṣṭhā trayastriṃśo bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ catustriṃśo nākaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśo
GV00maitrs_pu:4596: agner bhāgo 'si dīkṣāyā ādhipatyaṃ brahma spṛtaṃ trivṛt stoma indrasya bhāgo 'si
GV00maitrs_pu:4597: viṣṇor ādhipatyaṃ kṣatraṃ spṛtaṃ pañcadaśaḥ stomo nṛcakṣasāṃ bhāgo 'si dhātur ādhipatyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:4598: janitraṃ spṛtaṃ saptadaśaḥ stomo mitrasya bhāgo 'si varuṇasyādhipatyaṃ divo vṛṣṭir
GV00maitrs_pu:4599: vātaḥ spṛta ekaviṃśaḥ stomo 'dityā bhāgo 'si pūṣṇa ādhipatyam ojaḥ spṛtaṃ triṇavaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:4600: stomo vasūnāṃ bhāgo 'si rudrāṇām ādhipatyaṃ catuṣpāt spṛtaṃ caturviṃśaḥ stoma ādityānāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:4601: bhāgo 'si marutām ādhipatyaṃ garbhāḥ spṛtāḥ pañcaviṃśaḥ stomaḥ savitur bhāgo si bṛhaspater
GV00maitrs_pu:4602: ādhipatyaṃ samīcīr diśaḥ spṛtāś catuṣṭomaḥ stomo yavānāṃ bhāgo 'sy ayavānām ādhipatyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:4603: prajāḥ spṛtāś catuścatvāriṃśaḥ stoma ṛbhūṇāṃ bhāgo 'si viśveṣāṃ devānām ādhipatyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:4605: ekayāstuvata prajā adhīyanta prajānāṃ patir adhipatir āsīt tisṛbhir astuvata brahmāsṛjyata
GV00maitrs_pu:4606: brahmaṇaspatir adhipatir āsīt pañcabhir astuvata bhūtāny asṛjyanta bhūtānāṃ patir
GV00maitrs_pu:4607: adhipatir āsīt saptabhir astuvata saptaṛṣayo 'sṛjyanta dhātādhipatir āsīn navabhir
GV00maitrs_pu:4608: astuvata pitaro 'sṛjyantāditir adhipatir āsīd ekādaśabhir astuvatārtavā asṛjyanta
GV00maitrs_pu:4609: ṛtavo 'dhipataya āsaṃs trayodaśabhir astuvata māsā asṛjyanta saṃvatsaro 'dhipatir
GV00maitrs_pu:4610: āsīt pañadaśabhir astuvata kṣatram asṛjyatendro 'dhipatir āsīt saptadaśabhir astuvata
GV00maitrs_pu:4611: grāmyāḥ paśavo 'sṛjyanta bṛhaspatir adhipatir āsīn navadaśabhir astuvata śūdrāryā
GV00maitrs_pu:4612: asṛjyetām ahorātre adhipatnī āstām ekaviṃśatyāstuvataikaśapham asṛjyata varuṇo 'dhipatir
GV00maitrs_pu:4613: āsīt trayoviṃśatyāstuvata kṣudrāḥ paśavo 'sṛjyanta pūṣādhipatir āsīt pañcaviṃśatyāstuvatāraṇyāḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:4614: paśavo 'sṛjyanta vāyur adhipatir āsīt saptaviṃśatyāstuvata vanaspatayo 'sṛjyanta
GV00maitrs_pu:4615: somo 'dhipatir āsīn navaviṃśatyāstuvata dyāvāpṛthivī vyaitāṃ vasavo rudrā anuvyāyaṃs
GV00maitrs_pu:4616: ta u evādhipataya āsann ekatriṃśatāstuvata prajā asṛjyanta yavāś cāyavāś cādhipataya
GV00maitrs_pu:4617: āsaṃs trayastriṃśatāstuvata bhūtāny aśāmyan prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhy adhipatir āsīt //MS_2,8.6 //
GV00maitrs_pu:4618: agne jātān praṇudā naḥ sapatnān praty ajātān jātavedo nudasva /
GV00maitrs_pu:4619: adhi no brūhi sumanā aheḍañ śarmaṃs te syāma trivarūthā udbhau //
GV00maitrs_pu:4620: sahasā jātān praṇudā naḥ sapatnān praty ajātān jātavedo nudasva /
GV00maitrs_pu:4621: adhi no brūhi sumanasyamāno vayaṃ syāma praṇudā naḥ sapatnān //
GV00maitrs_pu:4622: catuścatvāriṃśī stomo varco draviṇaṃ ṣoḍaśī stoma ojo draviṇam //
GV00maitrs_pu:4623: agneḥ purīṣam asy apso nāma tāṃ tvā viśve abhigṛṇantu devāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4624: stomapṛṣṭhā ghṛtavatīha sīda prajāvad asme draviṇāyajasva //
GV00maitrs_pu:4625: tayā devatayāṅgirasvad druvā sīdaivaś chando varivaś chanda āchac chando manaś chandaḥ

GV00maitrs_pu:4629: prachac chandaḥ saṃyac chando viyac chando bṛhac chando rathantaraṃ chando nikāyaṃ

GV00maitrs_pu:4633: raśminā kṣayāya kṣayaṃ jinva pretyā dharmaṇe dharma jinvānvityā dive divaṃ jinva

GV00maitrs_pu:4636: vasūn jinva praketena rudrebhyo rudrān jinva suditinādityebhya ādityān jinva tantunā
GV00maitrs_pu:4637: prajābhyaḥ prajā jinvaujasā pitṛbhyaḥ pitṝn jinva pṛtanāṣāhā paśubhyaḥ paśūn jinva

GV00maitrs_pu:4639: prāṇaṃ jinva dharuṇenāpānāyāpānaṃ jinva saṃsarpeṇa cakṣuṣe cakṣur jinva vayodhasādhītāyādhītaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:4640: jinva trivṛtā trivṛte trivṛj jinva pravṛtā pravṛte pravṛj jinva savṛtā savṛte savṛj
GV00maitrs_pu:4641: jinvānūvṛtānuvṛte 'nūvṛj jinva viroheṇa virohāya virohaṃ jinva praroheṇa prarohāya
GV00maitrs_pu:4642: prarohaṃ jinva saṃroheṇa saṃrohāya saṃrohaṃ jinvānūroheṇānūrohāyānūrohaṃ jinva vasukena
GV00maitrs_pu:4643: vasukāya vasukaṃ jinva veṣaśriyā veṣaśriyai veṣaśrīṃ jinva vasyaṣṭyā vasyaṣṭyai vasyaṣṭiṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:4645: rājñy asi prācī dig vasavas te devā adhipatayo 'gnir hetīnāṃ pratidhartā trivṛt tvā
GV00maitrs_pu:4646: stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ śrayatv ājyam uktham avyathāyai stabhnotu rathantaraṃ sāma pratiṣṭhityā
GV00maitrs_pu:4647: antarikṣa ṛṣayas tvā prathamajā deveṣu divo mātrayā variṇā prathantu vidhartā cāyam

GV00maitrs_pu:4649: virāḍ asi dakṣiṇā dig rudrās te devā adhipataya indro hetīnāṃ pratidhartā pañcadaśas

GV00maitrs_pu:4652: adhipatiś ca te tvā sarve saṃvidānā nākasya pṛṣṭhe svarge loke yajamānaṃ ca sādayantu

GV00maitrs_pu:4656: vidhartā cāyam adhipatiś ca te tvā sarve saṃvidānā nākasya pṛṣṭhe svarge loke yajamānaṃ

GV00maitrs_pu:4658: tvā stomaḥ pṛthivyāṃ śrayatu niṣkevalyam uktham avyathāyai stabhnotu vairājaṃ sāma

GV00maitrs_pu:4667: ayaṃ puro harikeśaḥ sūryaraśmis tasya rathakṛtsnaś ca rathaujāśca senānīgrāmaṇyau

GV00maitrs_pu:4670: viśvakarmā tasya rathasvanaś ca rathecitraś ca senānīgrāmaṇyau menakā ca sahajanyā

GV00maitrs_pu:4681: prācyā tvā diśā sādayāmy agninā devena devatayā gāyatreṇa chandasāgneḥ śirā upadadhāmi

GV00maitrs_pu:4718: pṛṣṭhe 'ntarikṣaṃ yachāntarikṣaṃ dṛṃhāntarikṣaṃ mā hiṃsīr antarikṣān mā pāhi viśvasmai
GV00maitrs_pu:4719: prāṇāyāpānāya vyānāyodānāya pratiṣṭhāyai caritrāya vāyuṣ ṭvābhipātu mahyā svastyā
GV00maitrs_pu:4720: chardiṣā śaṃtamena parameṣṭhī tvā sādayatu divaḥ pṛṣṭhe vyacasvatīṃ prathasvatīṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:4721: bhāsvatīṃ raśmīvatīm ā yā divaṃ bhāsyā pṛthivīm orv antariksaṃ divaṃ yacha divaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:4722: dṛṃha divaṃ mā hiṃsīr divo mā pāhi viśvasmai prāṇāyāpānāya vyānāyodānāya pratiṣṭhāyai
GV00maitrs_pu:4723: caritrāya sūryas tvābhipātu mahyā svastyā chardiṣā śaṃtamena //
GV00maitrs_pu:4724: prothad aśvo na yavase 'viṣyan yadā mahaḥ saṃvaraṇād vyasthāt /
GV00maitrs_pu:4725: ād asya vāto anuvāti śocir adha smā te vrajanaṃ kṛṣṇam astu //
GV00maitrs_pu:4726: āyoṣ ṭvā sadane sādayāmi samudrasyodmann avataś chāyāyāṃ namaḥ samudrāya namaḥ samudrasya
GV00maitrs_pu:4727: cakṣase sahasrasya māsi sahasrasya pramāsi sahasrasya pratimāsi sahasrasya saṃmāsi

GV00maitrs_pu:4730: ca o arbudaṃ ca nyarbudaṃ ca samudraś ca madhyaṃ cāntaś ca parārdhaś cemā me agnā
GV00maitrs_pu:4731: iṣṭakā dhenavaḥ santu ṣaṣṭiḥ sahasram ayutam akṣīyamāṇā ṛtuṣṭhāḥ stha ṛtāvṛdho ghṛtaścuto
GV00maitrs_pu:4732: madhuścutā ūrjasvatīḥ payasvatīḥ svadhāyinīḥ kulāyinīs tā me agnā iṣṭakā dhenavaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:4733: santu virājo nāma kāmadughā amutrāmuṣmiṃl loke //MS_2,8.14 //
GV00maitrs_pu:4735: ā tvā vahantu harayaḥ sucetasaḥ śvetair aśvair iha ketumadbhiḥ /

GV00maitrs_pu:4737: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ cāsurāṇāṃ ca pūrvajam /

GV00maitrs_pu:4762: namas te astu dhanvane bāhubhyām uta te namaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4763: yā te rudra śivā tanūr aghorāpāpakāśinī /
GV00maitrs_pu:4766: yām iṣuṃ giriśanta haste bibharṣy astave /
GV00maitrs_pu:4767: śivāṃ giriśa tāṃ kuru mā hiṃsīḥ puruṣaṃ jagat //
GV00maitrs_pu:4769: yathā naḥ sarvā ij janaḥ saṃgame sumanā asat //
GV00maitrs_pu:4771: ahīṃś ca sarvān jambhayant sarvāś ca yātudhānyo 'dharācīḥ parāsuva //
GV00maitrs_pu:4772: asau yas tāmro aruṇa uta babhruḥ sumaṅgalaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4773: ye ceme abhito rudrā dikṣu śritāḥ sahasraśo 'vaiṣāṃ heḍa īmahe //
GV00maitrs_pu:4776: utainaṃ viśvā bhūtāni sa dṛṣṭo mṛḍayātu naḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4778: atho ye asya satvāna idaṃ tebhyo 'karaṃ namaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4780: ubhābhyām uta te namo bāhubhyāṃ tava dhanvane //
GV00maitrs_pu:4781: pramuñca dhanvanas tvam ubhayor ārtnyor jyām /
GV00maitrs_pu:4782: yāś ca te hastā iṣavaḥ parā tā bhagavo vapa //
GV00maitrs_pu:4785: praśīrya śalyānāṃ mukhaṃ śivo naḥ sumanā bhava //
GV00maitrs_pu:4786: vijyaṃ dhanuḥ kapardino viśalyo bāṇavaṃ uta /
GV00maitrs_pu:4787: aneśann asya yā iṣava ābhūr asya niṣaṅgathiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4788: pari te dhanvano hetir asmān vṛṇaktu viśvataḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4789: atho ya iṣudhis tavāre asmin nidhehi tam //
GV00maitrs_pu:4790: yā te hetir mīḍhuṣṭama śivaṃ babhūva te dhanuḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:4792: namo hiraṇyabāhave senānye diśāṃ ca pataye namo namo vṛkṣebhyo harikeśebhyaḥ paśūnāṃ

GV00maitrs_pu:4889: tebhyo daśa prācīrdaśa dakṣiṇā daśa pratīcīr daśodīcīr daśordhvās tebhyo namo astu
GV00maitrs_pu:4890: te no mṛḍantu te yaṃ dviṣmo yaś ca no dveṣṭi tam eṣāṃ jambhe dadhmo namo astu rudrebhyo

GV00maitrs_pu:4892: daśordhvās tebhyo namo astu te no mṛḍantu te yaṃ dviṣmo yaś ca no dveṣṭi tam eṣāṃ

GV00maitrs_pu:4911: upa jmann upa vetase 'vatara nadīṣv ā /

GV00maitrs_pu:4913: semaṃ no yajñaṃ pāvakavarṇaṃ śivaṃ kṛdhi //
GV00maitrs_pu:4915: anyāṃs te asmat tapantu hetayaḥ pāvako asmabhyaṃ śivo bhava //
GV00maitrs_pu:4916: agne pāvaka rociṣā sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:4917: pāvakayā yaś citayantyā kṛpā kṣāman ruruca uṣaso na ketunā /
GV00maitrs_pu:4918: ā yo ghṛṇe na tatṛṣāṇo ajaras tūrvan na yāmann etaśasya nū raṇe //

GV00maitrs_pu:4931: agnis tigmena śociṣā yāsad viśvaṃ ny atriṇam /

GV00maitrs_pu:4935: sa āśiṣā draviṇam ichamānaḥ prathamachad avaraṃ āviveśa //

GV00maitrs_pu:4937: manīṣiṇo manasā pṛchated u tad yad adhyatiṣṭhad bhuvanāni dhārayan //

GV00maitrs_pu:5514: yajñayaśasenārpayeyam iti yajuruttamāni kuryād yajamānaṃ vā etad yajñayaśasenārpayaty
GV00maitrs_pu:5515: āhutīnāṃ vā abhikrāntyā yajamāna ṛdhnoti yaṃ kāmayeta ṛdhnuyād iti tasya sakṛt sarvāṇy
GV00maitrs_pu:5516: anudrutya juhuyād ṛdhnoty atha yaṃ kāmayeta pāpīyānt syād iti tasya nānā juhuyāt
GV00maitrs_pu:5517: pāpīyān bhavaty ṛcā stomaṃ samardhayety āha samṛddhyā eva gāyatreṇa rathantaram itīyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5518: vai gāyatrīyaṃ rathantaram asau bṛhad anayor vā eṣa lokayor vyāptyā antataḥ kriyate
GV00maitrs_pu:5519: 'ṣṭau vā etāni yajūṃṣy aṣṭākṣarā gāyatry akṣaraśo vā etad gāyatrīṃ prīṇāty atha yad
GV00maitrs_pu:5520: āhutir navamī tena trivṛto yajñamukhān naity atha yad ekām āhutim aṣṭābhir yajurbhir
GV00maitrs_pu:5521: juhoti tasmād ekasmai sate bahavo baliṃ haranti bahavo hāsya balihṛto bhavanti yajuruttamāni
GV00maitrs_pu:5522: bhavanti brahma vai yajur brahmaṇi vā etad antato yajñasya yajamānaḥ pratitiṣṭhati //MS_3,1.1 //
GV00maitrs_pu:5523: sāvitrair abhrim ādatte prasūtyai caturbhir ādatte catvāri vai chandāṃsi chandobhir
GV00maitrs_pu:5524: evādatte 'tho brahma vai chandāṃsi brahmaṇaivādatta iyaṃ vai gāyatry antarikṣaṃ triṣṭub
GV00maitrs_pu:5525: dyaur jagatī diśo 'nuṣṭup savitṛprasūto vā etad ebhyo lokebhyaś chandobhir digbhyaś
GV00maitrs_pu:5526: cāgniṃ saṃbharati yatra vā ado 'gnir hotrād bhīṣāpākrāmat sa sarveṣu bhuteṣv avasad
GV00maitrs_pu:5527: yāṃ vanaspatiṣv avasat tāṃ veṇā avasat sa yatra niradahat tāni kalmāṣāṇy abhavan
GV00maitrs_pu:5528: yena samacarat tat suṣiraṃ yatrāvasat tat parva yad vaiṇavy abhrir bhavati svenaivainaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5529: yoninā saṃbharati yo vai vanaspatīnāṃ phalagrahitamaḥ sa eṣāṃ vīryavattamo veṇur
GV00maitrs_pu:5530: vai vanaspatīnāṃ phalagrahitamaḥ sa eṣāṃ vīryavattamo 'nnaṃ vai phalam annam arko
GV00maitrs_pu:5531: 'rko 'gnir arkeṇa vā etad annam arkam agniṃ saṃbharati vyāmamātrī kāryaitāvad vai
GV00maitrs_pu:5532: puruṣe vīryaṃ vīryasaṃmitā kriyate 'tho etāvān vai puruṣe mahimā mahimno 'varuddhyay
GV00maitrs_pu:5533: aratnimātrī kāryā yajñapuruṣāsaṃmitā prādeśamātrī kāryā viṣṇunā yajñena saṃmitobhyataḥkṣṇut
GV00maitrs_pu:5534: kāryobhayasyānnādyasyāvaruddhyay anyataḥkṣṇut kāryā anyataḥkṣṇud dhi phālas tāvantam
GV00maitrs_pu:5535: arkaṃ karoty annaṃ vā arko 'nnādyasyāvaruddhyay audumbarī kāryorg vā udumbara ūrjo
GV00maitrs_pu:5536: 'varuddhyay aparimitā kāryāparimitasyāvaruddhyai ya eva kaśca vṛkṣaḥ phalagrahis
GV00maitrs_pu:5538: aśvena vai devā agre vijitimṃ vyajayanta yad aśvena yanti vijityay agnir vai yatrayatrāgachat
GV00maitrs_pu:5539: taṃ prajāpatir anvapaśyat prājāpatyo 'śvo yad aśvena yanty agner evānukśātyai prajāptir
GV00maitrs_pu:5540: vā agniṃ saṃbhariṣyant sa ebhyo lokebhyo 'śvaṃ nirmāya digbhyaś cāgniṃ samabharad
GV00maitrs_pu:5541: yad āha divi te janma paramam antarikṣe tava nābhiḥ pṛthivyām adhi yonir id iti yathādevataṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5542: vā etad ebhyo lokebhyo 'śvaṃ nirmāya digbhyaś cāgniṃ saṃbharati yuñjāthāṃ rāsabhaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5543: yuvam ity āha yuktyā eva gardabhena saṃbharaty eṣa hi paśūnām anupajīvanītatamo 'gnir
GV00maitrs_pu:5544: vā etasyāgre sṛṣṭasya yone reto niradahat tasmād eṣa samāvad anyaiḥ paśubhī reto
GV00maitrs_pu:5545: dhatte 'tha kaniṣṭho 'śvaṃ pūrvaṃ nayanti gardabham aparaṃ pāpavasīyasasya vyāvṛttyai
GV00maitrs_pu:5546: tasmāñ śreyāṃsaṃ pūrvaṃ yantaṃ pāpīyān paścād anveti yadi kāmayeta pāpavasīyasaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5547: syād iti gardabhaṃ pūrvaṃ nayeyur aparam aśvam etena vai vipūjanaḥ saurākiḥ pāpavasīyasaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5548: cakāra tat pāpavasīyasam evaitena karoti yogeyoge tavastaram ity ūtimatyā vājavatyā
GV00maitrs_pu:5549: yanty annaṃ vai vājo gātur ūtir annāya ca khalu vai gātave cāgniś cīyate yad ūtimatyā
GV00maitrs_pu:5550: vājavatyā yanti annasya ca gātoś cāvaruddhyai bhavati vā eṣa yo 'gniṃ cinute sarvo
GV00maitrs_pu:5551: vai bhavata irasyati vajrī vā eṣa prājāpatyo yad aśvo yad āha pratūrvann ehy avakrāmann
GV00maitrs_pu:5552: aśastīr iti vajreṇa vā etad aśastīr arātīyantam avakrāmati raudrā vai paśavo 'gnī
GV00maitrs_pu:5553: rudro yad rudrāt paśūn aniryācyāgniṃ cinvīta rudro 'sya paśūn abhimānukaḥ syād yad
GV00maitrs_pu:5554: āha rudrasya gāṇapatyān mayobhūr ehīti rudrād vā etat paśūn niryācyāgniṃ cinute 'ghātuko
GV00maitrs_pu:5555: 'sya paśupatiḥ paśūn bhavaty urv antarikṣaṃ vīhīty āhaiṣāṃ lokānāṃ vidhṛtyai rakṣāṃsi
GV00maitrs_pu:5556: vā etau jighāṃsanty agniṃ saṃbhariṣyantau yad āha svastigavyūtir abhayāni kṛṇvann
GV00maitrs_pu:5557: iti svastim evābhyāmakaḥ purīṣaṃ vā agner āyatanam aṅgirasa etam agre samabharad
GV00maitrs_pu:5558: yad āhāgniṃ purīṣyam aṅgirasvad ābhareti sāyatanam evainaṃ devatābhiḥ saṃbharati
GV00maitrs_pu:5559: yena puruṣeṇa saṃgacheta tam abhimantrayetāgniṃ purīṣyam aṅgirasvad achemā iti vājam
GV00maitrs_pu:5560: eva tena tasmād vṛṅkte prajāpataye procyāgniś cetavyā ity āhur yataḥ sūryasyodayanaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5561: tato valmīkavapām apaghnan brūyād agniṃ purīṣyam aṅgirasvad bhariṣyāmā itīyaṃ vai
GV00maitrs_pu:5562: prajāpatis tasyā eṣa karṇo yad valmīkas tasmā eva procyāgniṃ cinute śṛṇvanti hainam
GV00maitrs_pu:5563: agniṃ cikyānam asā agnim aceṣṭeti tasmāt pāpīyāñ śreyasaḥ karṇa āha karṇaḥ karṇāyāha //MS_3,1.3 //
GV00maitrs_pu:5564: vīhīty : FN emended. Ed: vīhīty. cf. 2.7.2:75.8
GV00maitrs_pu:5566: anv agnir uṣasām agram akśad ity āhānukśātyā evāgatya vājy adhvānaṃ sarvā mṛdho vidhūnutā
GV00maitrs_pu:5567: iti mṛdha eva vyāsthataichad vā etaṃ prajāpatiḥ pūrvayarcāvindad uttarayaiṣīd evainaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5568: pūrvayarcāvidad uttarayā dyaus te pṛṣṭhaṃ pṛthivī sadhastham iti dyaur hy etasya
GV00maitrs_pu:5569: pṛṣṭhaṃ pṛthivī sadhastham ātmāntarikṣaṃ samudro yonir ity ātmā hy etasyāntarikṣaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5570: samudro yonir vikśāya cakṣuṣā tvam abhitiṣṭha pṛtanyata iti pṛtanyantam evābhitiṣṭhati
GV00maitrs_pu:5573: iti tam evābhitiṣṭhaty utkrāmety āhotkrāntyā eva yatra vai yajñasyānurūpaṃ kriyate
GV00maitrs_pu:5574: tad yajamāna ṛdhnoty utkrāmodakramīd ity anurūpaṃ vā etat kriyate yajñasyāvaruddhyai
GV00maitrs_pu:5575: kṛṣṇo vai bhūtvāgnir aśvaṃ prāviśat sa etad agachad yatra mṛgaśapho yad aśvasya pade
GV00maitrs_pu:5576: juhoty agnimaty eva juhoty āyatanavaty andho 'dhvaryuḥ syād yad anāyatane juhuyād
GV00maitrs_pu:5577: etad vai tad yad āhur mṛgaśapham arenvarāḍ iti manasvatībhyāṃ juhoti manasā hy āhutīr
GV00maitrs_pu:5578: āpyante triṣṭubbhyāṃ juhotīndriyasyāvaruddhyay annavatībhyāṃ juhoty annādyasyāvaruddhyai
GV00maitrs_pu:5579: gāyatryā parilikhaty asyā evainaṃ tena parigṛhṇāti triṣṭubhāntarikṣāt tenānuṣṭubhā
GV00maitrs_pu:5580: parilikhaty anuṣṭub vai sarvāṇi chandāṃsi paribhūs tasmād anuṣṭubhā parilikhati sāvitrair
GV00maitrs_pu:5581: abhrim ādatte prasūtyai dvābhyāṃ khanati dvipād yajamānaḥ pratiṣṭhityai śug vā atra
GV00maitrs_pu:5582: prajā ṛchati yatrāgniḥ khāyate cīyate vā yad āha śivaṃ prajābhyo 'hiṃsantam iti prajābhya
GV00maitrs_pu:5586: apāṃ pṛṣṭham asīty āhāpāṃ hy etat pṛṣṭhaṃ pṛṣṭhenaivainat pṛṣṭham akar yonir agner
GV00maitrs_pu:5587: iti yonir vā eṣo 'gner yat puṣkaraparṇaṃ nābhir vadhakaḥ sayonir eva sanābhiḥ saṃbhriyate
GV00maitrs_pu:5588: divo mātrayā variṇā prathasvety anayor evainam mātrayā variṇā prathayati śarma ca
GV00maitrs_pu:5589: stho varma ca sthā iti kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca puṣkaraparṇaṃ ca saṃstṛṇātīme evāsmā etad dyāvāpṛthivī
GV00maitrs_pu:5590: saṃstṛṇāti vyacasvatī saṃvasethām iti na vā etan manuṣyā yantum arhanty ābhyām evainaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5591: parigṛhṇāti kṛṣṇājinena saṃbharaty eṣa hi paśūnām anupajīvanīyatamo 'tho āraṇyān
GV00maitrs_pu:5592: eva paśūñ śucārpayati lomataḥ saṃbharaty ato vai kṛṣṇājinasya sadevaṃ yajñenaiva
GV00maitrs_pu:5593: yajñaṃ saṃbharati puṣkaraparṇena saṃbharati yonir vā eṣo 'gner yat puṣkaraparṇaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5594: svenaivainaṃ yoninā saṃbharati gāyatrībhir brāhmaṇasya saṃbharati gāyatro hi brāhmaṇas
GV00maitrs_pu:5595: triṣṭubhā rājanyasya traiṣṭubho hi rājanyo jagatībhir vaiśyasya jāgato hi vaiśyas
GV00maitrs_pu:5596: yaṃ kāmayeta ṛdhnuyād iti tasya gāyatrībhiś ca triṣṭubbhiś ca saṃbhared ṛdhnoti purīṣyo
GV00maitrs_pu:5597: 'si viśvaṃbharā atharvā tvā prathamo niramanthad agnā iti prajāpatir vā atharvā sa
GV00maitrs_pu:5598: etam agre 'manthat so 'janayat sva evainaṃ manthati sa janayati tisṛbhiḥ saṃbharati
GV00maitrs_pu:5599: trayo vā ime lokā ebhya evainaṃ lokebhyaḥ saṃbharati yajus turīyaṃ digbhya evainaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5600: tena saṃbharati purovātaṃ vai vātaṃ varṣam anupratitiṣṭhati varṣam anv oṣadhayā oṣadhīr
GV00maitrs_pu:5601: anu paśavaḥ paśūn anu manuṣyā etā vai pratiṣṭhās tā yajamāno 'varunddhe 'po devīr
GV00maitrs_pu:5602: upasṛjā madhumatīr ity āhauṣadhīnāṃ pratiṣṭhityai tāsām āsthānād ujjihatām oṣadhayaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:5603: supippalā iti tasmād etāsām āsthānād ujjihatām oṣadhayaḥ supippalāḥ saṃ te vāyur
GV00maitrs_pu:5604: mātariśvā dadhātv iti tasmād etasyā yat kṛṣyate yat khāyate tat saṃdhīyate yad ghṛtena
GV00maitrs_pu:5605: juhuyāñ śucemām arpayed atha yad apa upasṛjati śamayaty eva yo devānāṃ carasi prāṇathena
GV00maitrs_pu:5606: kasmai deva vaṣaḍ astu tubhyam iti ṣaḍ vā ṛtava ṛtuṣu vā etad vṛṣṭiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV00maitrs_pu:5607: tasmāt sarva ṛtavo vṛṣṭimantaḥ sujāto jyotiṣeti svargyam evainam akar vāso agne viśvarūpaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5608: saṃvyayasva vibhāvasā iti chandāṃsi vā agner vāsaś chandāṃsy eṣa vaste chandobhir
GV00maitrs_pu:5609: evainaṃ paridadāty āgāmukam enam asmiṃl loke vāso bhavaty anagno 'muṣmiṃl loke bhavati
GV00maitrs_pu:5610: ya evaṃ veda varuṇamenir vā eṣa etarhy ud u tiṣṭha svadhvarety ūrdhvām eva varuṇamenim
GV00maitrs_pu:5611: utsṛjati dvābhyām utsṛjati dvipād yajamānaḥ pratiṣṭhityai sa jāto garbho asi rodasyor
GV00maitrs_pu:5612: ity anayor vā eṣa garbha ābhyām eṣo 'dhijāyata ābhyām evainam adhijanayaty agne cārur
GV00maitrs_pu:5613: vibhṛtā oṣadhīṣv iti tasmāt sarvāsv oṣadhīṣv agniḥ pra mātṛbhyo adhi kanikradad gā
GV00maitrs_pu:5614: ity oṣadhayo vā etasya mātaras tābhyā evainam adhi pracyāvayataichad vā etaṃ prajāpatiḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:5616: sthiro bhava vīḍvaṅgā iti gardabha ādadhāti vīryam asmin dadhāti tasmāt sarveṣāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5617: paśūnāṃ gardabho vīryavattamo vīryaṃ hy asmin dadhātīśvaro vā eṣo 'ntarikṣasad bhūtvā
GV00maitrs_pu:5618: prajā hiṃsitor yad āha śivo bhava prajābhyā iti prajābhya evainaṃ śivam akar mā pādy
GV00maitrs_pu:5619: āyuṣaḥ purety āyur evāsmindadhāti samaṣṭyai vṛṣāgniṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ bharann iti vṛṣā hy
GV00maitrs_pu:5620: eṣa vṛṣaṇaṃ bharann apāṃ garbhaṃ samudriyam ity apāṃ hy eṣa garbhaḥ samudriyo 'gnā
GV00maitrs_pu:5621: āyāhi vītayā ity agninā vai mukhena devā imāṃl lokān abhyajayann agninā vā etan mukhena
GV00maitrs_pu:5622: yajamāna imāṃl lokān abhijayaty ṛtaṃ satyam ṛtaṃ satyam ṛte caiva satye ca pratitiṣṭhatīyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5623: vā ṛtam asau satyam anayor eva pratitiṣṭhaty ahar vā ṛtaṃ rātriḥ satyam ahorātrayor
GV00maitrs_pu:5624: eva pratitiṣṭhaty oṣadhayaḥ pratigṛbhṇītāgnim etam ity oṣadhīr evainaṃ samyañcaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5625: dadhāti puṣpavatīḥ supippalā ity oṣadhīr eva phalaṃ grāhayati tasmād oṣadhayaḥ śīrṣan
GV00maitrs_pu:5626: phalaṃ gṛhṇanti varuṇamenir vā eṣa etarhy upanaddho vi pājasā pṛthunā śośucānā ity
GV00maitrs_pu:5627: anurūpeṇaiva varuṇameniṃ viṣyati dvābhyāṃ viṣyati dvipād yajamānaḥ pratiṣṭhityay
GV00maitrs_pu:5628: āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuvā ity apa upasṛjaty āpo vā aśāntasya śamayitrikās tasmād apa
GV00maitrs_pu:5629: upasṛjati śāntyai tisṛbhir upasṛjati trivṛd dhy agnir varuṇamenir vā eṣa etarhi mitraḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:5630: saṃsṛjyā pṛthivīm iti mitreṇaiva varuṇameniṃ saṃsṛjati rudrāḥ saṃsṛjyā pṛthivīm ity
GV00maitrs_pu:5631: etā vā etām agre devatāḥ prajāpataye samasṛjaṃs tābhir evaināṃ saṃsṛjati pañcabhiḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:5632: saṃsṛjati pāṅkto yajño yāvān eva yajñas tam ālabdha //MS_3,1.6 //
GV00maitrs_pu:5635: makhasya śiro 'sīty āha yajño vai makhas tasya vā etañ śiro yad ukhā mukhato vā etad
GV00maitrs_pu:5636: yajñam ālabdha vasavas tvā kṛṇvantu gāyatreṇa chandaseti chandobhiś ca vā eṣā devatābhiś
GV00maitrs_pu:5637: ca kriyate chandobhiś caivaināṃ devatābhiś ca karoti dhruvāsi pṛthivy asīti chandasām
GV00maitrs_pu:5638: evaiṣāśīr adityā rāsnāsy aditiṣ ṭe bilaṃ gṛbhṇātv iti yajuṣā karoty ayajuṣā hi manuṣyāḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:5639: kurvanti vyāvṛttyai tāṃ putrebhyaḥ prāyachad aditiḥ śrapayān ity ādityā vā idaṃ smo
GV00maitrs_pu:5640: yan manuṣyāṃs tebhya evaināṃ saṃprādāt tryuddhiḥ kāryā trayo vā ime lokā eṣāṃ vā
GV00maitrs_pu:5641: eṣā lokānām ukhā pratimā kriyate 'ṣṭastanā kāryā gāyatryā rūpaṃ catustanā kāryādityā
GV00maitrs_pu:5642: dohāya dvistanā kāryāntarikṣaṃ vā ukhemau lokau stanau prattau ha vā imau lokau duhe
GV00maitrs_pu:5643: ya evaṃ veda vyāmamātrī kāryaitāvad vai puruṣe vīryaṃ vīryasaṃmitā kriyate 'tho etāvān
GV00maitrs_pu:5644: vai puruṣe mahimā mahimno 'varuddhayay aratnimātrī kāryā yajñapuruṣāsaṃmitā prādeśamātrī
GV00maitrs_pu:5645: kāryā viṣṇunā yajñena saṃmitātho prajāpater evānativādāya saptabhir dhūpayati sapta
GV00maitrs_pu:5646: vai śīrṣan prāṇāḥ śira etad yajñasya yajuṣā śīrṣan vā etat prāṇān dadhāti saptabhir
GV00maitrs_pu:5647: dhūpayati sapta vai chandasāṃsi chandobhir evaināṃ dhūpayaty atho brahma vai chandāṃsi
GV00maitrs_pu:5648: brahmaṇaivaināṃ dhūpayati vaiṣṇavaṃ vā etat pātraṃ tat svayā devatayā vyardhayati
GV00maitrs_pu:5649: yad anyābhir devatābhir dhūpayati yad āha viṣṇus tvā dhūpayatv aṅgirasvad iti svayaivainaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5650: devatayā samardhayaty asvaśakena dhūpayati vṛṣā hy aśvo vṛṣāgniḥ samṛddhyay atho
GV00maitrs_pu:5651: prājāpatyo vā aśvaḥ prājāpatyo 'gnis tasmād aśvaśakena dhūpayati sayonitvāya //MS_3,1.7 //
GV00maitrs_pu:5652: prajāpatir vā amanyata yo vā asyā agre vikhaniṣyaty ārtiṃ sa āriṣyatīti sa etad yajur
GV00maitrs_pu:5653: apaśyad aditiṣ ṭvā devī viśvadevyavatī pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvat khanatv avaṭetīyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5654: vā aditir devī viśvadevyavaty anayā vai sa tad asyām akhanad ahiṃsāyai na hi svaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:5655: svaṃ hinasti devānāṃ tvā patnīr devīr viśvadevyavatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvad

GV00maitrs_pu:5934: svayaiva devatayāthaiṣokhā pṛthivyā vā etad ojo vīryaṃ saṃbhriyata ojo vā etad vīryaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5935: madhyato 'gner dhīyate 'tho madhye jyotir eva cīyate yad riktām avekṣeta kṣodhuko
GV00maitrs_pu:5936: yajamānaḥ syād atha yat pūrṇām avekṣate tathā hākṣodhuko bhavati sikatābhiḥ pūrayitavyāgner
GV00maitrs_pu:5937: vā etad vaiśvānarasya bhasma yat sikatāḥ svenaivaināṃ bhasmanā prīṇāti dadhnaḥ pūrayitavyorg
GV00maitrs_pu:5938: vai dadhy ūrjam evāvarunddhe hṛtasya pūrayitavyaiṣā vā agneḥ priyā tanūr yad ghṛtaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5939: priyayaivainaṃ tanvā samardhayati madhoḥ pūrayitavyā hāsya prajāyāṃ madhavyo jāyate
GV00maitrs_pu:5940: vyṛdhyaindriyāṇi vai paśuśīrṣāṇy ayajñiyāny amedhyāni yac chidreṣu hiraṇyaśakalāny
GV00maitrs_pu:5941: apy asyatīndriyeṇaivaināni vīryeṇa samardhayati medhyāny enāni yajñiyāni karoty ardhaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5942: vai puruṣaḥ sahasrasya yachanty ardham itare paśavas tasmād etan madhyata upadadhāty
GV00maitrs_pu:5943: abhitā itarāṇi paśoḥ savīryatvāyātho sāyatanatvāya yaṃ kāmayeta paśumānt syād iti
GV00maitrs_pu:5944: tasya samīcīnāni paśuśīrṣāṇy upadadhyāt samīca evāsmai paśūn upadadhāti paśumān bhavaty
GV00maitrs_pu:5945: atha yaṃ kāmayetāpaśuḥ syād iti tasya viṣūcīnāni paśuśīrṣāṇy upadadhyād viṣūca evāsmai
GV00maitrs_pu:5946: paśūn upadadhāty apaśur bhavaty etā vai sāhasrīr iṣṭakāḥ paśviṣṭakās tāḥ somadakṣaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:5947: kauśreyo vidāṃcakāra tāḥ śyāparṇāyopadadhau sa sahasraṃ paśūn prāpa pra sahasraṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5948: paśūn āpnoti yasyaitā upadhīyante yaviṣṭho vai nāmaiṣo 'gnis tasmāc cinvītāntarā
GV00maitrs_pu:5949: na vyetavai yad vīyāt prāṇān asya yuvetotsargair upatiṣṭhata āraṇyān eva paśūñ śucam
GV00maitrs_pu:5953: puruṣaśīrṣam upadadhāty eṣa hi paśūnāṃ vīryavattamo vīryam asmin dadhāty ekam upadadhāty
GV00maitrs_pu:5954: ekadhāsmin vīryaṃ dadhāti sauryā puruṣaśīrṣam abhijuhoti svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV00maitrs_pu:5955: saurī vā eṣā satī maitrāvaruṇy ahar vai mitro rātrir varuṇo 'horātrayor eva pratitiṣṭhaty
GV00maitrs_pu:5956: ardhaṛcābhyāṃ juhotīyaṃ vā ardhaṛco 'sā ardhaṛco 'nayor eva pratitiṣṭhaty atha yad
GV00maitrs_pu:5957: ekaya ṛcā dvir juhoti tasmād ekaḥ san puruṣo dvipād yad vā etat kiṃcākar yoniṃ vā
GV00maitrs_pu:5958: etad vyakar yad etā apasyāḥ sādayati tasminn eva yonau reto dadhātīyaṃ vā abibhed
GV00maitrs_pu:5959: agnir mātidhakṣyatīti saitā iṣṭakā apaśyad atho āhuḥ prajāpatir apaśyad iti tā upādhatte
GV00maitrs_pu:5960: yad etā upadhīyante 'syā anatidāhāya yad id annam iti hovāceyaṃ ya etā upadadhātā
GV00maitrs_pu:5961: ity annādo bhavati yasyaitā upadhīyante tasmād retasaḥ siktād eṣa paśuḥ saṃbhavati
GV00maitrs_pu:5962: yad etāś chandasyāḥ paśavo vai chandāṃsi yad dakṣiṇata upadadhyād abhīpataḥ prajā
GV00maitrs_pu:5963: varuṇo gṛhṇīyād atha yad uttarata upadadhāty apavāhata evāthaitāḥ prāṇabhṛtas tasmin
GV00maitrs_pu:5964: paśau saṃbhūte prāṇaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vācaṃ tāni dadhāty akṣṇayā sādayati paśuṃ vā
GV00maitrs_pu:5965: etad ākramayati tasmāt paśavo 'kṣṇayāṅgāni praharanto yanti daśabhirdaśabhir vā atā
GV00maitrs_pu:5966: iṣṭakābhir ṛṣaya ārdhnuvaṃs tā ṛddhīr ṛdhnoti yasyaitā upadhīyante 'thaitāḥ saṃyato
GV00maitrs_pu:5967: reto vā etat sicyate yad agniś cīyate yad etā upadhīyante retasaḥ siktasya saṃyatyai
GV00maitrs_pu:5968: lokaṃ pṛṇa chidraṃ pṛṇety eṣā vā achidreṣṭakā achidrā vā etayā citayaś cīyanta indrāgnī
GV00maitrs_pu:5969: tvā bṛhaspatir ity ojo vai vīryam indrāgnī ojasā vā etad vīryeṇāgniś cīyate tā asya
GV00maitrs_pu:5970: sūdadohasā iti paruṣiparuṣy eva rasaṃ dadhāti somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayā ity annaṃ vai
GV00maitrs_pu:5971: pṛśny annam evāvarunddhe janman devānāṃ viśā ity āha prajātyā eva triṣv ā rocane
GV00maitrs_pu:5972: diva iti savanāni vai tṛṇi rocanāni savanacitam evainam akar anuṣṭub vā eṣā vāg vā
GV00maitrs_pu:5973: anuṣṭup prāṇo vai vāg yad eṣā sarvā iṣṭakā anusaṃcarati tasmāt prāṇaḥ sarvāṇy aṅgāny
GV00maitrs_pu:5974: anusaṃcaraty āgneyī vā eṣā varṇena svena vā etac chandasāgniś cīyate nādhvaryuḥ san
GV00maitrs_pu:5976: utsannayajño vā eṣa yad agniś cityaḥ ko ha tad veda yad etasya kriyate yan nāśvinau
GV00maitrs_pu:5977: vai devānāṃ bhiṣajā akḷptasya kalpayitārau yad etā āśvinīr upadhīyante 'kḷptasya
GV00maitrs_pu:5978: kḷptyai pañcopadadhāti pāṅkto yajño yāvān eva yajñas tam ālabdhātho yāvān eva yajñas
GV00maitrs_pu:5979: tam acīkḷpad athaitā āśvinīr ṛtavyā anūpadhīyante retase vā etat siktāya ṛtūn upādhāt
GV00maitrs_pu:5980: tasmāt sarveṣv ṛtuṣu reto hitaṃ tasmāt sarvān ṛtūn reto 'nuprajāyate 'thaitā ṛtavyā
GV00maitrs_pu:5981: vāyavyā anūpadhīyante tasmāt sarvān ṛtūn vāyur anvāvarīvarty athaitā vāyavyā apasyā
GV00maitrs_pu:5982: anūpadhīyante tasmāt paśavo nānāvratāḥ santo 'pa evābhi savratāś catasraḥ purastād
GV00maitrs_pu:5983: upadadhāti caturvidhaṃ hi śiraḥ prāṇaś cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāṅ mūrdhanvatībhiḥ sādayati
GV00maitrs_pu:5984: mūrdhanyo 'sānīti pañcapañcābhitā upadadhāti paśoḥ savīryatvāyātho sāyatanatvāya
GV00maitrs_pu:5985: tasmāt paśuḥ paścād varīyāñ śroṇimattaras tasmād u prāṅ saṃhāna indrāgnī avyathamānām
GV00maitrs_pu:5986: iṣṭakāṃ dṛṃhataṃ yuvam ity antarikṣaṃ vā eṣā citir antarikṣam imāḥ prajā indrāgnī
GV00maitrs_pu:5987: vai devānām ojobhṛtav ojo vīryam indrāgnī ojo vā etad vīryaṃ madhyataḥ prajānāṃ dhīyate
GV00maitrs_pu:5988: 'thaitā diśyā devā vai svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs te diśā ākramanta tā avlīyanta tā etābhir
GV00maitrs_pu:5989: adṛṃhan yad etā upadhīyante diśāṃ dhṛtyai pañcopadadhāti pāṅkto yajño yāvān eva yajñas
GV00maitrs_pu:5990: tam ālabdha daśaitāḥ purastāt sādayati daśākṣarā virāḍ virāṭ khalu vai cakṣur jyotiś
GV00maitrs_pu:5991: chandasāṃ cakṣur vā etaj jyotiḥ purastāt paśor dadhāti tasmād idaṃ purastāc cakṣur
GV00maitrs_pu:5992: atho annaṃ vai virāḍ annaṃ vā etan mukhato dadhāti mā chandaḥ pramā chandaḥ pratimā
GV00maitrs_pu:5993: chandā itīyaṃ vai māntarikṣaṃ pramāsau pratimemān eva lokān upadhatte 'tho devachandasāni
GV00maitrs_pu:5994: vā etāni devachandasāny evopadhatte dvādaśadvādaśābhitā upadadhāti tat ṣaṭtriṃśat
GV00maitrs_pu:5995: ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarā bṛhatī bṛhatī khalu vai chandasāṃ svārājyam ānaśe gachati svārājyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:5996: yasyaitā upadhīyante paśavo vai bṛhatī paśavo madhyamā citis tasmād etasyāṃ cityām
GV00maitrs_pu:5997: etā upadhīyanta ādityadhāmāno vā uttare prāṇā aṅgirodhāmāno 'dhare mūrdhāsi rāḍ iti
GV00maitrs_pu:5998: ya uttare prāṇās tān etābhir dādhāra yantrī rāḍ iti ye 'dhare prāṇās tān etābhir
GV00maitrs_pu:5999: dādhāra tad eṣāṃ vāvaitāḥ prāṇānāṃ vidhṛtyai samāvadbhājaḥ sādayati samāvadbhājo
GV00maitrs_pu:6000: hīme prāṇāḥ prāṇānāṃ vidhṛtyai yaṃ dviṣyāt tasyākṣṇayā sādayet prāṇān asya mohayati
GV00maitrs_pu:6002: trivṛdvatīṃ purastāt sādayati trivṛd vai yajñamukhaṃ mukhato vā etad yajñamukhaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6003: dadāti saptadaśavatīṃ dakṣiṇato 'nnaṃ vai saptadaśo 'nnaṃ vā etad dakṣiṇato dadhāti
GV00maitrs_pu:6004: tasmād dakṣiṇena hastenānnam adyate tasmād dakṣiṇo 'rdha ātmano vīryavattaras tasmād
GV00maitrs_pu:6005: dakṣiṇam ardhaṃ vayāṃsy anuparyāvartante pañcadaśavatīm uttarata ojo vai pañcadaśa
GV00maitrs_pu:6006: ojo vā etad uttarato dadhāty ekaviṃśavatīṃ paścāt pratiṣṭhityai trivṛdvatīṃ purastāt
GV00maitrs_pu:6007: sādayati trivṛd vai yajñamukhaṃ mukhato vā etad yajñamukhaṃ dadhāti pañcadaśavatīṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6008: dakṣiṇataḥ sādayati saptadaśavatīm uttarataḥ pakṣayoḥ savīryatvāyātho sāyatanatvāya
GV00maitrs_pu:6009: tasmād ubhābhyāṃ hastābhyām annam adyate 'tho vajro vai pañcadaśo vajreṇa vā etad
GV00maitrs_pu:6010: yajamāno bhrātṛvyam ubhayato nirbhajaty ekaviṃśavatīṃ paścāt pratiṣṭhityai pratiṣṭhā
GV00maitrs_pu:6011: hy ekaviṃśo 'rkasya vā eṣa vidhām anuvidhīyate 'nnam akro 'nnādo bhavati yasyaitā
GV00maitrs_pu:6012: upadhīyante 'gner bhāgo 'si dīkṣāyā ādhipatyaṃ brahma spṛtaṃ trivṛt stomā iti spṛto
GV00maitrs_pu:6013: vai nāmaitā iṣṭakā etābhir vai prajāpatir yadyad akāmayata tattad aspṛṇod yadyad
GV00maitrs_pu:6014: evaitābhir yajamānaḥ kāmayate tattat spṛṇoty ekayāstuvata prajā adhīyanteti sṛṣṭayo
GV00maitrs_pu:6015: vai nāmaitā iṣṭakā etābhir vai prajāpatir yadyad akāmayata tattad asṛjata yadyad
GV00maitrs_pu:6016: evaitābhir yajamānaḥ kāmayate tattat sṛjate agne jātān praṇudā naḥ sapatnān iti purastāt
GV00maitrs_pu:6017: sādayati ya eva jātāḥ sapatnās tān etayā praṇudate praty ajātān jātavedo nudasveti
GV00maitrs_pu:6018: paścād ya eva jātāḥ sapatnās tān etayā pratinudate tad bhrātṛvyasya vā eṣa vinodaś
GV00maitrs_pu:6019: catuścatvāriṃśī stomo varco draviṇam iti dakṣiṇataḥ sādayati ṣoḍaśī stomā ojo draviṇam
GV00maitrs_pu:6020: ity uttarataś catuścatvāriṃśadakṣarā vai triṣṭub vajras triṣṭub vajraḥ ṣoḍaśī savyāpagrahaṇo
GV00maitrs_pu:6021: vai vajro dakṣiṇāpraharaṇaḥ savyāpagrahaṇaṃ vā etad vajraṃ dakṣiṇāpraharaṇaṃ yajamāno
GV00maitrs_pu:6022: bhrātṛvyāya praharati purīṣavatīṃ madhyataḥ sādayati purīṣam iva hīdaṃ madhyataḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:6023: paśoḥ purīṣaṃ madhyam ātmanaḥ sātmānam evāgniṃ cinute 'thaitā virājo vāg vai virāṭ
GV00maitrs_pu:6024: paśavo vā etā iṣṭakāḥ paśuṣu vā etad uttamāṃ vācaṃ dadhāti tasmāt paśumān uttamāṃ vācaṃ vadati //
GV00maitrs_pu:6025: ity uparikāṇḍe dṛṣāno nāma dvitīyaḥ prapāṭhakaḥ //MS_3,2.10//
GV00maitrs_pu:6027: athaitāḥ stomabhāgā etāṃ vai bṛhaspatir asurebhyo 'dhi yajñasya pratiṣṭhām āharad
GV00maitrs_pu:6028: yad etā upadhīyante yajñasya pratiṣṭhityai yajño vai devānām apadyata taṃ devāḥ stomabhāgābhiḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:6029: pratyudastabhnuvan yad etā upadhīyante yajñasyottabdhyai prajāpatir vā etat pṛthivyā
GV00maitrs_pu:6030: agnes tejaḥ samabharat tad agner evaitat tejaḥ saṃbhriyate 'thaitā nākasado nākaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6031: ha vā asmā agniṃ cikyānāya bhavati na vai tatra kiṃ cana jagmuṣe kaṃ tasmān nākasado
GV00maitrs_pu:6032: nākasatsu pañcacūḍā adhyupadadhāti svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyay eṣa ha tv eva yajamānaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:6033: patnībhir agnināmuṣmiṃl loke samyaṅ yasyaitā upadhīyante 'tho madhye jyotir eva cīyata
GV00maitrs_pu:6034: etā vā amuṣmiṃl loke yajamānasya patnīs tasmād agnicitā strī nopetyerṣyā hi sā paścāt
GV00maitrs_pu:6035: prācīm uttamām upadadhāti paścād dhy etaṃ prācī patny anvāste 'thaitāḥ kḷptayaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:6036: prajā asṛjata tā enaṃ sṛṣṭā atyamanyanta sa prajāpatir etā iṣṭakā apaśyat tā upādhatta
GV00maitrs_pu:6037: tato vā akalpata yad etā upadhīyante prajānāṃ kḷptyay athaitā vṛṣṭisanayo vṛṣṭir
GV00maitrs_pu:6038: vai devebhyo 'nnādyam apākrāmat tata idaṃ sarvam aśuṣyat te devāḥ prajāpatim evopādhāvan
GV00maitrs_pu:6039: sa prajāpatir etā iṣṭakā apaśyat tā upādhatta tebhyo vṛṣṭim annādyam avārunddha yad
GV00maitrs_pu:6040: etā upadhīyante vṛṣṭyā annādyasyāvaruddhyay āvapanaṃ vā uttamā citir anyāanyā iṣṭakā
GV00maitrs_pu:6041: upadadhāty anyānanyān evāsmai paśūn prajanayati prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇṇāyur vāyavyā
GV00maitrs_pu:6042: samīcī upadadhāty āyuś caiva prāṇaṃ ca sayujā akar atho samīcīnābhyāṃ hy āyuṣā ca
GV00maitrs_pu:6043: prāṇena ca bhuñjate prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇṇā tām uttamām upadadhāty uttamaṃ hy āyur
GV00maitrs_pu:6044: yad anyām uttarām upadadhyāt prāṇam asyāpidadhyāt pramāyukaḥ syāt tasmāt tām uttamām
GV00maitrs_pu:6046: athaiṣā chandaścitiś chandāṃsi vai devānāṃ vāmaṃ paśavaś chandāṃsy evaitayā vāmaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6047: paśūn yajamāno 'varunddha etāṃ vai yajñasenaś caitra upadadhe sa ānardha ṛdhnoti
GV00maitrs_pu:6048: ya etām upadhatte gāyatrībhiḥ purastāt sādayati tejo vai gāyatrī brahmavarcasaṃ teja
GV00maitrs_pu:6049: eva brahmavarcasam avarunddhe tisra upadadhāti trivṛd dhy agnir mūrdhanvatībhiḥ sādayati
GV00maitrs_pu:6050: mūrdhanyo 'sānīti triṣṭubbhir dakṣiṇata ojo vai vīryaṃ triṣṭub oja eva vīryam avarunddhe
GV00maitrs_pu:6051: jagatībhiḥ paścād jāgatāḥ paśavaḥ paśūn evāvarunddhe 'nuṣṭubbhir uttarato 'nuṣṭub
GV00maitrs_pu:6052: vai sarvāṇi chandāṃsi sarvāṇy evāsya chandāṃsy upahitāni bhavanty atha paṅktīr atha
GV00maitrs_pu:6053: bṛhatīr athoṣṇiho 'tha kakubho 'tha virāja evam asya yathāpūrvaṃ chandāṃsy upahitāni
GV00maitrs_pu:6054: bhavanti dvipadā uttamāḥ sādayati dvipād yajamānaḥ pratiṣṭhityai chandāṃsi vai devānāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6055: vāmaṃ paśavo yajamānāyatanaṃ vā āhavanīyo bhrātṛvyāyatanaṃ dhiṣṇyā yat paścopadadhyād
GV00maitrs_pu:6056: bhrātṛvyāyatane vāmaṃ paśūn dadhyād atha yat pura upadadhāti yajamānāyatane vā etad
GV00maitrs_pu:6057: vāmaṃ paśūn dadhāty aṣṭopadadhāty aṣṭākṣarā gāyatrī gāyatro 'gnir yāvān evāgnis taṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6058: cinute 'ṣṭau gāyatrībhiḥ purastād bahiḥpavamānasyopadadhyād yady enaṃ bhrātṛvyo 'tīva
GV00maitrs_pu:6059: syād ekādaśa triṣṭubbhiḥ purastān mādhyaṃdinasya pavamānasya dvādaśa jagatībhiḥ purastād
GV00maitrs_pu:6060: ārbhavasya pavamānasyaitā eva paścāt pavāmanānām upadadhyād yady enaṃ bhrātṛvyo 'tīva
GV00maitrs_pu:6061: syāt prāṇo vai pavāmāno 'gnes tejaḥ pavamānas tejasā vā etad yajamāno bhrātṛvyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6062: prabhūtaṃ praṇudate tejasā pratinudate tejasā vinudate tad bhrātṛvyasya vā eṣa vinodo
GV00maitrs_pu:6063: jānudaghnaṃ prathamaṃ cinvānaś cinvīta gāyatrīcitaṃ nābhidaghnaṃ dvitīyaṃ cinvānaś
GV00maitrs_pu:6064: cinvīta triṣṭupcitaṃ cubukadaghnaṃ tṛtīyaṃ cinvānaś cinvīta jagaccitaṃ yaj jyāyāṃsaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6065: citvā kanīyāṃsaṃ cinvīta kanīyāṃsaṃ yajñakratum upeyāt kanīyasīṃ prajāṃ kanīyasaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:6066: paśūn kanīyo 'nnādyaṃ pāpīyānt syād atha yat kanīyāṃsaṃ citvā jyāyāṃsaṃ cinute jyāyāṃsam
GV00maitrs_pu:6067: eva yajñakratum upaiti bhūyasīṃ prajāṃ bhūyasaḥ paśūn bhūyo 'nnādyaṃ vasīyān bhavaty
GV00maitrs_pu:6068: eṣā vā agner uttaravatī nāma citir uttaramuttaraṃ śvaḥśvaḥ śreyān bhavati ya evaṃ veda //MS_3,3.2 //
GV00maitrs_pu:6069: pañcacitikaḥ kāryaḥ pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavas tasmāt pañcacitikaḥ pañca citayaḥ

GV00maitrs_pu:6508: svargaṃ vā eṣa lokam anvārohati yo 'gniṃ cinute yad anvārohān juhoti svargam evainaṃ lokaṃ gamayitvātha kāmaṃ carati //
GV00maitrs_pu:6510: āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped agnir vai sarvā devatā viṣṇur yajño devatāś
GV00maitrs_pu:6511: caiva yajñaṃ cālabdhāgnir vai yajñasyānto 'vastād viṣṇuḥ purastād ubhayata eva yajñasyāntā
GV00maitrs_pu:6512: ālabdha tad āhur na ṛta indrād yajño 'stv iti yad aṣṭākapalas tenāgneyo yat trikapālas
GV00maitrs_pu:6513: tena vaiṣṇavo yad ekādaśakapālaḥ saṃpadyate tenaindro 'gnir vai yajñasya pavitraṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6514: viṣṇur yajñaḥ pavitrapūtam eva yajñam ālabdha medhasya vā etad yajñasya rūpaṃ yat
GV00maitrs_pu:6515: puroḍāśas tasmāt puroḍāśa eva kāryaś carū kurvanti dhenvā vai ghṛtaṃ payo 'naḍuhas
GV00maitrs_pu:6516: taṇḍulās tan mithunaṃ mithunam evāsya yajñamukhe dadhāti tejo vai ghṛtaṃ tejasa eva
GV00maitrs_pu:6517: prajāyate puruṣo vā eṣa medhāyālabhyate puruṣasyeva hy eṣā pratimā yata iva hi rūpaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6518: tasmāc carur eva kāryo vedimati dīkṣate vindā iti vai vedimati dīkṣate vindate ha
GV00maitrs_pu:6519: vai yo vedimati dīkṣate 'tho yajñapatha evādīkṣiṣṭa vedyā vai devā imam asurāṇām
GV00maitrs_pu:6520: avindatemām eva vindate yo vedimati dīkṣate 'tho yajñapatham evālabdha prācīnavaṃśaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6521: kurvanti diśo yad imāṃ vyakalpayann imām eva devebhyo 'kalpayann imāṃ pitṛbhya imām
GV00maitrs_pu:6522: asurebhya imāṃ manuṣyebhyo devatām eṣa upaiti yo dīkṣate devānām eva diśam upāvartate
GV00maitrs_pu:6523: prācīnām eva diśam upāvartate 'tho devakṣetram eva prāvasyati pariśrayanty antarhito
GV00maitrs_pu:6524: vai daivāt kṣayān mānuṣaḥ kṣayo mānuṣād evainaṃ kṣayād antardadhaty atho rakṣasām
GV00maitrs_pu:6525: ananvavāyāyaiti vā eṣo 'smāl lokād yo dīkṣate janaṃ hy eti devalokam abhyārohati
GV00maitrs_pu:6526: pariśrayanto 'tirokān kurvanti tenāsmāl lokān naiti tenāsmiṃl loke dhṛtaḥ purastāt
GV00maitrs_pu:6527: prāyaṇaṃ kuryāt svargakāmasyāsau vā ādityaḥ svargo loko 'muṣyainam ādityasya sāmakṣaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6528: gamayati dakṣiṇataḥ prāyaṇaṃ kuryād yaṃ kāmayeta pitṛloka ṛdhnuyād ity eṣā vai pitπṇāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6529: dik pitṛloka eva ṛdhnoti paścāt prāyaṇaṃ kuryāt prajākāmasya paścād vai reto dhīyate
GV00maitrs_pu:6530: reto dīkṣito reto 'smin dadhāty uttarataḥ prāyaṇaṃ kuryād yaṃ kāmayeta manuṣyaloka
GV00maitrs_pu:6531: ṛdhnuyād ity eṣā vai manuṣyāṇāṃ diṅ manuṣyaloka eva ṛdhnoty uttarataḥ purastāt prāyaṇaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6532: kuryād yaṃ kāmayetobhayor lokayor ṛdhnuyād ity ubhayor vā etal lokayor ubhayor eva
GV00maitrs_pu:6533: lokayor ṛdhnoti sarvataḥ prāyaṇaṃ kuryād yaṃ kāmayeta sarvāsu dikṣv ity ṛdhnuyād
GV00maitrs_pu:6537: keśaśmaśru vapate dato dhāvate nakhān nikṛntate snāti mṛtā vā eṣā tvag amedhyaṃ vā
GV00maitrs_pu:6538: asyaitad ātmani śamalaṃ tad evāpahate medhya eva medham upaity apsu dīkṣāṃ praveśayitvā
GV00maitrs_pu:6539: devāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyan yad apsu snāti tām eva dīkṣām ālabhate 'tha yad apo 'vabhṛtham
GV00maitrs_pu:6540: abhyavaiti tāṃ vā etad dīkṣāṃ punar apsu praveśayaty oṣadhe trāyasvainam ity āha
GV00maitrs_pu:6541: trātyā eva svadhite mainaṃ hiṃsīr iti vajro vai svadhitiḥ sa īśvaro 'śānto yajamānaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6542: hiṃsitor yat tṛṇam antardadhāti yajamānasyāhiṃsāyai devaśrud imān pravapā iti devaśrud
GV00maitrs_pu:6543: hy etān pravapate svasty uttaraṃ aśīyeti svasty asya yajñasyodṛcam aśīyeti vā etad
GV00maitrs_pu:6544: āhāpo mā mātaraḥ sūdayantv ity āpo hi yajño ghṛtena mā ghṛtapvaḥ punantv iti devatābhir
GV00maitrs_pu:6545: evātmānaṃ pāvayate viśvaṃ hi ripraṃ pravahantu devīr iti yad evāsya ripram amedhyam
GV00maitrs_pu:6546: ātmani śamalaṃ tad asmād adhi pravahanty ud id ābhyaḥ śrucir ā pūta emīti śrucir
GV00maitrs_pu:6547: evābhyo yajñiyo medhyaḥ pūta udeti havir vai dīkṣito yadā vai havir yajuṣā prokṣaty
GV00maitrs_pu:6548: atha havir bhavati yad yajuṣā snapayati havir evainam akar aśnāti prāṇā vā aśanaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6549: prāṇān evātman dhitvā dīkṣate suṣiro vai puruṣaḥ sa vai tarhy eva sarvo yarhy āśito
GV00maitrs_pu:6550: yad āśito bhavati medhya eva medham upaiti yathā vā iha dīkṣita evaṃ vā eṣo 'muṣmiṃl
GV00maitrs_pu:6551: loka eva vā atyāśitasya tiṣṭhati tasmān nātyāśitena bhavitavyaṃ tan na sūrkṣyam āśitenaiva
GV00maitrs_pu:6552: bhavitavyaṃ yathaiva kanīyaḥkanīyo 'śnīyād evam aśnīyād yad dhi dīkṣitaḥ san kanīyo
GV00maitrs_pu:6553: 'śnāti tena dīksita āṅkte 'bhyaṅkte vāsaḥ paridhatta etā vai puruṣasya tanvaḥ satanūr
GV00maitrs_pu:6554: eva medhyam upaiti navanītenābhyaṅkte ghṛtaṃ devānām āyutaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ niṣpakvaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6555: gandharvāṇāṃ svayaṃvilīnaṃ pitπṇāṃ sarvadevatyaṃ vā etat tasmān navanītenābhyaṅkte
GV00maitrs_pu:6556: darbhapiñjulābhyāṃ samāyauti tat svid abhyañjanam akar atho abhy evaitad ghārayati
GV00maitrs_pu:6557: medhatvāya mahīnāṃ payo 'sīty āha mahīnāṃ hy etat payo 'pām oṣadhīnāṃ rasā ity apāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6558: hy eṣa oṣadhīnāṃ raso varcodhā asi varco me dhehīty āśiṣam evāśāste //MS_3,6.2 //
GV00maitrs_pu:6563: prasvāṅkte prajātyaīṣīkayāṅkte śalasyā hi manuṣyā āñjate satūlayāṅkte 'patūlayā hi
GV00maitrs_pu:6564: manuṣyā āñjate dakṣiṇaṃ pūrvam āṅkte savyaṃ hi pūrvaṃ manuṣyā āñjate trir anyat trir
GV00maitrs_pu:6565: anyad āṅkte 'parimitaṃ hi manuṣyā āñjate na punar niṣevayati punarāvartaṃ hi manuṣyā
GV00maitrs_pu:6566: āñjata indro vai vṛtram ahaṃs tasya kanīnikā parāpatat sā trikakubham agachat tadāñjanaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6567: traikakubham āṅkte satyaṃ vai cakṣur neva vāce śrad dadhāti satyam evālabhya dīkṣām
GV00maitrs_pu:6568: upaity antar ahaṃ tvayā dveṣo antarārātīr dadhe mahatā parvateneti parvatena vā etad
GV00maitrs_pu:6569: dveṣo 'rātīr antar dhatte cakṣuḥpā asi cakṣur me pāhīty āśiṣam evāśāsta ūrdhvaṃ cāvāñcaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6570: ca pāvayaty ūrdhvaś ca hy ayam avāṅ ca prāṇo yaṃ dviṣyāt tam akṣṇayā pāvayet prāṇān
GV00maitrs_pu:6571: asya mohayati pramāyuko bhavati citpatis tvā punātv iti yajño vai citpatir vācaspatis
GV00maitrs_pu:6572: tvā punātv iti vācaspatir evainaṃ yajñāya pāvayati devas tvā savitā punātv iti savitṛprasūta
GV00maitrs_pu:6573: evaitābhir devatābhir medhāyātmānaṃ pāvayate 'chidreṇa pavitreṇety etad vā achidraṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6574: pavitraṃ yat sūryasya raśmayo 'chidreṇaivainaṃ pavitreṇa punāti tasya te pavitrapate
GV00maitrs_pu:6575: pavitreṇeti yajño vai pavitrapatir yajñāya khalu vā eṣa kam ātmānaṃ pāvayate //
GV00maitrs_pu:6578: itīndro vai vṛtram apsv adhyahaṃs tāsāṃ yad yajñiyaṃ medhyam āsīt tad udakrāmat tā
GV00maitrs_pu:6579: imā oṣadhayo 'bhavaṃs tāsāṃ vā etat tejo yad darbhā etā vai śuṣkā āpo yad evāsāṃs
GV00maitrs_pu:6580: tejas tad avarunddhe trayīr vā āpo divyāḥ pārthivāḥ samudriyās tāḥ sarvā darbho vivasthait
GV00maitrs_pu:6581: tasmād darbhaḥ pavitraṃ dvābhyāṃ pāvayati dve pavitre dvipād yajāmāno yāvān evāsyātmā
GV00maitrs_pu:6582: taṃ pāvayati triḥ pāvayati triṣatyā hi devā atho trayo vā ime prāṇāḥ prāṇo 'pāno
GV00maitrs_pu:6583: vyāno yāvān evāsyātmā taṃ pāvayati saptabhiḥ pāvayati sapta vai chandāṃsi chandobhir
GV00maitrs_pu:6584: evainaṃ pāvayaty atho brahma vai chandāṃsi brahmaṇaivainaṃ pāvayaty ekaviṃśatyā pāvayati
GV00maitrs_pu:6585: daśa hastyā aṅgulayo daśa pādyā ātmaikaviṃśo yāvān evāsyātmā taṃ pāvayati trayā vai
GV00maitrs_pu:6586: nairṛtā akṣāḥ striyaḥ svapno yad dīkṣate tenākṣaiś ca strībhiś ca vyāvartate yāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6587: prathamāṃ dīkṣito rātrīṃ jāgarti tayā svapnena vyāvartate yāṃ prathamāṃ dīkṣito vasati
GV00maitrs_pu:6588: yajñaṃ tayāvarunddhe yāṃ some krīte prajāṃ tayā yāṃ śvaḥsutyayā paśūṃs tayā //MS_3,6.3 //
GV00maitrs_pu:6589: ākūtyai prayuje agnaye svāhety ākūtyā vā ākūtir yakṣyate sya iti prayujaḥ khalu vā
GV00maitrs_pu:6590: enaṃ yajñāya prayuñjate medhāyai manase agnaye svāheti medhayā hi manasā yajñam aśnute
GV00maitrs_pu:6591: dīkṣāyai tapase agnaye svāheti dīkṣayā hi tapasā yajñam aśnute sarasvatyai pūṣṇe
GV00maitrs_pu:6592: agnaye svāheti vāg vai sarasvatī vācā vyāharati yakṣyate sya iti pūṣā khalu vā enaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6593: yajñaṃ prāpipad ya enam apūpuṣad āpo devīr bṛhatīr viśvaśaṃbhuvā ity āpo hi yajño
GV00maitrs_pu:6594: dyāvāpṛthivī uro antarikṣeti dyāvāpṛthivī vā anv antarikṣaṃ yajña upaśritas tata
GV00maitrs_pu:6595: eva yajñam ālabdha bṛhaspatir no haviṣā vṛdhātu svāheti brahma vai bṛhaspatir brahmaṇā
GV00maitrs_pu:6596: vā etat purastāt sarvān kāmān āptvā dīkṣām ālabhate yatra vā asya yajñaḥ śrito yatrayatropaśritas
GV00maitrs_pu:6597: tatastato vā etat sarvaṃ brahmaṇā yajñaṃ saṃbhṛtyālabdha na vā ekāhutir dīkṣitaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6598: karoti yad etāni juhoti dvitīyatvāya prajāpatir vai yat kiṃca manasādīdhet tad ādhītayajurbhir
GV00maitrs_pu:6599: evāpnot tad ādhītayajuṣām ādhītayajuṣṭvaṃ tad ya evaṃ vidvān ādhītayajūṃṣi juhoti
GV00maitrs_pu:6600: yad eva kiṃca manasā dīdhyaj juhoti tad āpnoty ete vai yajñasya saṃbhārā eṣa ha tv
GV00maitrs_pu:6601: eva saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāreṇa yajñena yajate yasyaitāni hūyanta etad dha sma vā āhāruṇa
GV00maitrs_pu:6602: aupaveśiḥ kim u sa yajñena yajeta yo yajñasya saṃbhārān na vidyād iti pañcabhir juhoti
GV00maitrs_pu:6603: pāṅkto yajño yāvān eva yajñas tam ālabdha ṣaḍbhir juhoti ṣaḍ vā ṛtava ṛtuṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
GV00maitrs_pu:6604: yajño vai sṛṣṭaḥ pra sāmāvlināt pra yajus taṃ vā ṛg evāyachad ekā vā enam ṛg ayachad
GV00maitrs_pu:6605: dvādaśa yajūṃṣi nava sāmāni tasmān navabhir bahiṣpavamāne stuvate nava hy enaṃ sāmāny
GV00maitrs_pu:6606: ayachaṃs tasmād vātsaṃbandhavido dvādaśabhir audgrabhaṇaṃ juhvati dvādaśa hy enaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6607: yajūṃṣy āyachann etarhi khalu vā eṣa sṛjyate yarhi dīkṣate yad ṛcaudgrabhaṇaṃ juhoti
GV00maitrs_pu:6608: yajñaṃ vā etat sṛṣṭam ṛcāyachati tasmād āruṇivida ṛcaudgrabhaṇaṃ juhvaty ekā hy enam
GV00maitrs_pu:6611: yajño vai prajāpatiḥ prājāpatyam etac chando yad anuṣṭubh yad anuṣṭubhā juhoti svenaivainaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6612: chandasāvarunddha ekayā juhoty eko hi prajāpatir aniruktayā juhoty anirukto hi prajāpatiḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:6613: pūrṇayā juhoti pūrṇo hi prajāpatir yad ūnayā juhuyād bhrātṛvyāya lokam uñśiṃṣed atha
GV00maitrs_pu:6614: yat pūrṇayā juhoti na bhrātṛvyāya lokam uñśiṃṣaty ūrjo vā etad rūpaṃ yat pūrṇaṃ yat
GV00maitrs_pu:6615: pūrṇayā juhoti yajñe vā etad ūrjaṃ dadhāti viśvo devasya netur iti sāvitraṃ marto
GV00maitrs_pu:6616: vurīta sakhyam iti pitṛdevatyaṃ viśvo rāya iṣudhyatīti vaiśvadevaṃ dyumnaṃ vṛṇīteti
GV00maitrs_pu:6617: bārhaspatyaṃ puṣyasā iti pauṣṇaṃ sārasvataḥ svāhākāraḥ sarvadevatyā vā eṣā ṛk tasmād
GV00maitrs_pu:6618: eṣaikā satyaudgrabhaṇaṃ paribabhūva sarvābhyo devatābhyo yajña ālabhyā ity āhuḥ sarvadevatyā
GV00maitrs_pu:6619: vā eṣā ṛg yad etayā ṛcaudgrabhaṇaṃ juhoti sarvābhyo vā etad devatābhyo yajñam ālabhate
GV00maitrs_pu:6620: 'nuṣṭubho vā etasyāḥ satyās trīṇy aṣṭākṣarāṇi padāny ekaṃ saptākṣaraṃ yat saptākṣaraṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6621: tasya catvāry akṣarāṇy ekasmin pada upayanti trīṇy ekasmin yatra catvāry upayanti
GV00maitrs_pu:6622: sā jagatī yatra trīṇi sā triṣṭub yad aṣṭākṣaraṃ tena gāyatrī yad anuṣṭup tenānuṣṭup
GV00maitrs_pu:6623: sarvair evāsya chandobhir hutaṃ bhavati chandaḥpratiṣṭhāno vai yajñaś chandaḥsu vāvāsyaitad
GV00maitrs_pu:6624: yajñaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayām akaḥ svāhākāreṇa khalu vā eṣā paṅktiḥ pāṅkto yajñaḥ paṅktiprāyaṇaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:6625: paṅktyudayanaḥ paṅktiprāyaṇam evāsya yajñaṃ paṅktyudayanam akar atho vāg vai chandāṃsi
GV00maitrs_pu:6626: vācaṃ vā etan madhyata āptvāvarunddhe tasmād iyaṃ vāṅ madhyato vadati madhyato hīyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6627: vāk prajāpatir vai svāṃ duhitaram adhyaid uṣasaṃ tasya retaḥ parāpatat te devā abhisamagachanta
GV00maitrs_pu:6628: tasmād dīkṣito na dadāti na pacaty athainam abhisaṃgachante tad udagṛbhṇaṃs tad audgrabhaṇasyaudgrabhaṇatvaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6629: tena yajñam atanvanta yajño yad agre vyabhavat sa tredhā vyabhavat sa vā ṛkṣv eva
GV00maitrs_pu:6630: tṛtīyenāśrayata sāmasu tṛtīyena yajuḥṣu tṛtīyena yā vā asya priyā tanūr āsīt tayā
GV00maitrs_pu:6631: yajur aśrayatoccair ṛcā kriyata uccaiḥ sāmnopāṃśu yajuṣā yajñasya hy atra priyā tanūr
GV00maitrs_pu:6632: yad yajuṣoccaiḥ kuryād yajñasya priyāṃ tanvam uddhṛtāṃ kuryād abrahmavarcasī syān
GV00maitrs_pu:6634: āhitāgnir vā eṣa san nāgnihotraṃ juhoti na darśapūrṇamāsau yajate tad yā āhutibhājo
GV00maitrs_pu:6635: devatās tā anudhyāyinīḥ karoti karśayata ātmānaṃ tenaivāsya tad dhutaṃ bhavati devā
GV00maitrs_pu:6636: asurān hatvaibhyo lokebhyaḥ prāṇudanta teṣām asavo manuṣyān prāviśaṃs tad idaṃ ripraṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6637: puruṣe 'ntar atho kṛṣṇam iva cakṣuṣy antas tan nāśnīyād asuryam evāpahate yadā vai
GV00maitrs_pu:6638: puruṣe na kiṃcanāntar bhavati yadāsya kṛṣṇaṃ cakṣuṣor naśyaty atha medhyo yadi kuryān
GV00maitrs_pu:6639: naktaṃ kuryād asuryo vai rātrir asūryam evāsūryaṃ kriyate vācaṃ vā etad dīkṣayantīti
GV00maitrs_pu:6640: ha smāhāruṇa aupaveśir ya utāñjāno 'bhyañjāno 'tha dīkṣitavādaṃ vadati sa vāva dīkṣita
GV00maitrs_pu:6641: iti sāyaṃ prātar vai manuṣyāṇāṃ devahitam aśanam atinīya sāyamaśanam atinīya prātaraśanaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6642: vrataṃ vratayati mānuṣasya vyāvṛttyay adantīti vai gā āhur aśnantīti manuṣyān juhudhīti
GV00maitrs_pu:6649: iti vrataṃ hy etasya vratena yajñaḥ saṃtato vratenaiva yajñaṃ saṃtanoty abhyardho
GV00maitrs_pu:6650: vā ṛksāme yajñād āstāṃ tayor yau mahimānā āstāṃ tā apanidhāya yajñam upāvartetāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:6651: tau mahimānā ahorātre abhavatāṃ tayor vā etad rūpaṃ yat kṛṣṇājinasya yañ śuklaṃ tad
GV00maitrs_pu:6652: ahno rūpaṃ yat kṛṣṇaṃ tad rātres tau vā etan mahimānā anvārabhate saṃpāraṇāya saṃ

GV00maitrs_pu:7569: vecheti pṛched yad vapayā prātaḥsavane caranti tena prātaḥsavanaṃ paśumad yat puroḍāśair
GV00maitrs_pu:7570: mādhyaṃdine savane tena mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ paśumad yad aṅgais tṛtīyasavane tena
GV00maitrs_pu:7571: tṛtīyasavanaṃ paśumat kiyatā tat paśoś caranti yad vapayā caranti kiyatā tad yat
GV00maitrs_pu:7572: puroḍāśaiḥ kiyatā tad yad avadānair rūpeṇa tat paśoś caranti yad vapayā caranty ātmanā
GV00maitrs_pu:7573: tad yat puroḍāśaiḥ śarīreṇa tad yad avadānaiḥ kasmai paśuḥ pratyaṅ niyujyata udaṅ
GV00maitrs_pu:7574: praṇīyate dakṣiṇata upasādyate prāṅ hūyata iti pṛched yat pratyaṅ niyujyata imāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:7575: tena diśam abhijayati yad dakṣiṇata upasādyata imāṃ tena yat prāṅ hūyata imāṃ tena

GV00maitrs_pu:7577: tena yat prāṅ hūyate devalokaṃ tena yad āhutyā ūrdhvo dhūma udayate svargaṃ tena
GV00maitrs_pu:7578: lokaṃ yad iḍopahūtaṃ pratyaṅ harantīmaṃ tena lokaṃ sarvā vā imā diśaḥ paśuyājy abhijayati

GV00maitrs_pu:7594: tvetīṣa evainam upāvir asīty upa hy eṣo 'vaty upo devān daivīr viśaḥ prāgur ity etā
