GV00maitrs_pu:7597: havyā te svadann iti svaditam evainam ālabhate deva tvaṣṭar vasu raṇā iti tvaṣṭā
GV00maitrs_pu:7598: hi rūpāṇi vikaroti revatīr amedhyam iti paśavo vai revatīr yachaty evaināṃ devasya
GV00maitrs_pu:7599: tvā savituḥ prasava iti savitṛprasūta evainām ādatte 'śvinor bāhubhyām ity aśvinau
GV00maitrs_pu:7600: vai devānām adhvaryuḥ pūṣṇo hastābhyām iti devatābhir eva dvau vai pāśau ghoro 'nyaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:7601: śivo 'nyo yo yajñiyaḥ sa ghoro yo 'yajñiyaḥ sa śiva ṛtasya tvā devahaviḥ pāśeneti
GV00maitrs_pu:7602: ya eva yajñiyaḥ pāśas tenainam ālabhate pratimuñcāmīty abhi hi manuṣyā dadhaty amuṣmai
GV00maitrs_pu:7603: tvā juṣṭam iti yasyā eva devatāyai paśur ālabhyate tasyā enaṃ juṣṭam akar dharṣā
GV00maitrs_pu:7604: mānuṣā iti manuṣyā hi dhārayanti śuṣko vā eṣo 'medhyo yat paśuṃ niyunakty ubhā evainau
GV00maitrs_pu:7605: medhyau karoti pratyañcaṃ niyunakti pratyañco hi paśavo medham upatiṣṭhante prāṇeṣu
GV00maitrs_pu:7606: vā etasya devatā upasthitā yat paśuṃ niyunakti pratīcīr evāsmai devatā niyunakty
GV00maitrs_pu:7607: adbhyas tvauṣadhībhyā ity adbhyo hy eṣa oṣadhībhyo juṣṭaṃ prokṣāmīti yasyā eva devatāyai
GV00maitrs_pu:7608: paśur ālabhyate tasyā enaṃ juṣṭam akar anu tvā mātā manyatām anu pitety anumata evainaṃ

GV00maitrs_pu:7610: evainaṃ nirdiśaty apāṃ perur asīty apāṃ hy eṣa peruḥ svāttaṃ sad dhavir āpo devīḥ

GV00maitrs_pu:7618: agninā vai mukhena devā imāṃl lokān abhyajayan yat paryagniṃ karoty agninā vā etan

GV00maitrs_pu:7646: ṛtvijo vṛṇīte chandāṃsi vā ṛtvijaś chandāṃsi vā etad vṛṇīte yad dhotāraṃ vṛṇīte jagatīṃ

GV00maitrs_pu:7655: abhūvan yad avṛtā vaṣaṭkuryur bhrātṛvyaṃ yajñasyāśīr gached atha yad vṛtā vaṣaṭkurvanty

GV00maitrs_pu:7659: yajaty atha yad ekādaśānuyājā yā evaitad devatā ayākṣīt tā etair anuprīṇāti hato

GV00maitrs_pu:9249: tu nāñjiḥ kāryo na pṛśnir amithunaṃ tad atho vyāghrarūpaṃ vai pṛśnir bibhyaty asmāt
GV00maitrs_pu:9250: paśavaḥ kanīyāṃso 'sya paśavo bhavanti yasya tādṛṅṅ ṛṣabho bhavati tad āhur bījam
GV00maitrs_pu:9251: evotsṛjyam ity etad vā āsāṃ bījaṃ yad rohitaṃ rūpaṃ paśumān bhavati yasya tādṛṅṅ
GV00maitrs_pu:9252: ṛṣabho bhavati yo dhūmras tāmradhūmraḥ sa prajāpatiḥ pra prajayā ca paśubhiś ca jāyate
GV00maitrs_pu:9253: yasya tādṛṅṅ ṛṣabho bhavati yasya lomaśā kakut sa stambī stambīva prajayā ca paśubhiś
GV00maitrs_pu:9254: ca bhavati yasya tādṛṅṅ ṛṣabho bhavati yasyordhvā kakut tā ūrdhvā āpyāyanta ūrdhvā
GV00maitrs_pu:9255: asya paśavā āpyāyante yasya tādṛṅṅ ṛṣabho bhavati yasya dakṣiṇataḥ pannaṃ sā pāpī
GV00maitrs_pu:9256: sā sravanty atha yasya savyata unnataṃ sā puṇyā sopāharantī yā utpṛṣṭis tā ūrdhvā
GV00maitrs_pu:9257: āpyāyanta ūrdhvā asya paśavā āpyāyante yasya tādṛṅṅ ṛṣabho bhavati yasya savyataḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:9258: pannaṃ sā pāpī sā sravanty atha yasya dakṣiṇata unnataṃ sā puṇyā sopāharantī yā savyasācinī
GV00maitrs_pu:9259: sā puṇyā sopāharantī yā saṃśṛṅgī sā goṣṭhas tāṃ na prachindyād anusṛṣṭasya goṣu syātām
GV00maitrs_pu:9260: etau vai paśūnām askannaṃ havir askannam asya havir bhavati yasyānusṛṣṭir goṣu bhavaty
GV00maitrs_pu:9261: ukṣā cāsya vehac ca goṣu syātām etau vai paśūnām ūrjaṃ bibhṛto 'kṣodhukā asya paśavo
GV00maitrs_pu:9262: bhavanti yasyokṣā ca vehac ca goṣu bhavataḥ //MS_4,2.14 //
GV00maitrs_pu:9264: arātīyanti vā anye puruṣāya nānye ye 'rātīyanti sā nirṛtir ye nārātīyanti sānumatis
GV00maitrs_pu:9265: tebhya ubhayebhyaḥ saha nirvapanty ubhau saha śṛtau kurvanti nairṛtena pūrveṇa pracaranti
GV00maitrs_pu:9266: dakṣiṇā paretya svakṛtā iriṇa etad vai nirṛtigṛhītaṃ pṛthivyā nirṛtigṛhīta eva nirṛtiṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9267: niravadayata ekolmukaṃ nidhāya visraṃsikāyāḥ kāṇḍābhyāṃ juhoti juṣāṇā nirṛtir vetu
GV00maitrs_pu:9268: svāhā vāsaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ bhinnāntaṃ dakṣiṇety etad dhi nirṛtyā rūpam ardhaṃ vai puruṣasya
GV00maitrs_pu:9269: nirṛtigṛhītam ardham anirṛtigṛhītaṃ yan nirṛtigṛhītaṃ tad evāsmāt tena niravadayate
GV00maitrs_pu:9270: punar etyānumatyā aṣṭākapālena pracaranti nirṛtim eva niravadāyeyaṃ vā anumatir vāg
GV00maitrs_pu:9271: vay anumatam evainaṃ savam ākramayaty aṣṭākapālo bhavati gāyatrī hīyaṃ gāyatrī vāg
GV00maitrs_pu:9272: dhenur dakṣiṇaitad dhy anumatyā rūpam atha ya udañcaḥ śamyām atiśīyante tān udaṅ
GV00maitrs_pu:9273: paretya valmīkavapām udrujya juhuyād idam amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasya kṣetriyam avayajā iti
GV00maitrs_pu:9274: tat punar apidadhātīdam aham amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasya kṣetriyam apidadhāmīti kṣetriyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9275: vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti ye cainam anv iyaṃ kṣetrasya patny asyām eva kṣetriyam avayajyāthainaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9276: savam ākramayati śvo bhūta ādityebhyo bhuvadvadbhyo ghṛte carur ity ādityā vā ita
GV00maitrs_pu:9277: uttamāḥ svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs tebhya eva procya svargaṃ lokam ety ādityā vā asmiṃl
GV00maitrs_pu:9278: loka ṛddhā ādityā amuṣminn ubhayor eva lokayor ṛdhnoti varo dakṣiṇā vareṇaiva svargaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9279: lokam abhyārohati śvo bhūta āgnāvaiṣṇava ekādaśakapālā ity agnir vai sarvā devatā
GV00maitrs_pu:9280: viṣṇur yajño devatāś caiva yajñaṃ cālabdhāgnir vai yajñasyānto 'vastād viṣṇuḥ parastād
GV00maitrs_pu:9281: ubhayata eva yajñasyāntā udagrahīd ubhayata eva yajñasyāntā udgṛhya yathotsaṅga āvapetaivaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9282: vā etad yajñam āvapate tasya yathākāmaṃ nirvapamāṇa ety anaḍvān vāmano dakṣiṇā yad
GV00maitrs_pu:9283: vahī tenāgneyo yad vāmanas tena vaiṣṇavo rūpeṇaivainaṃ samardhayati śvo bhūte 'gnīṣomīyā
GV00maitrs_pu:9284: ekādaśakapālā ity agnīṣomābhyāṃ vai vīryeṇendro vṛtram ahan vṛtraṃ khalu vā eṣa hanti
GV00maitrs_pu:9285: yo rājasūyenābhiṣiñcate tad vārtraghnam evaitad dhiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇā satyaṃ vai hiraṇyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9286: satyenaiva hanti śvo bhūta aindrāgna ekādaśakapālā ity agnīṣomābhyāṃ vai vīryeṇendro
GV00maitrs_pu:9287: vṛtram ahan sa ojasā vīryeṇa vyārdhyata sa etam aindrāgnam apaśyat tenaujo vīryam
GV00maitrs_pu:9288: ātmann adhattaujasā vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yo rājasūyenābhiṣiñcata ojo vīryam indrāgnī
GV00maitrs_pu:9289: ojasaivainaṃ vīryeṇa samardhayato 'naḍvān ṛṣabho dakṣiṇā yad vahī tenāgneyo yan muṣkaras
GV00maitrs_pu:9290: tenaindro rūpeṇaivainaṃ samardhayati śvo bhūta āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo māhendraṃ dadhīty
GV00maitrs_pu:9291: ṛddhyā evāgneya indro vai vṛtram ahan so 'nyān devān atyamanyata sa mahendro 'bhavat
GV00maitrs_pu:9292: sa etam uddhāram udaharad vṛtraṃ hatvā tad uddhāra evāsyaiṣa bhāga eva tasmād rājā
GV00maitrs_pu:9293: saṃgrāmaṃ jitvodājam udajayat payasā vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yo rājasūyenābhiṣiñcate
GV00maitrs_pu:9294: yat payaḥ payasaivainaṃ samardhayatīndriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yo rājasūyenābhiṣiñcate
GV00maitrs_pu:9295: yad aindram indriyeṇaivainaṃ vīryeṇa samardhayati devatābhir vā eṣa vyṛdhyate yo
GV00maitrs_pu:9296: rājasūyenābhiṣiñcate sarvadevatyaṃ vai vāso yad vāsaḥ kṣaumaṃ dakṣiṇā devatābhir
GV00maitrs_pu:9300: devā oṣadhīṣu pakvāsv ājim ayuḥ sa indro 'ved agnir vāvemāḥ prathama ujjeṣyatīti
GV00maitrs_pu:9301: so 'bravīd yataro nau pūrva ujjayet tan nau saheti tā agnir udajayat tad indro 'nūdajayat
GV00maitrs_pu:9302: tasmād aindrāgnam atho āhur āgnendraṃ kāryam ity agnir hi tā agra udajayat tad ujjityā
GV00maitrs_pu:9303: evāgrāyaṇo dvādaśakapālo bhavati dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsarād dhi tad adhy
GV00maitrs_pu:9304: abhavat saptadaśa sāmidhenīḥ kāryāḥ pañca ṛtavo dvādaśa māsā eṣa saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsarād
GV00maitrs_pu:9305: dhi tad adhi bhavaty ekā vai tarhi yavasya muṣṭir āsīd ekā vrīher ekā māṣasyaikā
GV00maitrs_pu:9306: tilasya tad viśve devā abruvan vayaṃ va etat prathayiṣyāmo bhāgo no 'stv iti tad
GV00maitrs_pu:9307: viśve devā aprathayaṃs tad bhūmna eva vaiśvadevo 'tho prathayaty evaitena payasi
GV00maitrs_pu:9308: syād vaiśvadevo vaiśvadevaṃ hi payo 'tha vā iyam abravīn mayi vā etad adhy asau vṛṣṭyā
GV00maitrs_pu:9309: pacati naitad ito 'dhy ujjeṣyatha bhāgo nā astv iti tad ābhyāṃ vāvaiṣa bhāgaḥ kriyata
GV00maitrs_pu:9310: ujjityay atho pratiṣṭhityā eva yad dyāvāpṛthivīyaḥ saumīr vā oṣadhayaḥ somā oṣadhīnām
GV00maitrs_pu:9311: adhirājas tasya vā eṣa bhāgo yad akṛṣṭapacyaṃ tad uddhāra evāsyaiṣa bhāga eva tasmād
GV00maitrs_pu:9312: rājā saṃgrāmaṃ jitvodājam udajate grāmyā vā anyā oṣadhaya āraṇyā anyās tā evāsyaitenobhayīr
GV00maitrs_pu:9313: aveṣṭā bhavanti yāḥ phālakṛṣṭās tāsām etenāgrāyaṇaṃ karoti yā āraṇyās tāsām uttareṇānīto
GV00maitrs_pu:9314: vā eṣa devānāṃ ya āhitāgnir yad akṛtvāgrāyaṇaṃ navasyāśnīyād devānāṃ bhāgaṃ pratikḷptam
GV00maitrs_pu:9315: aśnīyād ārtim ārchet sarvebhyo vā eṣo 'nyebhyo 'bhiṣicyate yo rājasūya āgrāyaṇo 'nnādyasyāvaruddhyai
GV00maitrs_pu:9316: vatsaḥ prathamajo dakṣiṇā reta iva hy eṣo 'prajātaḥ prajātyai //MS_4,3.2 //
GV00maitrs_pu:9318: athaitāni cāturmāsyāni saṃvatsaraṃ vai cāturmāsyāni parījyante saṃvatsarād evaināny
GV00maitrs_pu:9319: adhy āptvāvarunddha utsannayajño vā eṣa saṃvatsarād vā adhy utsannayajño 'varudhyate
GV00maitrs_pu:9320: saṃvatsarād evainam adhy āptvāvarunddhe paśavo vā ete cāturmāsyebhyo 'dhy atiricyate
GV00maitrs_pu:9321: yañ śunāsīryaṃ tān evāpnoti varṣya udake yajetaitad dhi paśūnāṃ nediṣṭham athaitāni
GV00maitrs_pu:9322: pañca havīṃṣi saṃtatyai grāmakāmo yajeta vāyur vā imāḥ prajā nasyotā itthaṃ cetthaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9323: ca nenīyate yad vāyave vāyur evāsmai nasyotāṃ viśaṃ ninayaty annakāmo yajeta saṃvatsaro
GV00maitrs_pu:9324: vā indraḥ śunāsīraḥ saṃvatsaro 'nnādyasya pradātā tam eva bhāgadheyenopāsarat so
GV00maitrs_pu:9325: 'smā annādyaṃ prayachati varṣya udake yajetaitad dhy annādyasya nediṣṭaṃ vṛṣṭikāmo
GV00maitrs_pu:9326: yajeta vāyur vā ime samīrayati sa āpyāyayati tato varṣati saṃvatsaro vā indraḥ śunāsīraḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:9328: devāś ca vā asurāś cāspardhanta sa vṛtra indram abravīt tvaṃ devānāṃ śreṣṭho 'sy
GV00maitrs_pu:9329: aham asurāṇāṃ saṃśaknavāva mā nā anyo 'nyaṃ vadhīd iti tau vai samāmetām anabhidrohāya
GV00maitrs_pu:9330: te devā vṛtram amanyantāyaṃ vāvedaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ta indra aichan hanāmemam iti so
GV00maitrs_pu:9331: 'bravīt saṃdhā vai me saṃhitān abhidrohāyeti tam agnir abravīd aham eva tvetaḥ pāsyāmīti
GV00maitrs_pu:9332: pṛthivyā aham antarikṣād iti varuṇo 'haṃ diva iti rudras tato vai devā vṛtram aghnan
GV00maitrs_pu:9333: vṛtraṃ khalu vā eṣa hanti yo rājasūyenābhiṣiñcate tad vārtraghnam evaitad devāś ca
GV00maitrs_pu:9334: vā asurāś ca samayatanta tān agnis tredhātmānaṃ kṛtvā pratyayatata agnir evāsmiṃl
GV00maitrs_pu:9335: loke bhūtvā varuṇo 'ntarikṣe rudro divi sa indro 'manyatāyaṃ vāvedaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
GV00maitrs_pu:9336: so 'bravīd ahaṃ viśvābhyā āśābhyā iti tato vā ajayaṃs taj jityā evaitad etenaiva
GV00maitrs_pu:9337: yājayet saṃgrāme jayati saṃgrāmam etenaiva yājayed bhrātṛvyavantaṃ yo vāsya priyaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:9338: syāt taṃ bhavaty ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavati yad vai tad indras turīya upasamapadyata
GV00maitrs_pu:9339: tasmād indraturīyaṃ dhenur anaḍvāhī dakṣiṇā yad vahinī tenāgneyī yad dhenuḥ satī
GV00maitrs_pu:9340: dāntā tena vāruṇī yad gaus tena raudrī yat payas tenaindrī rūpair evaināṃ samardhayatīndro
GV00maitrs_pu:9341: vai namuciṃ nālabhata sa raśmīn kulāyaṃ kṛtvānvārohad amum ādityaṃ taṃ vā anvamantrayata
GV00maitrs_pu:9342: sakhāyā asāveti so 'bravīn nāhaṃ haniṣyāmīti so 'bravīt saṃdhāṃ te saṃdadhai yathā
GV00maitrs_pu:9343: tvā na divā hanāni na naktaṃ na śuṣkeṇa nārdreṇeti tasya vā upodaye sūryasya nīhāraṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9344: saṃtatyāpāṃ phenena śiro 'chinat tad vā enam anvavartata mitradrug asīti pāpmā vai
GV00maitrs_pu:9345: namuceḥ śiraḥ pāpmā vā enaṃ tad anvavartata pāpmānaṃ vai sa tenāpāhata tat pāpmānam
GV00maitrs_pu:9346: evaitenāpahate 'pāṃ nyayanād apāmārgān āharanty āpo vai rakṣoghnīr apo rakṣāṃsi na
GV00maitrs_pu:9347: taranti rakṣasām apahatyai varo dakṣiṇā vareṇaiva varaṃ spṛṇoty ātmā hi vara ātmānaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9348: hi tasya tad anvavartata ye devāḥ puraḥsado agninetrā rakṣohaṇas te no 'vantu te
GV00maitrs_pu:9349: naḥ pāntu tebhyaḥ svāhety etaddevatyā vā imā diśo yathādevataṃ vā etad ābhyo digbhyo
GV00maitrs_pu:9350: 'dhi rakṣāṃsy apahanty anuparikrāmaṃ juhoti sarvābhya eva digbhyo 'dhi rakṣāṃsy apahantīdam
GV00maitrs_pu:9351: ahaṃ rakṣobhiḥ samūhāmy agne saṃdaha rakṣaḥ saṃdagdhaṃ rakṣā ity āha rakṣasāṃ dhvarāyai
GV00maitrs_pu:9352: rakṣasām antarityay atha yat punaḥ samūhya juhoti yābhya eva digbhyo 'dhi rakṣāṃsy
GV00maitrs_pu:9353: apāvadhīt tā bhāginīḥ karoty ahiṃsāyai rathaḥ pañcavāhī dakṣiṇā pañca diśaḥ pañca
GV00maitrs_pu:9358: somenejānaṃ yājayet saṃvatsaraṃ vā etasya chandāṃsi yātayāmāni bhavanti yaḥ somena
GV00maitrs_pu:9359: yajate chandāṃsi vai devikāś chandāṃsi vāvāsmā etad ayātayāmāni punaryāmāṇi karoti
GV00maitrs_pu:9360: rājasūyenābhiṣiṣicānaṃ yājayet paṣṭhauhī dakṣiṇāśāṃ vā eṣa upābhiṣiñcata āśā paṣṭhauhy
GV00maitrs_pu:9361: āśām evāsmā akaḥ paśukāmaṃ yājayec chandāṃsi vai devikāḥ paśavaś chandāṃsi gāyatry
GV00maitrs_pu:9362: anumatis triṣṭub rākā jagatī sinīvālī kuhūr anuṣṭub dhātā vaṣaṭkāro yā pūrvā paurṇamāsī
GV00maitrs_pu:9363: sānumatir yottarā sā rākā yā pūrvāmāvāsyā sā sinīvālī yottarā sā kuhūś candramā eva
GV00maitrs_pu:9364: dhātā yad dve avare dve pare tan mithunaṃ yat pūryate 'nyāṃ nānyāṃ tan mithunaṃ yat
GV00maitrs_pu:9365: paśyanty anyāṃ nānyāṃ tan mithunaṃ yad amāvāsyāyā adhi candramāḥ prajāyate tan mithunaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9366: tasmād evāsmai mithunāt paśūn prajanayati prajākāmaṃ yājayed dhātāram uttamaṃ kuryāt
GV00maitrs_pu:9367: striyo vai devikāḥ pumān dhātā parācīr vai prajā reto dadhate parācīṣv evāsu reto
GV00maitrs_pu:9368: dadhāti tad āhur na vai tena parādhatte yad antarā pravīyatā iti vyavadadhyād dhātāraṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9369: madhyataḥ sarvā evainā vṛṣamodinīḥ karoti tad āhur jāyata eva paścāccara iva tu bhavati
GV00maitrs_pu:9370: strībhyo hy enaṃ paścāt pariṇayantīti sa yadā jāyetātha dhātre purastān nirvaped
GV00maitrs_pu:9373: āmayāvinaṃ yājayed dhātāraṃ madhyataḥ kuryāt saṃvatsaro vai dhātā saṃvatsaro hi vā
GV00maitrs_pu:9374: etasya mugdho 'thaitasyāmayati saṃvatsaraṃ vāvāsmā etan madhyato 'cīkḷpad athainam
GV00maitrs_pu:9375: etasmān mithunāt prajanayatīśvarāṇi vā etam etāni chandāṃsy ṛte paśor aśāntāni nirmṛjaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:9376: paśur apy ālabhyaḥ śāntyā anirmārgāyaite vai paśavo yad vrīhayaś ca yavāś ca yad
GV00maitrs_pu:9377: vrīhimayaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati tenaiva paśur ālabhyate śāntyā anirmārgāya vīrasthā vā
GV00maitrs_pu:9378: anye paśavo 'vīrasthā anye ye purastātpuroḍāśās te vīrasthā ye paścātpuroḍāśās te
GV00maitrs_pu:9379: 'vīrasthā ye purastātpuroḍāśā bhuñjatas ta upatiṣṭhante prajāpatiṃ hy ete pratiṣṭhām
GV00maitrs_pu:9380: abhyasṛjyanta ye paścātpuroḍāśāḥ parā te bhavanti yāsu sthālīṣu somāḥ syus te caravaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:9381: syuḥ somo vai retodhāḥ prajananāya sarvavedasenejānaṃ yājayet paśubhir vā eṣa vyṛdhyate
GV00maitrs_pu:9382: yaḥ sarvaṃ dadāty atra vā eṣa jaghanyaṃ paśūn paśyati yatrainān vibhajati yatraivainān
GV00maitrs_pu:9383: vibhajati tata enān punar avarunddhe ya eva kaś ca somena yajeta taṃ yājayet saṃvatsaraṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9384: vā etasya chandāṃsi yātayāmāni bhavanti yaḥ somena yajate chandāṃsi vai devikāś chandāṃsi
GV00maitrs_pu:9386: athaitat triṣaṃyuktaṃ yat pūrvaṃ triṣaṃyuktam ita evāsmai tenordhvān imāṃl lokān
GV00maitrs_pu:9387: dādhāra yad uttaraṃ triṣaṃyuktam amuta evāsmai tenārvāca imāṃl lokān dādhāra tad
GV00maitrs_pu:9388: eṣāṃ vāvaite lokānāṃ vidhṛtyai yat pūrvaṃ triṣaṃyuktaṃ vīrajananaṃ tad yad uttaraṃ

GV00maitrs_pu:9533: āyuṣyā evainam abhyatikṣaranti varco vai hiraṇyaṃ varcasyā evainam abhyatikṣaranti
GV00maitrs_pu:9534: varuṇasya vā abhiṣicyamānasyāpa indriyaṃ vīryaṃ niraghnan yad rukmam antardadhātīndriyasya
GV00maitrs_pu:9535: vīryasyānirghātāya śatamāno bhavati śatakṣaraḥ śatāyur vai puruṣaḥ śatavīrya āyur
GV00maitrs_pu:9537: athaitāni pārthāni saṃvatsaro vai pārthāni saṃvatsaraṃ vā etan madhyataḥ praviśati
GV00maitrs_pu:9538: tasmād vā eṣa duḥparāṇodaḥ saṃvatsaraṃ hi madhyataḥ praviśati girī vā etau rājasūyasya
GV00maitrs_pu:9539: bārhaspatyam anyeṣām uttamaṃ bhavaty aindram anyeṣāṃ prathamaṃ vīryaṃ vai bṛhaspatir
GV00maitrs_pu:9540: vīryam indro vīrya evainam abhisaṃdhatta ādityanāmāni vā etāny ādityā vā imāḥ prajās
GV00maitrs_pu:9541: tābhya eva sūyate somasya tvā dyumnenāgnes tejasendrasyendriyeṇa viśveṣāṃ tvā devānāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9542: kratunābhiṣiñcāmīty etair evainam indriyair etābhir devatābhir abhiṣiñcatīndrasya
GV00maitrs_pu:9543: yonir asi janayety ato vā adhīndro 'jāyata svād evainaṃ yoner janayaty ati dyūn pāhīty
GV00maitrs_pu:9544: āha svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai samāvavṛtrann adharāg udak tā iti samunmārṣṭīndriyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9545: vā etad vīryam abhiṣicyamānasya vyavaiti tad eva samunmārṣṭi tenainaṃ samardhayaty
GV00maitrs_pu:9546: aindryā triṣṭubhā brahmānvety aindro vai rājanyas triṣṭupchandāḥ svenaivainaṃ chandasānvety
GV00maitrs_pu:9547: atho prajāpatir vai brahmā yajñasya prajāpater adhīndro 'sūyata prajāpater evādhi
GV00maitrs_pu:9548: sūyata indrasya vajro 'si vājasanis tvayāyaṃ vājaṃ sed iti ratham upāvaharati svayaiva
GV00maitrs_pu:9549: devatayā mitrāvaruṇayos tvā praśāstroḥ praśiṣā yunajmīti yunakti svayaiva devatayā
GV00maitrs_pu:9550: viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si sapatnaheti ratham abhyātiṣṭhaty ato vai viṣṇur imāṃl lokān udajayad
GV00maitrs_pu:9551: viṣṇor evojjitim anv imāṃl lokān ujjayati praibhyo lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ nudate marutāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9552: prasave jayeti māruta eva gaṇo bhūtvojjayati rājanyaṃ jināty antam evākramīt tad
GV00maitrs_pu:9553: asya na kaścanājyeya uñśiṣyate tasmai tām iṣum asyati tad asyāmoghāyāstam abhūd āptaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9554: manaḥ sam indriyeṇety uktvā vartate 'ntam eva gatvāvartata ātmano 'hiṃsāyay eṣa vajro

GV00maitrs_pu:9557: iyad asy āyur asy āyur me dhehīty āyur evāsmin dadhāti yuṅṅ asi varco 'si varco me

GV00maitrs_pu:9560: upāvaharati mitrasya hy etad rūpaṃ varuṇo 'sītīmaṃ varuṇasya hy etad rūpaṃ sad asi

GV00maitrs_pu:9562: tatra te hiraṇye dadāti sā dakṣiṇā hinasti khalu vā eṣa paśūn pṛthivīm abhyavarohan

GV00maitrs_pu:9565: adhāyi svāṃ tanvaṃ varuṇo 'suṣod iti varuṇasavo vā eṣa varuṇāyaivainaṃ prāha ni trito
GV00maitrs_pu:9566: jarimāṇaṃ na ānaḍ iti jarimāṇam evāsmin yunakti syonāsi suṣadeti syonā hy eṣā suṣadā
GV00maitrs_pu:9567: syonām āsīda suṣadām āsīdeti suṣadaivainaṃ sādayati //
GV00maitrs_pu:9570: iti varuṇasavo vā eṣa varuṇam evainam akar agnaye svāhā somāya svāhendrasyaujase

GV00maitrs_pu:9572: haṃsaḥ śuciṣad vasur antarikṣasad iti rathaṃ vā etat parivadati saha sārathinā rathavāhane

GV00maitrs_pu:9575: eṣa vajras tena me radhyeti sphyaṃ prayachati vajro vai sphyo vajreṇa vā etad rāṣṭraṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:9576: randhayate tam avarasparaṃ prayachati tenāvarasparaṃ rāṣṭraṃ randhayamāṇa eti tasmād

GV00maitrs_pu:9578: paṣṭhauhīṃ vidīvyanta āśāṃ vā eṣa upābhiṣiñcata āśā paṣṭhauhy āśām evāsmā akas tataś
GV00maitrs_pu:9581: iti catvāro vai puruṣā brāhmaṇo rājanyo vaiśyaḥ śūdras teṣām evainam udbhedayati

GV00maitrs_pu:9587: samāno vā eṣa yajñakratuḥ saṃvatsaraṃ bhavati vi vā etad daśapeyaś chidyate yad avabhṛtham

GV00maitrs_pu:9589: yajñasya saṃtatyā avichedāya yajño vai devebhyas tiro 'bhavat taṃ devāḥ saṃsṛpsv
GV00maitrs_pu:9590: anvaichan yat sāvitraḥ savitṛprasūtā evānvaichan yat sārasvato vāg vai sarasvatī

GV00maitrs_pu:9594: yad āgneyo 'gnir vai sarvā devatā devatāsv evānvaichan yat saumyaḥ saumīr vā oṣadhaya

GV00maitrs_pu:9598: vai te tad yajñam anvaichaṃs ta ārdhnuvaṃs tad ya etena yajata ṛdhnoti saptadaśaḥ

GV00maitrs_pu:9601: vṛtram ahaṃs tasyeme rūpāṇy upaitāṃ citrāṇīyam nakṣatrāṇy asau nakṣatrāṇāṃ vā avakāśe
GV00maitrs_pu:9602: puṇḍarīkaṃ jāyate kṣatrasya vā etad rūpaṃ kṣatrasyaiva rūpaṃ pratimuñcate dvādaśapuṇḍarīkā

GV00maitrs_pu:9606: rukmo hotur āgneyo vai hotā na vā etasmai vyuchati vy evāsmai vāsayati srag udgātuḥ sauryo vā udgātātho amum evāsmā ādityam āptvonnayati prāvepā adhvaryor yamā iva hy adhvaryuḥ //

GV00maitrs_pu:9610: neṣṭur agnīdho 'nyo yuktyā eva sthūri yavācitam achāvākasya sthūrīr iva hy eṣā hotrā

GV00maitrs_pu:9651: tena yathāpūrvam ātmanā vā agniṣṭomena ṛdhnoty ātmanā puṇyo bhavati prajā vā ukthāni

GV00maitrs_pu:9653: sāmabhyā eti pāpīyānt suṣuvāṇo bhavati yāni devarājānāṃ sāmāni yat tebhyo naiti tenaiva

GV00maitrs_pu:9667: apo vai vṛtraḥ paryaśayat tato yā atyamucyanta tā jīvā yajñiyā girir vai vṛtro yā

GV00maitrs_pu:9670: eva gṛhṇāti haviṣmatīr imā āpā iti haviṣmatīr eva gṛhṇāty āviḥsūrye gṛhyā uttaram
GV00maitrs_pu:9671: eva yajñakratum abhigṛhṇāty anuṣṭubhā gṛhṇāty anuṣṭub vai sarvāṇi chandāṃsi sarvair

GV00maitrs_pu:9674: evāvarunddhe 'po vai rātrir divā bhūte praviśati tasmād āpo divā kṛṣṇā apo 'har naktaṃ

GV00maitrs_pu:11054: tuvikṣatrām ajarantīm urūcīṃ suśarmāṇam aditiṃ supraṇītim //
GV00maitrs_pu:11057: yuvam etāni divi rocanāny agniś ca soma sakratū adhattam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11058: yuvaṃ sindhūṃr abhiśaster avadyād agnīṣomā amuñcataṃ gṛbhītān //MS_4,10.1//
GV00maitrs_pu:11066: agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad agniṃ stomena bodhayāgnā āyūṃṣi pavase 'gne tam adya ābhiṣ ṭe adya //
GV00maitrs_pu:11067: ebhir no arkair bhavā no arvāṅ svar ṇa jyotiḥ /

GV00maitrs_pu:11075: bhasan nu ṣa pra pūrvya iṣaṃ vurītāvase //
GV00maitrs_pu:11077: tvam agne saprathā asi juṣṭo hotā vareṇyaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11079: vṛṣā soma dyumaṃ asi vṛṣā deva vṛṣavrataḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11081: agnir jāto arocata ghnan dasyūn jyotiṣā tamaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11084: agre : FN emended. Ed: agne. cf. 2.7.8:85.14
GV00maitrs_pu:11085: imaṃ me varuṇa śrudhī havam adyā ca mṛḍaya /
GV00maitrs_pu:11089: tvaṃ hy agne agninā vipro vipreṇa sant satā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11091: pra sa mitra marto astu prayasvān yas ta āditya śikṣati vratena /
GV00maitrs_pu:11092: na hanyate na jīyate tvoto nainam aṃho aśnoty antito na dūrāt //
GV00maitrs_pu:11093: anamīvāsā īḍayā madanto mitajñavo varimann ā pṛthivyāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11094: ādityasya vratam upakṣiyanto vayaṃ mitrasya sumatau syāma //
GV00maitrs_pu:11098: tat sūryasya devatvaṃ tan mahitvaṃ madhyā kartor vitataṃ saṃjabhāra /
GV00maitrs_pu:11099: yaded ayukta haritaḥ sadhasthād ād rātrī vāsas tanute simasmai //
GV00maitrs_pu:11102: bhadrā aśvā haritaḥ sūryasya citrā etagvā anumādyāsaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11103: namasyanto diva ā pṛṣṭham asthuḥ pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti sadyaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11105: yad vo vayaṃ pramināma vratāni viduṣāṃ devā aviduṣṭarāsaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11106: agniṣ ṭad viśvam āpṛṇāti vidvān yebhir devaṃ ṛtubhiḥ kalpayāti //
GV00maitrs_pu:11108: ā devānām api panthām aganma yañ śaknavāma tad anu pravoḍhum /
GV00maitrs_pu:11109: agnir vidvānt sa yajāt sed u hotā so adhvarānt sa ṛtūn kalpayāti //
GV00maitrs_pu:11110: agniḥ śucivratatama ud agne śucayas tavākrandad agnir naktoṣāsā //
GV00maitrs_pu:11113: ā no yāhi tapasā janiṣvāgne pāvaka dīdyat /
GV00maitrs_pu:11116: abhi tvā deva savitar īśānaṃ vāryāṇām /
GV00maitrs_pu:11118: mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca nas tvām agne puṣkarād adhi tam u tvā dadhyaṅṅ ṛṣis tam u tvā pāthyo vṛṣā //
GV00maitrs_pu:11119: uta bruvantu jantavā ud agnir vṛtrahājani /
GV00maitrs_pu:11121: ā yaṃ haste na khādinaṃ śiśuṃ jātaṃ na bibhrati /
GV00maitrs_pu:11130: yajñena yajñam ayajanta devās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan /
GV00maitrs_pu:11131: te ha nākaṃ mihimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11132: samidho agnā ājyasya vyantu tanūnapād agnā ājyasya vetv iḍo agnā ājyasya vyantu barhir
GV00maitrs_pu:11133: agnā ājyasya vetu duro agnā ājyasya vyantūṣāsānaktāgnā ājyasya vītāṃ daivyā hotārāgnā
GV00maitrs_pu:11134: ājyasya vītāṃ tisro devīr agnā ājyasya vyantu svāhāgniṃ svāhā somaṃ svāhāgniṃ svāhāgniṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:11135: hotrāt svāhā devā ājyapā juṣāṇā agnā ājyasya vyantu //
GV00maitrs_pu:11136: agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi /
GV00maitrs_pu:11138: tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato 'gnir mūrdhā bhuvo yajñasya //
GV00maitrs_pu:11139: soma yās te mayobhuva ūtayaḥ santi dāśuṣe /
GV00maitrs_pu:11141: yā te dhāmāni divi yā pṛthivyāṃ yā parvateṣv oṣadhīṣv apsu /
GV00maitrs_pu:11142: tebhir no viśvaiḥ sumanā aheḍan rājant soma prati havyā gṛbhāya //
GV00maitrs_pu:11143: tat savitur vareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi /
GV00maitrs_pu:11145: acittī yac cakṛmā daivye jane dīnair dakṣaiḥ prabhūtī puruṣatvatā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11146: deveṣu ca savitar mānuṣeṣu ca tvaṃ no atra suvatād anāgasaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11148: pāvakā naḥ sarasvaty ā no divaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11149: pūṣā gā anvetu naḥ pūṣā rakṣatv arvataḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11151: śukraṃ te anyad yajataṃ te anyad viṣurūpe ahanī dyaur ivāsi /
GV00maitrs_pu:11152: viśvā hi māyā avasi svadhāvo bhadrā te pūṣann iha rātir astu //
GV00maitrs_pu:11155: pra citram arkaṃ gṛṇate turāya mārutāya svatavase bharadhvam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11156: ye sahāṃsi sahasā sahante rejate agne pṛthivī makhebhyaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11161: dyāvā naḥ pṛthivī imaṃ sidhram adya divispṛśam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11163: pra pūrvaje pitarā navyasībhir gīrbhiḥ kṛṇudhvaṃ sadane ṛtasya /
GV00maitrs_pu:11164: ā no dyāvāpṛthivī daivyena janena yātaṃ mahi vāṃ varūtham //
GV00maitrs_pu:11167: devaṃ barhir vasuvane vasudheyasya vetu devīr dvāro vasuvane vasudheyasya vyantu
GV00maitrs_pu:11168: devī uṣāsānaktā vasuvane vasudheyasya vītāṃ devī joṣṭrī vasuvane vasudheyasya vītāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:11169: devī ūrjāhutī vasuvane vasudheyasya vītāṃ devā daivyā hotārā vasuvane vasudheyasya
GV00maitrs_pu:11170: vītāṃ devīs tisras tisro devīr vasuvane vasudheyasya vyantu devo narāśaṃso vasuvane
GV00maitrs_pu:11171: vasudheyasya vetu devo agniḥ sviṣṭakṛt sudraviṇā mandraḥ kaviḥ satyamanmāyajī hotā
GV00maitrs_pu:11172: hoturhotur āyajīyān agne yān devān ayāḍ yaṃ apiprer ye te hotre amatsata tāṃ sasanuṣīṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:11173: hotrāṃ devaṃgamāṃ divi deveṣu yajñam erayemaṃ sviṣṭakṛc cāgne hotābhūr vasuvane vasudheyasya namovāke vīhi //
GV00maitrs_pu:11175: pra devaṃ devyā dhiyā bharatā jātavedasam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11177: ayam u ṣya pra devayur hotā yajñāya nīyate /
GV00maitrs_pu:11178: ratho na yor abhīvṛto ghṛṇīvāñ cetati tmanā //
GV00maitrs_pu:11180: ayam agnir uruṣyaty amṛtād iva janmanaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11181: sahasaś cit sahīyān devo jīvātave kṛtaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11183: agne viśvebhiḥ svanīka devair ūrṇāvantaṃ prathamaḥ sīda yonim /
GV00maitrs_pu:11184: kulāyinaṃ ghṛtavantaṃ savitre yajñaṃ naya yajamānāya sādhu //
GV00maitrs_pu:11186: tvaṃ dūtas tvam u naḥ paraspās tvaṃ vasyā ā vṛṣabha praṇetā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11187: agne tokasya nas tane tanūnām aprayuchan dīdyad bodhi gopāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11188: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva divedive /
GV00maitrs_pu:11192: indrāgnī rocanā divaḥ pari vājeṣu bhūṣathaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11194: pra carṣaṇibhyaḥ pṛtanāhaveṣu pra pṛthivyā riricāthe divaś ca /
GV00maitrs_pu:11195: pra sindhubhyaḥ pra giribhyo mahitvā prendrāgnī viśvā bhuvanāty anyā //
GV00maitrs_pu:11197: maruto yad dha vo divaḥ sumnāyanto havāmahe /
GV00maitrs_pu:11199: yā vaḥ śarma śaśamānāya santi tridhātūni dāśuṣe yachatādhi /
GV00maitrs_pu:11200: asmabhyaṃ tāni maruto viyanta rayiṃ no dhatta vṛṣaṇaḥ suvīram //
GV00maitrs_pu:11201: imaṃ me varuṇa tat tvā yāmi kayā naḥ ko adya piprīhi devān agne yad adyāpsv agne sadhiṣ ṭava //
GV00maitrs_pu:11202: apsu me somo abravīd antar viśvāni bheṣajā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11205: ava te heḍo varuṇa namobhir ava yajñebhir īmahe havirbhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11206: kṣayann asmabhyam asura pracetā rājann enāṃsi śiśrathaḥ kṛtāni //
GV00maitrs_pu:11207: tvaṃ no agne varuṇasya vidvān devasya heḍo 'vayāsisīṣṭhāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11208: yajiṣṭho vahnitamaḥ śośucāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi pramumugdhy asmat //
GV00maitrs_pu:11209: sa tvaṃ no agne 'avamo bhavotī nediṣṭho asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau /
GV00maitrs_pu:11210: avayakṣva no varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhi mṛḍīkaṃ suhavo na edhi //MS_4,10.4//
GV00maitrs_pu:11212: agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat tvaṃ somāsi satpatiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11215: sainānīkena suvidatro asme yaṣṭā devaṃ āyajiṣṭhaḥ svasti /
GV00maitrs_pu:11216: adabdho gopā uta naḥ paraspā agne dyumad uta revad didīhi //
GV00maitrs_pu:11218: sāṃtapanā idaṃ havir marutas taj jujuṣṭana /
GV00maitrs_pu:11220: yo no maruto abhi durhṛṇāyus tiraś cittāni vasavo jighāṃsati /
GV00maitrs_pu:11221: druhaḥ pāśān prati sa mucīṣṭa tapiṣṭhena hanmanā hantanā tam //
GV00maitrs_pu:11223: agniḥ pratnena manmanā soma gīrbhiṣ ṭvā vayam //
GV00maitrs_pu:11226: pra budhnyā va īrate mahāṃsi pra nāmāni prayajyavas tiradhvam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11227: sahasriyaṃ damyaṃ bhāgam etaṃ gṛhamedhīyaṃ maruto juṣadhvam //
GV00maitrs_pu:11230: agnim īḍe purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11233: krīḍaṃ vaḥ śardho mārutam anarvāṇaṃ ratheśubham /
GV00maitrs_pu:11235: atyāso na ye marutaḥ svañco yakṣadṛśo na śubhayanta maryāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11236: te harmyeṣṭhāḥ śiśavo na śubhrā vatsāso na prakrīḍinaḥ payodhāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11240: śnathad vṛtram uta sanoti vājam indrā yo agnī sahurī saparyāt /
GV00maitrs_pu:11241: irajyantā vasavyasya bhūreḥ sahastamā sahasā vājayantā //
GV00maitrs_pu:11243: yuje rathaṃ gāeṣaṇaṃ haribhyām upa brahmāṇi jujuṣāṇam asthuḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11244: vibādhiṣṭa sya rodasī mahitvendro vṛtrāṇy apratī jaghanvān //
GV00maitrs_pu:11249: ā no agne sucetunā rayiṃ viśvāyupoṣasam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11251: tvaṃ soma mahe bhagaṃ tvaṃ yūna ṛtāyate /
GV00maitrs_pu:11253: tvaṃ soma pracikito manīṣā tvaṃ rajiṣṭham anu neṣi panthām /
GV00maitrs_pu:11254: tava praṇītī pitaro na indo deveṣu ratnam abhajanta dhīrāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11255: tvayā hi naḥ pitaraḥ soma pūrve karmāṇi cakruḥ pavamāna dhīrāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11256: vanvann avātaḥ paridhīṃr aporṇu vīrebhir aśvair maghavā bhavā naḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11257: tvaṃ soma pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidāno 'nu dyāvāpṛthivī ātatantha /
GV00maitrs_pu:11258: tasmai ta indo haviṣā vidhema vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
GV00maitrs_pu:11259: barhiṣadaḥ pitara ūty arvāg imā vo havyā cakṛmā juṣadhvam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11260: ta āgatāvasā śaṃtamenāthā naḥ śaṃ yor arapo dadhātana //
GV00maitrs_pu:11261: upahūtāḥ pitaraḥ somyāso barhiṣyeṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu /
GV00maitrs_pu:11262: ta āgamantu ta iha śruvantv adhibruvantu te 'vantv asmān //
GV00maitrs_pu:11263: āhaṃ pitṝnt suvidatraṃ avitsi napātaṃ ca vikramaṇaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11264: barhiṣadaḥ svadhayā ye sutasya bhajanta pitvas ta ihāgamiṣṭhāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11265: idaṃ pitṛbhyo namo astv adya ye pūrvāso ya uparāsa īyuḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11266: ye pārthive rajasy ā niṣattā ye vā nūnaṃ suvṛjanāsu vikṣu //
GV00maitrs_pu:11267: udīratām avarā ut parāsā un madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11268: asuṃ ya īyur avṛkā ṛtajñās te no 'vantu pitaro haveṣu //
GV00maitrs_pu:11269: agniṣvāttā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ pitaro mṛḍatā su naḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11271: agniṣvāttān ṛtumato havāmahe narāśaṃse somapīthaṃ ya āśuḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11272: te no viprāsaḥ suhavā mṛḍantu śaṃ no bhavantu dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
GV00maitrs_pu:11273: agniṣvāttāḥ pitarā eha gachata sadaḥsadaḥ sadata supraṇītayaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11274: attā havīṃṣi prayatāni barhiṣy athā rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ dadhātana //
GV00maitrs_pu:11275: sa pratnathā sahasā jāyamānaḥ sadyaḥ kāvyāni baḍ adhatta viśvā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11276: āpaś ca mitraṃ dhiṣaṇā ca sādhan devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
GV00maitrs_pu:11277: sa pūrvayā nividā kavyatāyor imāḥ prajā ajanayan manūnām /
GV00maitrs_pu:11278: vivasvatā cakṣasā dyām apaś ca devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
GV00maitrs_pu:11280: ye tātṛṣur devatrā jehamānā hotrāvidaḥ stomataṣṭāso arkaiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11281: āgne yāhi suvidatrebhir arvāk satyaiḥ kavyaiḥ pitṛbhir gharmasadbhiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11282: pra vāyum achā bṛhatī manīṣā bṛhadrayiṃ viśvavāraṃ rathaprām /
GV00maitrs_pu:11283: dyutadyāmā niyutaḥ patyamānaḥ kaviḥ kavim iyakṣasi prayajyo //
GV00maitrs_pu:11284: pra yābhir yāsi dāśvāṃsam achā niyudbhir vāya iṣṭaye duroṇe /
GV00maitrs_pu:11285: ni no rayiṃ subhojasaṃ yuvasva ni vīraṃ gavyam aśvyaṃ ca rādhaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11286: indraṃ vayaṃ śunāsīram asmin yajñe havāmahe /
GV00maitrs_pu:11288: so 'horātraiḥ so 'rdhamāsaiḥ sa māsaiḥ sa ṛtubhiḥ pari yajñaṃ babhūva /
GV00maitrs_pu:11289: saṃvatsarasya mahimānam etaṃ śunāsīram indram adyāhuvema //
GV00maitrs_pu:11290: sapta tvā harito rathe vahanti deva sūrya /
GV00maitrs_pu:11295: indrāgnī rocanā divaḥ pra carṣaṇibhya indrāgnī navatiṃ puraḥ śnathad vṛtram //
GV00maitrs_pu:11296: juṣṭo damūnā atithir duroṇa imaṃ no yajñam upayāhi vidvān /
GV00maitrs_pu:11297: viśvā agne abhiyujo vihatyā śatrūyatām ābharā bhojanāni //
GV00maitrs_pu:11298: agne śardha mahate saubhagāya tava dyumnāny uttamāni santu /
GV00maitrs_pu:11299: saṃ jāspatyaṃ suyamam ākṛṇuṣva śatrūyatām abhitiṣṭhā mahāṃsi //
GV00maitrs_pu:11300: pra vām arcanty ukthino nīthāvido jaritāraḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11302: upo ha yad vidathaṃ vājino gur dhībhir viprāḥ pramatim ichamānāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11303: arvanto na kāṣṭhāṃ nakṣamāṇā indrāgnī johuvato naras te //
GV00maitrs_pu:11304: agnir dadāti satpatiṃ sāsāha yo yudhā nṛbhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11308: yā vāṃ santi puruspṛho niyuto dāśuṣe narā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11310: śuciṃ nu stomaṃ navajātam adyendrāgnī vṛtrahaṇā juṣethām /
GV00maitrs_pu:11311: ubhā hi vāṃ suhavā johavīmi tā vājaṃ sadya uśate dheṣṭhā //
GV00maitrs_pu:11312: pūṣā gā anvetu naḥ śukraṃ te anyat //
GV00maitrs_pu:11314: gām aśvaṃ poṣayitnv ā sa no mṛḍātīdṛśe //
GV00maitrs_pu:11315: madhumatīr oṣadhīr dyāvā āpo madhuman no bhavatv antarikṣam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11316: kṣetrasya patir madhumān no astv ariṣyanto anv enaṃ carema //
GV00maitrs_pu:11318: sakhāyaḥ saṃ vaḥ samyañcam iṣaṃ stomaṃ cāgnaye /
GV00maitrs_pu:11323: vaiśvānara tava dhāmāny ācake yebhiḥ svarvid abhavo vicakṣaṇa /
GV00maitrs_pu:11324: jāta āpṛṇo bhuvanāni rodasī agne tā viśvā paribhūr asi tmanā //
GV00maitrs_pu:11327: tvaṃ no agne sanaye dhanānāṃ yaśasaṃ kāruṃ kṛṇuhi stavānaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11328: śakema karmāpasā navena devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11329: vaiśvānarasya sumatau syāma rājā hi kaṃ bhuvanānām abhiśrīḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11330: ito jāto viśvam idaṃ vicaṣṭe vaiśvānaro yatate sūryeṇa //
GV00maitrs_pu:11331: asmākam agne maghavatsu dhārayānāmi kṣatram ajaraṃ suvīram /
GV00maitrs_pu:11332: vayaṃ jayema śatinaṃ sahasriṇaṃ vaiśvānara vājam agne tavotibhiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11333: viśvaṃ vivyāca pṛthivīva puṣṭam anyam anyat pratigṛbhṇāty āyat /
GV00maitrs_pu:11334: vaiśvānarasya mahato mahimnā syonam annaṃ madhuman me kṛṇomi //
GV00maitrs_pu:11335: sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomani vratāny agnir vratapā arakṣata /
GV00maitrs_pu:11336: vy antarikṣam amimīta sukratur vaiśvānaro mahinā nākam aspṛśat //
GV00maitrs_pu:11338: trīṇy āyūṃṣi tava jātavedas tisra ājānīr uṣasas te agne /
GV00maitrs_pu:11339: tābhir devānām avo yakṣi vidvān athā bhava yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11343: iḍāyās tvā pade vayaṃ dadhikrāvṇo akāriṣam //
GV00maitrs_pu:11344: dadhikrāvāṇaṃ bubudhāno agnim upa bruva uṣasaṃ sūryaṃ gām /
GV00maitrs_pu:11345: bradhnaṃ maṃścator varuṇasya babhruṃ te viśvāsmad duritā yāvayantu //
GV00maitrs_pu:11346: agnir hotā nyasīdad yajīyān upasthe mātuḥ surabhā uloke /
GV00maitrs_pu:11347: yuvā kaviḥ puruniṣṭha ṛtāvā dhartā kṛṣṭīnām uta madhya iddhaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11348: sādhvīm akar devavītiṃ no adya yajñasya jihvām avidāma guhyam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11349: sa āyur āgāt surabhir vasāno bhadrām akar devahūtiṃ no adya //
GV00maitrs_pu:11351: mahaś cid agnā enaso abhīka ūrvād devānām uta martyānām /
GV00maitrs_pu:11352: mā te sakhāyaḥ sadam id riṣāma yachā tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11354: ghṛtavatī bhuvanānām abhiśriyorvī pṛthvī madhudughe supeśasā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11355: dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇasya dharmaṇā viṣkabhite ajare bhūriretasā //MS_4,11.1//
GV00maitrs_pu:11358: īḍe agniṃ vipaścitaṃ girā yajñasya sādhanam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11360: agne śakema te vayaṃ yamaṃ devasya vājinaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11364: upa chāyām iva ghṛṇer aganma śarma te vayam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11366: agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat tvaṃ somāsi satpatir agnīṣomā yuvam etāni śrīṇām udāraḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11367: somasya mā tavasaṃ vakṣy agne vahniṃ cakartha vidathe yajadhyai /
GV00maitrs_pu:11368: devaṃ achā dīdyad yuñje adriṃ śamāye agne tanvaṃ juṣasva //
GV00maitrs_pu:11369: somāpūṣaṇā jananā rayīṇāṃ jananā divo jananā pṛthivyāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11370: jātau viśvasya bhuvanasya gopau devā akṛṇvann amṛtasya nābhim //
GV00maitrs_pu:11372: imau devau jāyamānau juṣantemau tamāṃsi gūhatām ajuṣṭā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11373: ābhyām indraḥ pakvam āmāsv antaḥ somāpūṣabhyāṃ janad usriyāsu //
GV00maitrs_pu:11374: uta no brahman haviṣa uktheṣu devahūtamaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11376: nū no rāsva sahasravat tokavat puṣṭimad vasu /
GV00maitrs_pu:11378: tvā yujā tava tat soma sakhya indro apo manave sasrutas kaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11379: ahann ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn apāvṛṇod apihiteva khāni //
GV00maitrs_pu:11380: ṛdūdareṇa sakhyā saceya yo mā na riṣyed dharyaśva pītaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11381: ayaṃ yaḥ somo nyadhāyy asme tasmā indraṃ pratiram emy āyuḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11382: tvaṃ no agne sa tvaṃ no agne 'gniṃ vaḥ pūrvyaṃ girā //
GV00maitrs_pu:11383: makṣū devavato rathaḥ śūro vā pṛtsu kāsucit /
GV00maitrs_pu:11384: devānāṃ ya in mano yajamānā iyakṣaty abhīd ayajvano bhuvat //
GV00maitrs_pu:11386: nakiṣ ṭaṃ karmaṇā naśan na prayoṣan na yoṣati /
GV00maitrs_pu:11387: devānāṃ ya in mano yajamānā iyakṣaty abhīd ayajvano bhuvat //
GV00maitrs_pu:11388: asad atra suvīryam uta tyad āśvaśvyam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11389: devānāṃ ya in mano yajamānā iyakṣaty abhīd ayajvano bhuvat //
GV00maitrs_pu:11390: upakṣaranti sindhavo mayobhuva ījānaṃ ca yakṣyamāṇaṃ ca dhenavaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11391: pṛṇantaṃ ca papuriṃ ca śravasyavo ghṛtasya dhārā upayanti viśvataḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11392: somārudrā yuvam etāny asme viśvā tanūṣu bheṣajāni dhattam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11393: avasyataṃ muñcataṃ yan no asti tanūṣu baddhaṃ kṛtam eno asmat //
GV00maitrs_pu:11394: somārudrā dhārayethām asuryaṃ pra vām iṣṭayo 'ram aśnuvantu /
GV00maitrs_pu:11395: damedame sapta ratnā dadhānā śaṃ no bhūtaṃ dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
GV00maitrs_pu:11396: somārudrā vivṛhataṃ viṣūcīm amīvā yā no gayam āviveśa /
GV00maitrs_pu:11397: āre bādhethāṃ nirṛtiṃ parācair asme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu //
GV00maitrs_pu:11398: tigmāyudhau tigmahetī suśevau somārudrā iha su mṛḍataṃ naḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11399: mumuktam asmān grasitān abhīke prayachataṃ vṛṣaṇā śaṃtamāni //
GV00maitrs_pu:11400: agnāviṣṇū sajoṣasāgnāviṣṇū mahi dhāma priyaṃ vām //
GV00maitrs_pu:11401: agnāviṣṇū mahi tad vāṃ mahitvaṃ vītho ghṛtasya guhyā juṣāṇā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11402: damedame suṣṭutī vāvṛdhānā nu vāṃ jihvā ghṛtam ācaraṇyat //
GV00maitrs_pu:11404: sarasvaty abhi no neṣi vasyo māpa spharīḥ payasā mā nā ādhak /
GV00maitrs_pu:11405: juṣasva naḥ sakhyā veśyā ca mā tvat kṣetrāṇy araṇyāni ganma //
GV00maitrs_pu:11409: evā pitre viśvadevāya vṛṣṇe yajñair vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11410: bṛhaspate suprajā vīravanto vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
GV00maitrs_pu:11411: ā no mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtair gavyūtim ukṣatam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11413: pra bāhavā sisṛtaṃ jīvase nā ā no gavyūtim ukṣataṃ ghṛtena /
GV00maitrs_pu:11414: ā no jane śravayataṃ yuvānā śrutaṃ me mitrāvaruṇā havemā //
GV00maitrs_pu:11418: ā savaṃ savitur yathā bhagasyeva bhujiṃ huve /
GV00maitrs_pu:11423: ā ye tanvanti raśmibhis tiraḥ samudram arṇavam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11425: ā vo yantūdavāhāso adya vṛṣṭiṃ ye viśve maruto junanti /
GV00maitrs_pu:11426: ayaṃ yo agnirmarutaḥ samiddha etaṃ juṣadhvaṃ kavayo yuvānaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11427: yaṃ tvā devāpiḥ śuśucāno agna ārṣṭiṣeṇo manuṣyaḥ samīdhe /
GV00maitrs_pu:11428: viśvebhir devair anumadyamānaḥ pra parjanyam īrayā vṛṣṭimantam //
GV00maitrs_pu:11429: agne bādhasva vi mṛdho vi durgahāpāmīvām apa rakṣāṃsi sedha /
GV00maitrs_pu:11430: asmāt samudrād bṛhato divo no 'pāṃ bhūmānam upa naḥ sṛjeha //
GV00maitrs_pu:11431: priyā vo nāma huve turāṇām ā yat tṛpan maruto vāvaśānaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11432: śriyase kaṃ bhānubhiḥ saṃmimikṣire te raśmmibhis ta ṛkvabhiḥ sukhādayaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11433: te vāśīmanta iṣmiṇo abhīravo vidre priyasya mārutasya dhāmnaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11435: praiṣām ajmeṣu vithureva rejate bhūmir yāmeṣu yad dha yuñjate śubhe /
GV00maitrs_pu:11436: te krīḍayo dhunayo bhrājadṛṣṭyaḥ svayaṃ mahitvaṃ panayanta dhūtayaḥ //MS_4,11.2//
GV00maitrs_pu:11437: kayā śubhā savayasaḥ sanīḍāḥ samānyā marutaḥ saṃmimikṣuḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11438: kayā matī kutā etāsa ete 'rcanti śuṣmaṃ vṛṣaṇo vasūyā //
GV00maitrs_pu:11439: kasya brahmāṇi jujuṣur yuvānaḥ ko adhvare marutā āvavarta /
GV00maitrs_pu:11440: śyenaṃ iva dhrajato antarikṣe kena mahā manasā rīramāma //
GV00maitrs_pu:11441: kutas tvam indra māhinaḥ sann eko yāsi satpate kiṃ ta itthā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11442: saṃpṛchase samarāṇaḥ śubhānair voces tan no harivo yat te asme //
GV00maitrs_pu:11443: brahmāṇi me matayaḥ śaṃ sutāsaḥ śuṣma iyarti prabhṛto me adriḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11444: āśāsate pratiharyanty ukthemā harī vahatas tā no acha //
GV00maitrs_pu:11445: ato vayam antamebhir yujānāḥ svakṣatrebhis tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11446: mahobhir ekam upayujmahe nv indraḥ svadhām anu hi no babhūtha //
GV00maitrs_pu:11448: kva syā vo marutaḥ svadhāsīd yan mām ekaṃ samadhattāhihatye /
GV00maitrs_pu:11449: ahaṃ hy ugras taviṣas tuviṣmān viśvasya śatror anamaṃ vadhasnaiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11450: bhūri cakartha yujyebhir asme samānebhir vṛṣabha pauṃsyebhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11451: bhūrīṇi hi kṛṇavāmā śaviṣṭhendraḥ kṛtvā maruto yad vaśāma //
GV00maitrs_pu:11452: vadhīṃ vṛtraṃ maruta indriyeṇa svena bhāmena taviṣo babhūvān /
GV00maitrs_pu:11453: aham etā manave viśvaścandrāḥ sugā apaś cakara vajrabāhuḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11454: anuttam ā te maghavan nakir ṇu na tvāvaṃ asti devatā vidānaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11455: na jāyamāno naśate na jāto yāni kariṣyā kṛṇuhi pravṛddha //
GV00maitrs_pu:11456: ekasya cin me vibhv astv ojo yā nu dadhṛṣvān kṛṇavai manīṣā //
GV00maitrs_pu:11457: ahaṃ hy ugro maruto vidāno yāni cyavam indrā id īśa eṣām //
GV00maitrs_pu:11458: amandan mā marutaḥ stomo atra yan me naraḥ śrutyaṃ brahma cakra /
GV00maitrs_pu:11459: indrāya vṛṣṇe sumakhāya mahyaṃ sakhye sakhāyas tanve tanūbhiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11460: eved ete prati mā rocamānā anedyaḥ śravā eṣo dadhānāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11461: saṃcakṣyā marutaś candravarṇā achānta me chadayāthā ca nūnam //
GV00maitrs_pu:11462: ko nv atra maruto māmahe vaḥ prayātana sakhīṃr achā sakhāyaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11463: manmāni citrā apivātayanta eṣāṃ bhūta navedā ma ṛtānām //
GV00maitrs_pu:11464: ā yad duvasyād duvase na kārur asmāṃś cakre mānyasya medhā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11465: o ṣū varta maruto vipram achemā brahmāṇi jaritā vo arcat //
GV00maitrs_pu:11466: eṣa vaḥ stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11467: eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //MS_4,11.3//
GV00maitrs_pu:11468: indraṃ vo viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11470: ā te śuṣmo vṛṣabha etu paścād ottarād adharād ā purastāt /
GV00maitrs_pu:11471: ā viśvato abhi sametv arvāṅ indra dyumnaṃ svarvad dhehy asme //
GV00maitrs_pu:11472: maruto yad dha vo divo yā vaḥ śarma //
GV00maitrs_pu:11474: ā tū na indra vṛtrahann asmākam ardham āgahi /
GV00maitrs_pu:11476: tvaṃ mahaṃ indra tubhyaṃ ha kṣā anu kṣatraṃ maṃhanā manyata dyauḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11477: tvaṃ vṛtraṃ śavasā jaghanvānt sṛjaḥ sindhūṃr ahinā jagrasānān //
GV00maitrs_pu:11478: maruto yad dha vo balaṃ janaṃ acucyavītana /
GV00maitrs_pu:11480: ṛṣṭayo vo maruto aṃsayor adhi sahā ojo bāhvor vo balaṃ hitam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11481: nṛmṇā śīrṣasv āyudhā ratheṣu no viśvā vaḥ śrīr adhi tanūṣu pipiśe //
GV00maitrs_pu:11482: purutrā hi sadṛṅṅ asi viśo viśvā anu prabhuḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11486: agne nayā devānāṃ tvam agne vratapā asi yad vo vayam //
GV00maitrs_pu:11487: tvam agne vratabhṛñ śucir agne devaṃ ihāvaha /
GV00maitrs_pu:11490: vratā nu bibhrad vratapā adabdho yajāno devo ajaraḥ suvīraḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11491: dadhad ratnāni sumṛḍīko agne gopāya no jīvase jātavedaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11494: tubhyaṃ bharanti kṣitayo yaviṣṭha balim agne antitā ota dūrāt /
GV00maitrs_pu:11495: ā bhandiṣṭhasya sumatiṃ cikiddhi mahat te agne mahi śarma bhadram //
GV00maitrs_pu:11496: tvām agne vājasātamaṃ viprā vardhanti suṣṭutam /
GV00maitrs_pu:11498: ayaṃ no agnir anīkair dveṣo ardaya sainānīkenedaṃ viṣṇuḥ pra tad viṣṇuḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11499: ā vo rājānam adhvarasya rudraṃ hotāraṃ satyayajaṃ rodasyoḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11500: agniṃ purā tanayitnor acittād dhiraṇyarūpam avase kṛṇudhvam //
GV00maitrs_pu:11501: kad dhiṣṇyāsu vṛdhasāno agne kad vātāya pratavase śubhaṃye /
GV00maitrs_pu:11502: parijmane nāsatyāya kṣe bravaḥ kad agne rudrāya nṛghne //
GV00maitrs_pu:11505: vātopadhūta iṣito vaśaṃ anu triṣu yad annā veviṣad vitiṣṭhase /
GV00maitrs_pu:11506: ā te yatante rathyo yathā pṛthak śardhāṃsy agne ajarāṇi dhakṣataḥ //MS_4,11.4//
GV00maitrs_pu:11508: sa te jānāti sumatiṃ yaviṣṭha ya īvate brahmaṇe gātum airat /
GV00maitrs_pu:11509: viśvāny asmai sudināni rāyo dyumnāny aryo vi duro abhidyaut //
GV00maitrs_pu:11510: sed agne astu subhagaḥ sudānur yas tvā nityena haviṣā ya ukthaiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11511: piprīṣati sva āyuṣi duroṇe viśved asmai sudinā sāsad iṣṭiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11512: arcāmi te sumatiṃ ghoṣy arvāk saṃ te vāvātā jaratām iyaṃ gīḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11513: svaśvās tvā surathā marjayemāsme kṣatrāṇi dhārayer anu dyūn //
GV00maitrs_pu:11514: iha tvā bhūry ācared upa tman doṣāvastar dīdivāṃsam anu dyūn /
GV00maitrs_pu:11515: krīḍantas tvā sumanasaḥ sapemābhi dyumnā tasthivāṃso janānām //
GV00maitrs_pu:11516: yas tvā svaśvaḥ suhiraṇyo agna upayāti vasumatā rathena /
GV00maitrs_pu:11517: tasya trātā bhavasi tasya sakhā yas ta ātithyam ānuṣag jujoṣat //
GV00maitrs_pu:11518: maho rujāmi bandhutā vacobhis tan mā pitur gotamād anviyāya /
GV00maitrs_pu:11519: tvaṃ no asya vacasaś cikiddhi hotar yaviṣṭha sukrato damūnāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11522: te pāyavaḥ sadhryañco niṣadyāgne tava naḥ pāntv amūra //
GV00maitrs_pu:11523: ye pāyavo māmateyaṃ te agne paśyanto andhaṃ duritād arakṣan /
GV00maitrs_pu:11524: rarakṣa tānt sukṛto viśvavedā dipsantā id ripavo nāha debhuḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11525: tvayā vayaṃ sadhanyas tvotās tava praṇīty aśyāma vājān /
GV00maitrs_pu:11526: ubhā śaṃsā sūdaya satyatāte 'nuṣṭhuyā kṛṇuhy ahrayāṇa //
GV00maitrs_pu:11527: ayā te agne samidhā vidhema prati stomaṃ śasyamānaṃ gṛbhāya /
GV00maitrs_pu:11528: dahāśaso rakṣasaḥ pāhy asmān druho nido mitramaho avadyāt //
GV00maitrs_pu:11533: uta no deva devaṃ achā voco viduṣṭaraḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11535: tvaṃ ha yad yaviṣṭhya sahasaḥ sūna āhuta /
GV00maitrs_pu:11539: taṃ nemim ṛbhavo yathā namasva sahūtibhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11541: tasmai nūnam abhidyave vācā virūpa nityayā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11543: kam u ṣvid asya senayāgner apākacakṣasaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11545: mā no devānāṃ viśaḥ prasnātīr ivosrāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11547: mā naḥ samasya dūḍhyaḥ paridveṣaso aṃhatiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11549: namas te agnā ojase gṛṇanti deva kṛṣṭayaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11551: imaṃ yajñam idaṃ vaco jujuṣāṇa upāgahi /
GV00maitrs_pu:11553: kuvit su no gaiṣṭaye 'gne saṃveṣiṣo rayim /
GV00maitrs_pu:11555: mā no asmin mahādhane parā varg bhārabhṛd yathā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11559: anyam asmad bhiyā iyam agne siṣaktu duchunā /
GV00maitrs_pu:11561: idaṃ vām āsye haviḥ priyam indrābṛhaspatī /
GV00maitrs_pu:11565: ehy u ṣu bravāṇi te 'gna itthetarā giraḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11569: tyān nu kṣatriyaṃ ava ādityān yāciṣāmahe /
GV00maitrs_pu:11571: yebhyo mātā madhumat pinvate payaḥ pīyūṣaṃ dyaur aditir adribarhāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11572: ukthaśuṣmān vṛṣabharānt svapnasas taṃ ādityaṃ anumadāt svastaye //
GV00maitrs_pu:11573: dhārayanta ādityāso jagat sthā devā viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11574: dīrghādhiyo rakṣamāṇā asuryam ṛtāvānaś cayamānā ṛṇāni //
GV00maitrs_pu:11575: trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta hiraṇyayā śucayo dhārapūtāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11576: avṛjinā anavadyā adabdhā uruśaṃsā ṛjave martyāya //
GV00maitrs_pu:11577: tat sūryasya bhadrā aśvā hiraṇyagarbho yaḥ prāṇataḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11578: bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāno maho jyotiṣaḥ parame vyoman /
GV00maitrs_pu:11579: saptāsyas tuvijāto raveṇa vi saptaraśmir adhamat tamāṃsi //
GV00maitrs_pu:11581: yadā vājam asanad viśvarūpam ā dyām arukṣad uttarāṇi sadma /
GV00maitrs_pu:11582: bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vardhayanto nānā santo bibhrato jyotir āsām //
GV00maitrs_pu:11585: sa suṣṭubhā sa ṛkvatā gaṇena valaṃ ruroja phaligaṃ raveṇa /
GV00maitrs_pu:11586: bṛhaspatir usriyā havyasūdaḥ kanikradad vāvaśatīr udājat //
GV00maitrs_pu:11587: brahmaṇaspate tvam asya yantā sūktasya bodhi tanayaṃ ca jinva /
GV00maitrs_pu:11588: viśvaṃ tad bhadraṃ yad avanti devā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:11589: brahmaṇaspate sūyamasya viśvahā rāyaḥ syāma rathyo vayasvataḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:11590: vīreṣu vīraṃ upapṛṅdhi nas tvaṃ yad īśāno brahmaṇā veṣi me havam //

GV00maitrs_pu:12397: viśo yena gachatho devayantīḥ kutrā cid yāmam aśvinā dadhānā //
GV00maitrs_pu:12398: svaśvā yaśasāyātam arvāg dasrā nidhiṃ madhumantaṃ pibāthaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12399: vi vāṃ ratho vadhvā yādamāno 'ntān divo bādhate vartanibhyām //
GV00maitrs_pu:12400: yo ha sya vāṃ rathirā vasta usrā ratho yujānaḥ pariyāti vartiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12401: tena naḥ śaṃ yor uṣaso vyuṣṭau ny aśvinā vahataṃ yajñe asmin //
GV00maitrs_pu:12402: yuvoḥ śriyaṃ pari yoṣāvṛṇīta sūro duhitā paritakmyāyām /
GV00maitrs_pu:12403: yad devayantam avathaḥ śacībhiḥ pari ghraṃsam omanā vāṃ vayo gāt //
GV00maitrs_pu:12404: yuvaṃ bhujyum avaviddhaṃ samudra udūhathur arṇaso asridhānaiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12405: patatribhir aśramair avyathibhir daṃsanābhir aśvinā pārayantā //
GV00maitrs_pu:12407: sa īṃ satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhir godhāyasaṃ vi dhanasair adardaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12408: brahmaṇaspatir vṛṣabhir varāhair gharmasvedebhir draviṇaṃ vyānaṭ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12409: brahmaṇaspater abhavad yathāvaśaṃ satyo manyur mahi karmā kariṣyataḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12410: yo gā udājat sa dive vi cābhajan mahīva rītiḥ śavasāsarat pṛthak //
GV00maitrs_pu:12411: indhāno agniṃ vanavad vanuṣyataḥ kṛtabrahmā śūśuvad rātahavyā it /
GV00maitrs_pu:12412: jātena jātam ati sa prasarsṛte yaṃyaṃ yujaṃ kṛṇute brahmaṇaspatiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12415: sa ij janena sa viśā sa janmanā sa putrair vājaṃ bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12416: devānāṃ yaḥ pitaram āvivāsati śraddhāmanā haviṣā brahmaṇaspatim //
GV00maitrs_pu:12417: āyātaṃ mitrāvaruṇā suśasty upa priyā namasā hūyamānā /
GV00maitrs_pu:12418: saṃ yā apnaḥstho apaseva janāñ śrudhīyataś cid yatatho mahitvā //
GV00maitrs_pu:12419: yuvaṃ vastrāṇi pīvasā vasāthe yuvor achidrā mantavo ha sargāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12420: avātiratam anṛtāni viśva ṛtena mitrāvaruṇā sacethe //
GV00maitrs_pu:12421: ko nu vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā ṛtāyan divo vā mahaḥ pārthivasya vā de /
GV00maitrs_pu:12422: ṛtasya vā sadasi trāsīthāṃ no yajñāyate vā paśuṣo nu vājān //
GV00maitrs_pu:12423: tat su vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā mahitvam īrmā tasthuṣīr ahabhir duduhre /
GV00maitrs_pu:12424: viśvāḥ pinvathaḥ svasarasya dhenā anu vām ekaḥ pavir āvavarta //
GV00maitrs_pu:12425: yad baṃhiṣṭhaṃ nātividhe sudānū achidraṃ śarma bhuvanasya gopā /
GV00maitrs_pu:12426: tena no mitrāvaruṇā aviṣṭaṃ siṣāsanto jigīvāṃsaḥ syāma //
GV00maitrs_pu:12427: gopā : FN Ben, Pada. H, Bb: gopāḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:12430: ā no viśvā āskrā gamanta devā mitro aryamā varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12431: bhuvan yathā no viśve vṛdhāsaḥ karant suṣāhā vithuraṃ na śavaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12432: śaṃ no devā viśvadevā bhavantu śaṃ sarasvatī saha dhībhir astu /
GV00maitrs_pu:12433: śam abhiṣācaḥ śam u rātiṣācaḥ śaṃ no divyāḥ pārthivāḥ śaṃ no apyāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12434: ye savituḥ satyasavasya viśve mitrasya vrate varuṇasya devāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12435: te saubhagaṃ vīravad gomad apno dadhātana draviṇaṃ citram asme //
GV00maitrs_pu:12437: dyauḥ pitaḥ pṛthivi mātar adhrug agne bhrātar vasavo mṛḍatā naḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12438: viśva ādityā adite sajoṣā asmabhyaṃ śarma bahulaṃ viyanta //
GV00maitrs_pu:12439: dyauḥ : FN Ed: dyauḥ. cf. note 10
GV00maitrs_pu:12440: īḍe agniṃ svavasaṃ namobhir iha prasatto vicayat kṛtaṃ naḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12441: rathair iva prabhare vājayadbhiḥ pradakṣiṇin marutāṃ stomam aśyām //
GV00maitrs_pu:12442: tviṣīmanto adhvarasyeva didyut triṣucyavaso juhvo nāgneḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12443: arcatrayo dhunayo na vīrā bhrājajjanmāno maruto adhṛṣṭāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12444: agne yāhi dūtyaṃ mā riṣaṇyo devaṃ achā brahmakṛtā gaṇena /
GV00maitrs_pu:12445: sarasvatīṃ maruto aśvināpo yakṣi devān ratnadheyāya viśvān //
GV00maitrs_pu:12447: ye agnayo na śośucann idhānā dvir yat trir maruto vāvṛdhanta /
GV00maitrs_pu:12448: areṇavo hiraṇyayāsa eṣāṃ sākaṃ nṛmṇaiḥ pauṃsyebhiś ca bhūvan //
GV00maitrs_pu:12450: satyaṃ bṛhad ṛtam ugraṃ dīkṣā tapo brahma yajñāḥ pṛthivīṃ dhārayanti /
GV00maitrs_pu:12451: sā no bhūtasya bhuvanasya patny uruṃ lokaṃ pṛthivī naḥ kṛṇotu //
GV00maitrs_pu:12452: asaṃbādhā yā madhyato mānavebhyo yasyā udvataḥ pravataḥ samaṃ mahat /
GV00maitrs_pu:12453: nānārūpā oṣadhīr yā bibharti pṛthivī naḥ prathatāṃ rādhyatāṃ naḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12454: yāṃ rakṣanty asvapnā viśvadānīṃ devā bhūmiṃ pṛthivīm apramādam /
GV00maitrs_pu:12455: sā no madhu ghṛtaṃ duhām atho ukṣatu varcasā //
GV00maitrs_pu:12456: yasyāṃ pūrve pūrvajanā vicakrire yasyāṃ devā asurān abhyavartayan /
GV00maitrs_pu:12457: yā bibharti bahudhā prāṇad ejat sā no bhūmiḥ pūrvapeyaṃ dadhātu //
GV00maitrs_pu:12458: yās te prācīḥ pradiśo yā udīcīr yāś ca bhūmy adharāg yāś ca paścā /
GV00maitrs_pu:12459: śivās tā mahyaṃ carate bhavantu mā nipaptaṃ bhuvane śiśriyāṇaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12461: viśvaṃbharā vasudhānī purukṣud dhiraṇyavarṇā jagataḥ pratiṣṭhā /
GV00maitrs_pu:12462: vaiśvānaraṃ bibhratī bhūmir agnim indra ṛṣabhā draviṇaṃ no dadhātu //MS_4,14.11//
GV00maitrs_pu:12463: ā vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā havyadātiṃ namasā devā avasā vavṛtyām /
GV00maitrs_pu:12464: asmākaṃ brahma pṛtanāsu sahyā asmākaṃ vṛṣṭir divyā supārā //
GV00maitrs_pu:12465: ṛtasya gopā adhitiṣṭhatho rathaṃ satyadharmāṇā parame vyoman /
GV00maitrs_pu:12466: yam atra mitrāvaruṇāvatho yuvaṃ tasmai vṛṣṭir madhumat pinvate divaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12467: vācaṃ su mitrāvaruṇā ṛtāvarīṃ parjanyaś citrāṃ vadati tviṣīmatīm /
GV00maitrs_pu:12468: abhrā vasata marutaḥ su māyayā dyāṃ varṣayatam aruṇām arepasam //
GV00maitrs_pu:12470: samrājā asya bhuvanasya rājatho mitrāvaruṇā vidathe svardṛśā /
GV00maitrs_pu:12471: vṛṣṭiṃ vāṃ rādho amṛtatvam īmahe dyāvāpṛthivī vicaranti tanyavaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12472: ā no mitrāvaruṇā havyajuṣṭiṃ ghṛtair gavyūtim ukṣatam iḍābhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12473: prati vām atra varam ā janāya pṛṇītam udno divyasya cāroḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12474: samrājā ugrā vṛṣabhā divas patī pṛthivyā mitrāvaruṇā vicarṣaṇī /
GV00maitrs_pu:12475: citrebhir abhrair upatiṣṭhato ravaṃ dyāṃ varṣayato asurasya māyayā //
GV00maitrs_pu:12476: ā te maho yo jāta evābhi gotrāṇi //
GV00maitrs_pu:12477: ābhiḥ spṛdho mithatīr ariṣaṇyann amitrasya vyathayā manyum indra /
GV00maitrs_pu:12478: ābhir viśvā abhiyujo viṣūcīr āryāya viśo 'vatārīr dāsīḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12479: ayaṃ śṛṇve adha jayann uta ghnann ayam uta prakṛṇute yudhā gāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12480: yadā satyaṃ kṛṇute manyum indro viśvaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhayatā ejad asmāt //
GV00maitrs_pu:12481: anu svadhām akṣarann āpo asyāvardhata madhyā ā nāvyānām /
GV00maitrs_pu:12482: sadhrīcīnena manasā tam indrā ojiṣṭhena hanmanāhann abhi dyūn //
GV00maitrs_pu:12483: indras tarasvān abhimātihogro hiraṇyavarṇa iṣiraḥ svarṣāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12484: tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma //
GV00maitrs_pu:12485: hiraṇyavarṇo abhayaṃ kṛṇotv abhimātihendraḥ pṛtanāsu jiṣṇuḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12486: sa naḥ śarma trivarūthaṃ viyaṃsad yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12487: indraṃ stuhi vajriṇaṃ somapṛṣṭhaṃ puroḍāśasya juṣatāṃ havir naḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12488: hatvābhimātīḥ pṛtanāḥ sahasvān athābhayaṃ kṛṇuhi viśvato naḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12489: stuhi śūraṃ vajriṇam apratīkaṃ vṛtrahaṇaṃ puruhūtam indram /
GV00maitrs_pu:12490: ya ekā iñ śatapatir janeṣu tasmā indrāya haviṣā juhota //
GV00maitrs_pu:12491: indro devānām adhipāḥ purohito viśāṃ patir abhavad vājinīvān /
GV00maitrs_pu:12492: abhimātihā taviṣas tuviṣmān asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāt //
GV00maitrs_pu:12493: ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī mahitvā balenādṛṃhad abhimātihendraḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12494: sa no haviḥ pratigṛbhṇātu rātaye devānāṃ devo nidhipā no avyāt //MS_4,14.12//
GV00maitrs_pu:12495: indro vṛtram atarad vṛtratūrye 'nādhṛṣyo maghavā śūrā indraḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12496: anv enaṃ viśo amadanta pūrvīr ayaṃ rājā jagataś carṣaṇīnām //
GV00maitrs_pu:12497: sa eva vīraḥ sa u vīryāvānt sa ekarājo jagataḥ paraspāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12498: yadā vṛtram atarañ śūrā indro athaikarājo abhavaj janānām //
GV00maitrs_pu:12499: indro yajñaṃ vardhayan viśvavedāḥ puroḍāśasya juṣatāṃ havir naḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12500: vṛtraṃ tīrtvā dānavaṃ vajrabāhur diśo 'dṛṃhad dṛṃhitā dṛṃhaṇena //
GV00maitrs_pu:12501: imaṃ yajñaṃ vardhayan viśvavedāḥ puroḍāśaṃ pratigṛbhṇātv indraḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12502: yadā vṛtram atarañ śūrā indro athābhavad damitābhikratūnām //
GV00maitrs_pu:12504: indro devāñ śambarahatya āvad indro devānām abhavat purogāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12505: indro yajñe haviṣā vāvṛdhāno vṛtratūr no abhayaṃ śarma yaṃsat //
GV00maitrs_pu:12507: indrasya vṛṣṇo janiṣṭhā ugra indra eṣāṃ netā bhūri cakartha //
GV00maitrs_pu:12508: tvaṃ mānebhya indra viśvajanyā radā marudbhiḥ śurudho goagrāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12509: stavānebhiḥ stavasa indra devair vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV00maitrs_pu:12510: yaḥ sapta sindhūṃr adadhāt pṛthivyāṃ yaḥ sapta lokān akṛṇod diśaś ca /
GV00maitrs_pu:12511: indro haviṣmānt sagaṇo marudbhir vṛtratūr no yajñam ihopayāsat //
GV00maitrs_pu:12513: indrasya nu vīryāṇi pravocaṃ yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī /
GV00maitrs_pu:12514: ahann ahim anv apas tatarda pra vakṣaṇā abhinat parvatānām //
GV00maitrs_pu:12515: ahann ahiṃ parvate śiśriyāṇaṃ tvaṣṭāsmai vajraṃ svaryaṃ tatakṣa /
GV00maitrs_pu:12516: vāśrā iva dhenavaḥ syandamānā añjaḥ samudram avajagmur āpaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12517: indro yāto 'vasitasya rājā śamasya ca śṛṅgiṇo vajrabāhuḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12518: sed u rājā kṣayati carṣaṇīnām arān na nemiḥ pari tā babhūva //
GV00maitrs_pu:12519: abhi sidhmo ajigād asya śatrūn vi tigmena vṛṣabheṇā puro 'bhet /
GV00maitrs_pu:12520: saṃ vajreṇābhinad vṛtram indraḥ pra svāṃ matim atirañ śāśadānaḥ //MS_4,14.13//
GV00maitrs_pu:12522: tvam apo vi duro viṣūcīr indra dṛḍham arujaḥ parvatasya /
GV00maitrs_pu:12523: rājābhavo jagataś carṣaṇīnāṃ sākaṃ sūryaṃ janayan dyām uṣāsam //
GV00maitrs_pu:12524: indro rājā jagataś carṣaṇīnām adhi kṣami viṣurūpaṃ yad asti /
GV00maitrs_pu:12525: tato dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni codad rādha upastutaś cid arvāk //
GV00maitrs_pu:12526: svādor itthā viṣūvato madhvaḥ pibanti gauryaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12527: yā indreṇa sayāvarīr dasrā madanti śobhase vasvīr anu svarājyam //
GV00maitrs_pu:12528: yudhmasya te vṛṣabhasya svarājña ugrasya yūnaḥ sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12529: ajūryato vajriṇo vīryāṇīndraḥ śrutasya mahato mahāni //
GV00maitrs_pu:12530: idaṃ namo vṛṣabhāya svarājña ukthaśuṣmāya tavase 'vāci /
GV00maitrs_pu:12531: asminn indra vṛjane sarvavīrāḥ smat sūribhis tava śarmant syāma //
GV00maitrs_pu:12533: ādityānām avasā nūtanena sakṣīmahi śarmaṇā śaṃtamena /
GV00maitrs_pu:12534: anāgāstve adititve turāsa imaṃ yajñaṃ dadhatu śroṣamāṇāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12535: na dakṣiṇā vicikite na savyā na prācīnam ādityā nota paścā /
GV00maitrs_pu:12536: pākyā cid vasavo dhīryā cid yuṣmānīto abhayaṃ jyotir aśyām //
GV00maitrs_pu:12539: tisro bhūmīr dhārayaṃs trīnr uta dyūṃs trīṇi vratā vidathe antar eṣām /
GV00maitrs_pu:12540: ṛtenādityā mahi vo mahitvaṃ tad aryaman varuṇa mitra cāru //
GV00maitrs_pu:12542: śucir apaḥ sūyavasā adabdhā upakṣayanti vṛddhavayāḥ suvīraḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12543: nakiṣ ṭaṃ ghnanty antito na dūrād ya ādityānāṃ bhavati praṇītau //
GV00maitrs_pu:12544: ādityo deva udagāt purastād viśvā bhūtāni prati modamānaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12545: tasya devāḥ prasavaṃ yanti sarve yatrāsya nāma paramaṃ guhā viduḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12546: yasya bhānti ketavo yasya raśmayo yasyemā viśvā bhuvanāni sarvā /
GV00maitrs_pu:12547: tasyādityasya prasavaṃ manāmahe yas tejasā prathamajā vibhāti //
GV00maitrs_pu:12548: vibhāti ketur aruṇaḥ purastād ādityo viśvā bhuvanāni sarvā /
GV00maitrs_pu:12549: sugaṃ nu panthām anveti prajānan pitā devānām asuro vipaścit //
GV00maitrs_pu:12550: vratena yaṃ vratino vardhayanti devā manuṣyāḥ pitaraś ca sarve /
GV00maitrs_pu:12551: tasyādityasya prasavaṃ manāmahe yas tejasā prathamajā vibhāti //
GV00maitrs_pu:12552: ādityaḥ śukra udagāt purastāj jyotiḥ kṛṇvan vi tamo bādhamānaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12553: ābhāsamānaḥ pradiśo nu sarvā bhadrasya kartā rocamānā āgāt //
GV00maitrs_pu:12554: yaded enam adadhur yajñiyāso divi devāḥ sūryam āditeyam /
GV00maitrs_pu:12555: yadā cariṣṇū mithunā abhūtām ād it prāpaśyan bhuvanāni viśvā //MS_4,14.14//
GV00maitrs_pu:12557: vayam u tvā gṛhapate janānām agne akarma samidhā bṛhantam /
GV00maitrs_pu:12558: asthūri no gārhapatyāni santu tigmena nas tejasā saṃśiśādhi //
GV00maitrs_pu:12559: agne sa kṣeṣad ṛtapā ṛtejā uru jyotir naśate devayuṣ ṭe /
GV00maitrs_pu:12560: yaṃ tvaṃ mitreṇa varuṇaḥ sajoṣā deva pāsi tyajasā martam aṃhaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12561: tejiṣṭhā yasyāratir vanerāṭ todo adhvan na vṛdhasāno adyaut /
GV00maitrs_pu:12562: adrogho na dravitā cetati tmann amartyo 'vartra oṣadhīṣu //
GV00maitrs_pu:12563: ā yad iṣe nṛpatiṃ tejā ānaṭ śuci reto niṣiktaṃ dyaur abhīke /
GV00maitrs_pu:12564: agniḥ śardham anavadyaṃ yuvānaṃ svādhyaṃ janayat sūdayac ca //
GV00maitrs_pu:12565: sa tejīyasā manasā tvota uta śikṣa svapatyasya śikṣoḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12566: agne rāyo nṛtamasya prabhūtau bhūyāma te suṣṭutayaś ca vasvaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12567: sa id asteva pratidhād asiṣyañ śiśīta tejo 'yaso na dhārām /
GV00maitrs_pu:12568: citradhrajatir aratir yo aktor ver na druṣadvā raghupatmajaṃhāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12570: mathīd yad īṃ viṣṭo mātariśvā hotāraṃ viśvāpsuṃ viśvadevyam /
GV00maitrs_pu:12571: ni yaṃ dadhur manuṣyāsu vikṣu svar ṇa citraṃ vapuṣe vibhāvam //
GV00maitrs_pu:12572: ayaṃ sa yasya śarmann avobhir agner edhate jaritābhiṣṭau /
GV00maitrs_pu:12573: jyeṣṭhebhir yo bhānubhir ṛbhūṇāṃ paryeti parivīto vibhāvā //
GV00maitrs_pu:12574: adidyutat sv apāko vibhāvāgne yajasva rodasī urūcī /
GV00maitrs_pu:12575: āyuṃ na yaṃ namasā rātahavyā añjanti suprayasaṃ pañca janāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12576: sa no vibhāvā cakṣaṇir na vastor agnir vandāru vedyaś cano dhāt /
GV00maitrs_pu:12577: viśvāyur yo amṛto martyeṣu pary abhūd atithir jātavedāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12578: yo bhānubhir vibhāvā vibhāty agnir devebhir ṛtāvājasraḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12579: ā yo vivāya sakhyā sakhibhyo 'parihvṛto atyo na saptiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12580: yad agna eṣā samitir bhavāti devī deveṣu yajatā yajatra /
GV00maitrs_pu:12581: ratnā ca yad vibhajāsi svadhāvo bhāgaṃ no atra vasumantaṃ vītāt //
GV00maitrs_pu:12582: etā te agna ucathāni vedho juṣṭāni santu manase hṛde ca /
GV00maitrs_pu:12583: śakema rāyaḥ sudhuro yamaṃ te 'dhi śravo devabhaktaṃ dadhānāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12584: vi pṛkṣo agne maghavāno aśyur vi sūrayo dadato viśvam āyuḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12585: sanema vājaṃ samitheṣv aryo bhāgaṃ deveṣu śravase dadhānāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12586: ā no gahi sakhyebhiḥ śivebhir mahān mahībhir ūtibhiḥ saraṇyan /
GV00maitrs_pu:12587: asme rayiṃ bahulaṃ saṃtarutraṃ suvācaṃ bhāgaṃ yaśasaṃ kṛdhī naḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12588: kurmas tā āyur ajaraṃ yad agne yathā yukto jātavedo na riṣyāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12589: athā vahāsi sumanasyamāno bhāgaṃ devebhyo haviṣaḥ sujāta //
GV00maitrs_pu:12590: haviṣīva bhajamāno nā ābhāg devebhyaḥ śikṣann uta mānuṣebhyaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12591: tvaṃ devānām asi yahva hotā sa enān yakṣīṣito yajīyān //MS_4,14.15//
GV00maitrs_pu:12592: agne dā dā no agne 'gnir dadāty annapate annasya no dehy agninā rayim aśnavat saṃsam id yuvase vṛṣan yās te //
GV00maitrs_pu:12593: yamo no gātuṃ prathamo viveda naiṣā gavyūtir apabhartavā u /
GV00maitrs_pu:12594: yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyur enā jajñānāḥ pathyā anu svāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12595: prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūrvebhir yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ paretāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12596: ubhā rājānā svadhayā madantā yamaṃ paśyāsi varuṇaṃ ca devam //
GV00maitrs_pu:12597: aṅgirobhir āgahi yajñiyebhir yama vairūpair iha mādayasva /
GV00maitrs_pu:12598: vivasvantaṃ huve yaḥ pitā te 'smin yajñe barhiṣy ā niṣadya //
GV00maitrs_pu:12599: imaṃ yama prastaram ā hi sīdāṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12600: ā tvā mantrāḥ kaviśastā vahantv enā rājan haviṣā mādayasva //
GV00maitrs_pu:12601: mātalī kavyair yamo aṅgirobhir bṛhaspatir ṛkvabhir vāvṛdhānaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12602: yāṃś ca devā vāvṛdhur ye ca devānt svāhānye svadhayānye madanti //
GV00maitrs_pu:12603: pareyivāṃsaṃ pravato mahīr anu bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśānam /
GV00maitrs_pu:12604: vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānāṃ yamaṃ rājānaṃ haviṣā duvasya //
GV00maitrs_pu:12605: yās te pūṣan nāvo antaḥ samudre hiraṇyayīr antarikṣe caranti /
GV00maitrs_pu:12606: tābhir yāsi dūtyaṃ sūryasya kāmena kṛtaḥ śrava ichamānaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12607: śukraṃ te anyad yajataṃ te anyat //
GV00maitrs_pu:12608: pūṣemā āśā anuveda sarvāḥ so asmaṃ abhayatamena meṣat /
GV00maitrs_pu:12609: svastidā āghṛṇiḥ sarvavīro 'prayuchan pura etu prajānan //
GV00maitrs_pu:12610: prapathe pathām ajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathe pṛthivyāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12611: ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā ca carati prajānan //
GV00maitrs_pu:12612: pūṣā subandhur diva ā pṛthivyā iḍas patir maghavā dasmavarcāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12613: yaṃ devāso adaduḥ sūryāyai kāmena kṛtaṃ tavasaṃ svañcam //
GV00maitrs_pu:12614: ajāśvaḥ paśupā vājapastyo dhiyaṃjinvo bhuvane viśve arpitaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12615: aṣṭrāṃ pūṣā śithirām udvarīvṛjat saṃcakṣāṇo bhuvanā deva īyate //MS_4,14.16//
GV00maitrs_pu:12616: yad devā devaheḍanaṃ yad vācānṛtam odima /
GV00maitrs_pu:12617: ādityās tasmān muñcatartasya tv enam āmutaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12619: tasmān na iha muñcata viśve devāḥ sajoṣasaḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12621: kṛtān naḥ pāhy aṃhaso yat kiṃcānṛtam odima //
GV00maitrs_pu:12623: te no muñcantv enaso yat kiṃcānṛtam odima //
GV00maitrs_pu:12624: sajātaśaṃsād uta jāmiśaṃsāj jyāyasaḥ śaṃsād uta vā kanīyasaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12625: anādhṛṣṭaṃ devakṛtaṃ yad enas tasmāt tvam asmān jātavedo mumugdhi //
GV00maitrs_pu:12627: yad antarikṣaṃ pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ yan mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā jihiṃsima /
GV00maitrs_pu:12628: agnir nas tasmād enaso gārhapatyaḥ pramuñcatu duritāni yāni kāni ca cakṛma //
GV00maitrs_pu:12629: yena trito arṇavān nirbabhūva yena sūryaṃ tamaso niramoci /
GV00maitrs_pu:12630: yenendro viśvā ajahād arātīs tenāhaṃ jyotiṣā jyotir ānaśāna ayākṣi //
GV00maitrs_pu:12631: yad daivyam ṛṇam ahaṃ babhūva dhipsyaṃ vā saṃcakara janebhyaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12632: agnir nas tasmād indraś ca saṃvidānau pramuñcatām //
GV00maitrs_pu:12633: yat kusīdam apratītaṃ mayeha yena yamasya nidhinā carāvaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12634: etat tad agne anṛṇo bhavāmi jīvann eva prati hastānṛṇāni //
GV00maitrs_pu:12635: yad dhastābhyāṃ cakara kilbiṣāny akṣāṇāṃ vagmum avajighram āpaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12636: ugraṃ paśyāc ca rāṣṭrabhṛc ca tāny apsarasām anudattānṛṇāni //
GV00maitrs_pu:12637: ugraṃ paśyed rāṣṭabhṛt kilbiṣāni yad akṣavṛttam anudattam etat /
GV00maitrs_pu:12638: nem na ṛṇān ṛṇavān īpsamāno yamasya loke nidhir ajarāya //
GV00maitrs_pu:12640: imaṃ me varuṇa śrudhī havam adyā ca mṛḍaya /
GV00maitrs_pu:12642: tat tvā yāmi brahmaṇā vandamānas tad āśāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12643: aheḍamāno varuṇeha bodhy uruśaṃsa mā nā āyuḥ pramoṣīḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12644: ud uttamaṃ varuṇa pāśam asmad avādhamaṃ vi madhyamaṃ śrathāya /
GV00maitrs_pu:12645: athā vayam āditya vrate tavānāgaso aditaye syāma //
GV00maitrs_pu:12646: ava te heḍo varuṇa namobhir ava yajñebhir īmahe havirbhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12647: kṣayann asmabhyam asura pracetā rājann enāṃsi śiśrathaḥ kṛtāni //
GV00maitrs_pu:12648: tvaṃ no agne varuṇasya vidvān devasya heḍo 'vayāsisīṣṭhāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12649: yajiṣṭho vahnitamaḥ śośucāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi pramumugdhy asmat //
GV00maitrs_pu:12650: sa tvaṃ no agne 'vamo bhavotī nediṣṭho asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau /
GV00maitrs_pu:12651: avayakṣva no varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhi mṛḍīkaṃ suhavo na edhi //
GV00maitrs_pu:12652: saṃkasuko vikasuko nirṛto yaś ca nisvanaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12653: te 'smad yakṣmam anāgaso dūrād dūram acīcatam //
GV00maitrs_pu:12654: nir yakṣmam acīcate kṛtyāṃ nirṛtiṃ cakāra /
GV00maitrs_pu:12655: tena yo 'smat samṛchātai tam asmai prasuvāmasi //
GV00maitrs_pu:12657: tena yo 'smat samṛchātai tam asmai prasuvāmasi //
GV00maitrs_pu:12658: saṃ varcasā payasā saṃ tanūbhir aganmahi manasā saṃ śivena /
GV00maitrs_pu:12659: tvaṣṭā sudatro vidadhātu rāyo 'nu no mārṣṭu tanvo yad viriṣṭam //MS_4,14.17//
GV00maitrs_pu:12660: śucī vo havyā marutaḥ śucīnāṃ śuciṃ hinomy adhvaraṃ śucibhyaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12661: ṛtena satyam ṛtasāpa āyañ śucijanmānaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12663: aṃseṣv ā marutaḥ khādayo vo vakṣaḥsu rukmā upaśiśriyāṇāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12664: vi vidyuto na vṛṣṭibhī rucānā anu svadhām āyudhair yachamānāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12666: ime turaṃ maruto rāmayantīme sahaḥ sahasā ānamanti /
GV00maitrs_pu:12667: ime śaṃsaṃ vanuṣyato nipānti guru dveṣo araruṣe dadhanti //
GV00maitrs_pu:12668: arā ived acaramā aheva praprajāyante akavā mahobhiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12669: pṛśneḥ putrā upamāso rabhiṣṭhāḥ svayā matyā marutaḥ saṃmimikṣuḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12672: agnīṣomā yo adya vām idaṃ vacaḥ saparyati /
GV00maitrs_pu:12673: tasmai dhattaṃ suvīryaṃ gavāṃ poṣaṃ svaśvyam //
GV00maitrs_pu:12674: ānyaṃ divo mātariśvā jabhārāmathnād anyaṃ pari śyeno adreḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12675: agnīṣomā brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānoruṃ yajñāya cakrathur ulokam //
GV00maitrs_pu:12676: agnīṣomā ya āhutiṃ yo vāṃ dāśād dhaviṣkṛtim /
GV00maitrs_pu:12677: sa prajayā suvīryaṃ viśvam āyur vyaśnavat //
GV00maitrs_pu:12678: agnīṣomā haviṣaḥ prasthitasya vītaṃ haryataṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
GV00maitrs_pu:12679: suśarmāṇā svavasā hi bhūtam athā dhattaṃ yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:12680: ā carṣaṇiprā vṛṣabho janānāṃ rājā kṛṣṭīnāṃ puruhūta indraḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:12681: stutaḥ śravasyann avasopa madrig yuktvā harī vṛṣaṇāyāhy arvāk //
GV00maitrs_pu:12683: taṃ sadhrīcīr ūtayo vṛṣṇyāni pauṃsyāni niyutaḥ saścur indram /
GV00maitrs_pu:12684: samudraṃ na sindhava ukthaśuṣmā uruvyacasaṃ girā āviśanti //
GV00maitrs_pu:12685: satyam it tan na tvāvaṃ anyo 'stīndra devo na martyo jyāyān /
GV00maitrs_pu:12686: ahann ahiṃ pariśayānam arṇo 'vāsṛjo apo achā samudram //
GV00maitrs_pu:12689: sa śevṛdham adhidhā dyumnam asme mahi kṣatraṃ janāṣāḍ indra tavyam /
GV00maitrs_pu:12690: rakṣā ca no maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn rāye ca naḥ svapatyā iṣe dhāḥ //MS_4,14.18//
